, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The utility of shell\ncompanies go beyond money laundering. They come in handy for skirting\nregulations, for big corporations in paying-off by covering their tracks and\nsiphoning off loans from Indians banks to terrorist organizations like LTTE and\nNaxals.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Below: When you see the stamps of so many companies&nbsp;under a man's bed--what does it mean ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xe0W31_0vhg/WLESdg1VRcI/AAAAAAABRMo/ChdL0PprxUkg9xFGSG08fPem2RPa86bsQCLcB/s1600/customerRASTOGI%2B-rubber-stamps-fo-007.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"384\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xe0W31_0vhg/WLESdg1VRcI/AAAAAAABRMo/ChdL0PprxUkg9xFGSG08fPem2RPa86bsQCLcB/s640/customerRASTOGI%2B-rubber-stamps-fo-007.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies in\nIndia have been used for rotation and siphoning off of funds by the promoters\nthrough fictitious sales, inflated purchases, unjust commissions or for\ncreation of equity for ultimate owners . They put fog everywhere to cover their\ntracks and shake off law enforcers and anti-corruption bureau.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bank managers of\nforeign banks in India who were sponsored by the Finance ministry of this dying\nnational party have ( co-operated for a price ) to break the stranglehold of\nModi\u2019s demonetization. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These bank officials have\nrisked their necks and are hand-in-glove in these operations, including\noverlooking KYC norms and background checks for accounts opened in their\nbranches. They hope they will only be suspended / dismissed and will not be\nthrown into jail\u2014&nbsp; they hope collegium\nJudiciary will save them , as usual<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The insiders know the\ntriggers and limits which RED FLAG the computer display.&nbsp; Suspicious transactions are below the\nthreshold of automatic banking software triggers and hence can go undetected\nfor years unless they form part of other investigations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you\u2019re a drug\ndealer, human trafficker or terrorist looking to hide your assets, you can get\na sweet deal \u2013 even loans from foreign banks with Indian managers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forget hiding your\nmoney in Panama and hoping a leak of documents does not expose your chicanery a\nla the Panama Papers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Far better to find a\nsafe haven where your transactions leave no fingerprints at all.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can hire an\nattorney to form a corporation under any name you\u2019d like \u2014 GABBAR SINGH or\nVIKRAM KA BETAL will do \u2014 and then use the corporation for business\ntransactions, such as purchasing real estate, without ever having to disclose\nyour true identity.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies are\n\u201chollow,\u201d meaning that they have no significant assets and may only be\nidentifiable by a name and mailing address.&nbsp;\nShell companies are set up to hide assets from prying eyes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; These protesters have been video taped<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2OVHb-zc4Lw<br />\n<br />\nThe George Soros\u2019 funded Black Lives Matter group (Van Jones)<br />\n<br />\nDONALD TRUMP-- SOROS AND VAN JONES ARE GUILTY OF SEDITION<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0GPJKpNYxKY<br />\n<br />\nOrganizing for Action, a group founded by Obama and featured prominently on his new post-presidency website, is distributing a training manual to anti-Trump activists that advises them to bully GOP lawmakers into backing off support for repealing ObamaCare, curbing immigration from high-risk Islamic nations, and building a border wall.<br />\n<br />\nThe manual, published with OFA partner \u201cIndivisible,\u201d advises protesters to go into halls quietly so as not to raise alarms, and \u201cgrab seats at the front of the room but do not all sit together.\u201d Rather, spread out in pairs to make it seem like the whole room opposes the Republican host\u2019s positions. \u201cThis will help reinforce the impression of broad consensus.\u201d It also urges them to ask \u201chostile\u201d questions \u2014 while keeping \u201ca firm hold on the mic\u201d \u2014 and loudly boo the the GOP politician if he isn\u2019t \u201cgiving you real answers.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMore than a dozen major groups in the institutional left are involved, with groups like Planned Parenthood and unions like SEIU organizing protests. The NEOCONS and COMMIES always demands it is their way or no way.<br />\n<br />\nTrump needs to go after Soros's NGO's and the <span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>SHELL COMPANIES</b></span> </span>which fund the anti-trump protesters<br />\n<br />\nDRAIN THE SWAMP<br />\n<br />\nWARN HILLARY OF JAIL IS SHE GETS TOO BOLD WITH WHIPPING UP ANTI-TRUMP SENTIMENT<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panama documents,\nwere obtained by the German newspaper Suddeutsche Zeitung (SZ) and shared with\nthe International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ), have created\na global shit storm. So far, 72 current and former heads of state have been\nlinked to offshore shell companies created by Mossack Fonseca..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Today, Mossack\nFonseca is considered one of the world's five biggest wholesalers of offshore\nsecrecy,\" ICIJ wrote. \"It has more than 500 employees and\ncollaborators in more than 40 offices around the world, including three in\nSwitzerland and eight in China, and in 2013 had billings of more than $42\nmillion.\"</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ability to pool\nfunds in accounts has been made much easier with internet banking. Although\nfinancial institutions have established internet banking thresholds, customers\nstill have the capacity to transfer large amounts over a relatively short space\nof time. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Customers may deposit cash\nfunds into an account and then undertake rapid domestic transfers to separate\naccounts. This type of activity can be indicative of any number of criminal\nactivities and should be viewed as a possible indicator of illicit activity,\nparticularly if the activity is inconsistent with information about the\ncustomer, their business or previous account history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A 'gatekeeper' is a\nperson with specific knowledge about services or structures which can be\nmisused for money laundering. These people are not necessarily directly\ninvolved in money laundering but they assist third parties to distance their\ncriminal activity from their illicit profits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gatekeepers are\ncommonly accountants, legal practitioners, notaries, and other similar\nprofessionals. Reporting entities should be alert to the roles certain\nprofessionals can play in money laundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">International funds\ntransfers, or wire transfers, are used by criminals to rapidly transfer funds\nacross international boundaries. Multiple wire transfers, each bearing different\ntransfer details, are sent to disguise their true nature. This method also\ncreates a convoluted audit trail which hampers investigations of&nbsp; law enforcement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminals set up\nillegitimate businesses or corporations to send wire transfers. This not only\nconceals the true identity of the criminal, but the transfers can be hidden\namong the complexities of established international trade and financial market\nactivities.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By having a good\nknowledge of customers and businesses, and by monitoring unusual spikes in\nactivity, reporting entities can detect suspicious activity .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cash businesses offer a\ndecent disguise for laundering. A used bookstore, an IDLE repair shop with\ninflated personnel, or pawn shop will do.&nbsp;\nSo will a contracting business.&nbsp;\nYou can open a laundromat, a car wash\u2014even a&nbsp; used car dealership.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever the business,\nyou keep two sets of books. One ledger shows the actual numbers. The second\nledger is the one revenue services receives<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people who visit\ncasinos don\u2019t do it for the thrill. They are there to launder some money. Go to\nthe casino with your fifty thousand dollars and get it all in chips. Play a few\nrounds of blackjack or whatever your favorite game is, lose a few, win a few,\neat a hot dog, have a Coke, and then go to the counter and cash out again.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now\nyou\u2019ve got your money back, you had a night out, but you\u2019ve got a receipt that\nshows you won 50 thousand dollars at the casino. You can deposit that in your\nbank account and you\u2019re good to go. A casino is a money launderer\u2019s best\nfriend.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The majority of dirty\ncash is deposited into the bank through accounts set up in BENAMI names of\nfamily and friends or under the guise of a legitimate business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU\nHEARD \u201c WORK AT HOME AND EARN THOUSAND OF RUPEES A WEEK \u201c?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OjojziPxZok/WLG05DFAoiI/AAAAAAABROM/7VNQ2Q_tKJIc5qZnTiq04BsUF73pdionACLcB/s1600/grouwchy-smurf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OjojziPxZok/WLG05DFAoiI/AAAAAAABROM/7VNQ2Q_tKJIc5qZnTiq04BsUF73pdionACLcB/s400/grouwchy-smurf.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Most of the time you\nwill be conned to being a SMURF<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The na\u00efve smurfs&nbsp; are conned into accepting a cushy job as\n\u201cFinancial Officer\u201d or some other lofty name, have to open a strange kind of\njoint bank account with a shell company, whose trustees have control over it,\nand which is being used behind the smurf\u2019s back to launder money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smurfs are all these\nlittle launderers set up by a criminal organization to make cash deposits under\nthe RED FLAG of software ceiling limit into legit bank accounts, bank accounts\nin a shared trust with a limited liability company connected to the\ncriminal.&nbsp; The criminal\u2019s name is found\nnowhere in any of the hundreds or thousands of accounts associated with his or\nher dirty wealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To squeeze under that\nlow ceiling, launderers hire smurfs \u2013 these petty decoy depositors. Smurfs\nreceive a cut,&nbsp; pawns paid to run the\nrisk of making these deposits into a bank account in the smurf\u2019s name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some criminal buys a\nmultimillion dollar property and then proceeds to gut the house , raze the\nproperty, and pay the contractor in cash to renovate the interiors and\nlandscape the exteriors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The contractor hires out all the jobs and spreads the\nmoney around to labour willing to accept cash for a day or a week\u2019s work. The\nwork done on the property increases its value theoretically, but in the mind of\nthe criminal, the money\u2019s better spent than wasted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PM MODI,&nbsp; DO NOT ALLOW BUILDING CONTRACTORS TO PAY\nLABOUR IN CASH-USE BHIM OR PAYTM.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL\nLABOUR HAVE MOBILE PHONES. IF NOT GIVEN THEM CHEAP INDIAN MADE MOBILES AT\nSUBSIDISED RATES. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN AFTER THAT IF\nTHE CONTRACTORS PAY CASH\u2014 ASK WHISTLE BLOWERS TO PIN HIM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United Nations\nestimates the amount of money successfully laundered globally every year is\nover two trillion dollars \u2013 that\u2019s lakhs of smurfs in every country. &nbsp;Capt Ajit Vadakayi says he figure is more than\n3.1 trillion USD.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GVsIWgdIig4/WLG0JWBV_OI/AAAAAAABROA/1paTh7y5YLc2IKOB01W-p7mr0Nm8_Jq3wCLcB/s1600/structuddring-and-smurfing-7-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GVsIWgdIig4/WLG0JWBV_OI/AAAAAAABROA/1paTh7y5YLc2IKOB01W-p7mr0Nm8_Jq3wCLcB/s640/structuddring-and-smurfing-7-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These kinds of SHELL\ntransactions call for a certain kind of accountant or lawyer, someone whose\ncareer is as a money launderer for criminals either in-house or on a freelance\nclient basis, who is in charge of hiring smurfs and making fake companies and\nlooking for new havens and protecting the kingpin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We ask retired smurfs / accountants\nto get GOOD KARMA by blowing the whistle\u2014by exposing the modus operandi.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smurfing is also known\nas structuring,in banking industry jargon, it is the practice of executing\nfinancial transactions (such as the making of bank deposits) in a specific\npattern calculated to avoid the creation of certain records and reports\nrequired by law..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9khg6DEuXZw/WLGz6w8UF_I/AAAAAAABRN8/D-vb71ABqMk3V7rE_MJ5AVb4hUq8dO1_gCLcB/s1600/structuring-awwnd-smurfing-9-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9khg6DEuXZw/WLGz6w8UF_I/AAAAAAABRN8/D-vb71ABqMk3V7rE_MJ5AVb4hUq8dO1_gCLcB/s640/structuring-awwnd-smurfing-9-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Structuring includes\nthe act of parceling what would otherwise be a large financial transaction into\na series of smaller transactions to avoid scrutiny by regulators or law\nenforcement. Structuring often appears in indictments related to money\nlaundering, fraud, and other financial crimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In BREAKING BAD we got\nto see structuring .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Precursors used in\ncooking Meth &nbsp;are on the watch list of\nDEA. In this context the agent will make purchases of small, legal amounts from\nseveral drug and grocery stores, with the intent to aggregate the lot for use\nin the illegal production of methamphetamine. Also, since the monthly\npseudoephedrine purchase limits in US are too low for mass meth production,\nthis practice often involves using multiple \"smurfs\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6DtsoTQyOUY/WLG0sFPtTXI/AAAAAAABROI/NyB2LZh4wrcaw9by62RR-1Dy7bjgRfMCgCLcB/s1600/prevention-of-money-laundering-crrlass-room-notes-for-ca-icma-14-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6DtsoTQyOUY/WLG0sFPtTXI/AAAAAAABROI/NyB2LZh4wrcaw9by62RR-1Dy7bjgRfMCgCLcB/s640/prevention-of-money-laundering-crrlass-room-notes-for-ca-icma-14-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the United States,\nthe Bank Secrecy Act requires the filing of a currency transaction report (CTR)\nfor transactions of more than $10,000 in currency (US or foreign)\u2014in India it\nis 50,000 rupees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banks are being used to\nlaunder money every day, with smurfs, or through wire transfers from other\nbanks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">eBay and Paypal are\nused to launder money.&nbsp; With dirty cash\nin their white pockets, smurfs hit Best Buy and Future Shop and purchase home\ngear like flatscreen TVs, iPads, and laptops, then use their online accounts to\nsell this stuff on eBay unopened. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The buyer pays for the\nmerchandise using PayPal, which cleans the cash safely enough for it to be\ndeposited into a bank account and look like a legitimate source of earnings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS A SHIP CAPTAIN I\nOFTEN FLEW TO HONGKONG.&nbsp; IF I SAW INDIANS\nI WOULD ASK THEM IF THEY WORKED IN HONGKONG\u2014OH NO, THEY WERE GOING THERE FOR A\nHOLIDAY.&nbsp; HONGKONG FOR A HOLIDAY ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEEEE\nHEEEEEEEEEE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO INDIANS GO TO\nLAS VEGAS AND MACAU?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY HAS JEW ROTHSCHILD\nCREATED SEAMLESS BORDERS IN EU ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Macau and Hong Kong are\nconsidered Special Administrative Regions of the People's Republic of China,\nand part of what makes them special is that they are great places to launder\ncash. Macau is the casino capital of the world, with seven times more gaming\nrevenue than Las Vegas, and Hong Kong is home to plenty of compliant banks and\nother intermediaries willing to transfer funds anywhere in the world without\nasking too many questions, for a fee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let's say you live or\nwork in China and want to hide a massive bribe. First, you must convert it from\nyuan into another currency without the government knowing. The easiest way to\ndo this is to contact a junket, an agent in mainland China who will give you\ncasino chips for your cash, minus fees of up to 20%.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take the chips to a\nfriendly, cooperative casino, where you can gamble with them, cash them in for\nHong Kong or US dollars to then spend as you see fit, or deposit in a Hong Kong\nbank branch. Or, for extra safety, take them to a lawyer specializing in\noffshore laundering. Meanwhile, the casino will mix your chips with those from\nlegitimate gamblers, and its accountants will book your $1 million as paid-out\nwinnings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your bank or lawyer\nmust wire-transfer the funds in such a way that the money crosses multiple\nborders, to frustrate detection or confiscation. For instance, the money might\nend up in a US trust managed by a shell company in Grand Cayman, owned by\nanother trust in Guernsey with an account in Luxembourg managed by a Swiss or\nSingaporean or Caribbean banker who doesn't know who the owner is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The smurf will then\ndeposit small amounts of your cash into an account every day for weeks or\nmonths - or years - avoiding watchful eyes by keeping the numbers small.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Along the way, you can\nask your smurf to withdraw some cash - which has since been rendered\nuntraceable - for a shopping spree. &nbsp;The\nrest &nbsp;have a bank wire-transfer the money\nto your offshore accomplices or your shell companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hong Kong resident,\nCarson Yeung , was sentenced to six years for laundering $91.27 million through\nhis bank accounts between 2001 and 2007. A former hairdresser who'd since\nbought the UK's Birmingham City football team, he claimed he had accumulated\nhundreds of millions of dollars in profits from stock trades, a hair salon, and\ngambling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real big shots\ndon't bother with casinos, crooked bank managers, junkets, or smurfs. They\nmanage to transfer millions, or billions, without handling cash or involving\nbanks at all, instead funneling their money through corporate deals (bribes,\nkickbacks, and embezzlement schemes), which are exempt from currency controls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let's say you're a\ngovernment official or corporate executive, and you want to receive a $1\nmillion bribe or kickback for giving a lucrative and excessively priced\ncontract to a foreign or local business. You approve the contract, and its\npayment, and pad the consideration by a few million, which includes $1 million\nfor yourself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The client puts your $1\nmillion overpayment into a shell company in an offshore jurisdiction, where\nyour ownership can remain anonymous. You are then free to invest or spend the\nmoney. The business writes it off as an expense, paid out to an offshore\nconsultant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or perhaps you'd prefer\nthat your $1 million be used to buy an asset offshore for you, or that it be\npaid out gradually in salaries or fees to family members. Either way, you're\ngood to go.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under invoicing is the\nsame thing in reverse. Simply sell your goods or services to a business at a\nprice that is less than the goods or services are worth. Then, out of the embezzled\nfunds, you get $1 million directly from the company that got the bargain. These\nfunds can be placed directly into anonymous offshore account or into an asset\nof your choice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"https://www.icij.org/project/swiss-leaks/diamond-dealers-deep-trouble-bank-documents-shine-light-secret-ways\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.icij.org/project/swiss-leaks/diamond-dealers-deep-trouble-bank-documents-shine-light-secret-ways</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO SO SO<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A DIAMONDS IS A GIRLs\nBEST FRIEND ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY LEFT BALL !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RATHER A DIAMOND IS A\nGOVT REGULATORS WORST NIGHTMARE .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PEOPLE\nSHOVE IT UP THEIR ASSHOLES.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v78KC26aTqI/WLG8wx9CADI/AAAAAAABROc/U4iJk9FX9ZwSAewrN27mPAcXDv5XxR2GwCLcB/s1600/cat-butt-gem-jewwel-twinkle-tush-fb3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"210\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v78KC26aTqI/WLG8wx9CADI/AAAAAAABROc/U4iJk9FX9ZwSAewrN27mPAcXDv5XxR2GwCLcB/s400/cat-butt-gem-jewwel-twinkle-tush-fb3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perhaps the most\nsurprising thing of all is that establishing a shell corporation \u2014 at least by\nitself \u2014 doesn't technically violate any law. This MUST change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In other words, it's\nnot having a secret shell corporation that can get you in trouble. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's how you use\nit\u2014rather how you leave your tracks behind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hundreds, perhaps\nthousands, of firms offer help setting up shell companies, often as part of a\nset of financial and legal services, and many are located in the United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of these firms\ndon't actually process the transaction themselves but farm it out to a much\nlarger firm that specializes in them, such as Mossack Fonseca. The Panamanian\nlaw firm is considered one of the largest such firms in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.maltatoday.com.mt/news/national/49645/africas_top_billionaire_uses_malta_shell_companies_to_hold_diamonds_conflict_%23.WLG9ZNJ97IU\">http://www.maltatoday.com.mt/news/national/49645/africas_top_billionaire_uses_malta_shell_companies_to_hold_diamonds_conflict_#.WLG9ZNJ97IU</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_105M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_24.html?showComment=1488045128380#c824297741341199400\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 25, 2017 at 11:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_105MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nLIP STICK UNDER A BURQA -- bollywood film<br />\n<br />\nART ?<br />\n<br />\nWAXING AND RIPPING OFF ARMPIT HAIR?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">WHAT IS NEXT?<br /><br />PUSSY HAIR ?</span><br />\n<br />\nWE WANT PEHLAJ NIHALANI TO CENSOR--NOT CERTIFY<br />\n<br />\nREMOVE ALL SLIME AND DIRT<br />\n<br />\nI ASK THE GOVT OF INDIA TO LAY SIEGE TO THE<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"> SHELL COMPANIES</span> USED BY BOLLYWOOD<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW THE PAKISTANI CONNECTION FROM MY PAKISTANI OFFICERS<br />\n<br />\nALL IN GOOD TIME<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The forms filled out\nwhen a company is created are often the only public proof of a phantom firm\u2019s\nexistence, and they rarely ask for enough information to track down the\nindividuals controlling it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even where they do, this information can be\nmisleading.&nbsp; &nbsp;The only way out is COMPULSORY recording of\nAADHAR card details .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Companies can list\n\u201cnominee\u201d shareholders or board members with no visible relation to the actual\nowner\u2014for instance, a lawyer or a distant relative, or people that can be hired\nspecifically to allow their names to fill in the blanks on these forms. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They can also list\nother anonymous companies or trusts in order to make it more difficult to track\ndown the actual owner. The true owners or people in control of the company are\noften known to no one in the outside world other than\u2014possibly\u2014a law firm or\nincorporation agent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AGAIN , DEMONETIZATION\nWITHOUT BANNING SHELL COMPANIES IS A FUTILE EXERCISE .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>NO PAIN NO GAIN<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HERE WE WENT THOUGH\nHAJAAR PAIN WITHOUT ANY GAIN<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I FELT THE PAIN.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I COULD HAVE EASILY\nCASHED A CHEQUE ( LIKE EVERY OTHER RICH MAN ) AND SAT QUIET. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I DID\nNOT DO THAT.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;I WENT THE ATM WAY.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Shell corporations are\ncompanies that serve no economic purpose and don\u2019t conduct any real\nbusiness.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">If so\u2014why do we allow\nshell companies ?</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where is the logic ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rather, they exist\nprimarily to hold legal title to bank accounts, real estate, or other assets,\noften obscuring the true human owners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every year, over two\nmillion corporations, LLCs, and other business entities are formed in the\nUnited States. Thanks to the JEW controlled SHADOW GOVT which runs USA almost\nevery state collects less information from the individuals forming these\nentities than from people applying for a driver\u2019s license or registering to\nvote.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anonymous shell companies can open a bank account or buy a yacht. They\ncan wire money and transact business like any other company, making them an\nattractive method for hiding, moving, and using money or other assets.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a\nresult, anonymous shell companies are often misused for illegal activities, including\nlaundering money from the trafficking of drugs, weapons, or human beings,\nfinancing terrorist activities, skirting sanctions, hiding the proceeds of\ngovernment corruption, and evading taxes..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminals often create webs of\nnested anonymous corporations (with one owning another and so on), rendering it\npractically impossible for law enforcement officials to figure out who is\ndirecting the companies\u2019 activities\u2014i.e., the identity of the real criminal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such companies are also\nused to subvert civil and judicial processes through making anonymous donations\nto election campaigns, defrauding immigration and customs authorities, hiding\nassets from courts, or fraudulently pursuing government contracts, grants, or\nMedicare reimbursements.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Incorporation\nTransparency and Law Enforcement Assistance Act &nbsp;was created to fight the use of anonymous\nAmerican shell companies by requiring states to collect information about the\n\u201cbeneficial owner(s)\u201d of a corporation or LLC. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Incorporation\nTransparency and Law Enforcement Assistance Act would direct states to require\napplicants forming corporations and limited liability companies to include\nbasic information about the actual human beings who own the companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This information will\nbe readily available to law enforcement, allowing officials to track illicit\nfunds and activities much more efficiently and effectively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s another reason\nthe United States has become so popular for shell corporations.&nbsp; Currently, none of the fifty states requires\nthe disclosure of the \u201cbeneficial owners,\u201d the real human beings who own the\ncompanies.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead, corporate records\ncan identify the \u201cowner\u201d as another faceless corporation or a professional\nagent paid to sign the needed forms and never speak of them again.&nbsp; Behind this easy-to-establish veil of\nsecrecy, criminals can\u2014and do\u2014use these corporations to open bank accounts,\ntransfer funds, and even to hide the ownership of expensive assets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Mexican drug cartel\nusing an Oklahoma corporation to launder money through a horse farm; a crime\nsyndicate setting up a web of corporations in eight states as part of a $100\nmillion Medicare fraud scheme; and human traffickers based in Moldova hiding\ntheir crimes behind anonymous corporations in Kansas, Missouri, and Ohio.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Records in Cyprus list\nhim as the firm\u2019s only shareholder. They give his official address in Ukraine\u2019s\ncapital, Kiev \u2013 apartment 39, Hrushevskoho Street.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panama Papers show\nthat Poroshenko used a Cypriot agent to register his new BVI firm.&nbsp; The president supplied a utility bill and a\nreference from the International Investment Bank (IIB) in Kiev. . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">His private assets are larger than those of any other European\nleader, with his fortune put by Bloomberg at about $720m.&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Poroshenko concealed\nthe fact of owning the company CEE Confectionary registered in Cyprus and\nRoshen Europe BV in the Netherlands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In August 2014\nPoroshenko established a company in the British Virgin Islands through the Panama\ncompany Mossack Fonseca, and he intended to move his businesses there. The\noligarch founded the new company already serving as the president. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This would mean an open\nviolation of the ban on the conduct of business activity by a serving president\nenshrined in Ukraine\u2019s constitution. In addition, Poroshenko falsified his\ndeclaration of assets by not disclosing the fact of having a company registered\nin a tax haven.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"Panama\nPapers\" have&nbsp; revealed the Ukrainian\npresident to be the person legally charged with this web of firms that can be\ntraced back to the British Virgin Islands. That is also where the company Euro\nBusiness Investments Ltd is registered - a company, which - via Cyprus - is\ncontrolled by the German firm Interstarch GmbH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Legally, the Ukrainian\npresident is required to detail any earnings openly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ISRAEL AND ZIONIST JEWS\nPLACED POROSHENKO ON THE RULERS CHAIR HOPING TO CONVERT UKRAINE TO A SECOND\nJEWISH SUMMER HOMELAND <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN ROTHSCHILD IS\nFINANCIAL CONSULTANT WHAT DOES IT MEAN ?&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Evelyn Rothschild\nis currently the personal financial advisor of Queen Elizabeth II, and she\nknighted him</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRITISH JOURNALISTS\nNEVER TALK ABOUT THE SHELL COMPANIES OPERATED BY THE ROYALTY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3830768938846261322\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SHIVA AND HIS WIFE SHAKTI ( PARVATI / KALI /\nDURGA/ DEVI / BHAGAWATI ) ARE IN THE SECOND ( DVAITA ) AND THIRD ( SANKHYA ) TEMPLATES OF\nSANATANA DHARMA<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SHIVA SHAKTI MERGE </b>IS &nbsp;SYMBOLIZED BY THE SIX POINTED STAR ( STOLEN\nBY JEWS )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yRwAdLPVyz8/WK8P46wmGoI/AAAAAAABRJY/Ad_G1yWcwG0wtr2DmJYhWrrz420xGOyWACLcB/s1600/shiva_anEEd_shakti_cosmic_union.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SINCE ADI SHANKARACHARYA OF 2000 BC ( THE\nLAST MAHARISHI ) &nbsp;, NOBODY HAS UNDERSTOOD\nHINDUISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
