THE INSTANT THIS FEEDBACK STOPS THERE WILL BE PRALAYA. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSOULS GIVE FEED BACK TO BRAHMAN ABOUT THEIR EXPERIENCES ON\nEARTH--BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNON-MOKSHA EVOLVING SOULS AREPARKED IN ONE OF THE SIX LOWER\nASTAL LAYERS , AWAITING RE-INDUCTION .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONCE YOU BECOME A HUMAN AND YOUR SOUL IS PARKED IN ASTRAL\nLAYERS TWO TO SIX\u2014YOU WILL NOT BE RE-INDUCTED AS A LOWER FORM OF LIFE LIKE\nANIMAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST\nFREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING\nSPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE\nPHYSICAL BODY ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB\nMOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN\nASTRAL LAYERS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA USHERS IN --<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS\nTHAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE DOG REPRESENTED DHARMA ( YAMA ) \u2014 YUDHISHTRA WAS \u201cSON OF\nDHARMA \u201c..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN )\nYUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS\nLIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 )\nDECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL\nHAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA\n.. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES--\nHE DID IT AND HOW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX\nWITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5\nPANDAVAS TOO..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER READING THE MAHABHARATA EPIC -- ALL WONDERED WHY\nKRISHNA PLAYED FOUL--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIF YOU REALLY LOOK AT IT DISPASSIONATELY -- HE GAVE ALL 100\nTEST TUBE BABIES MOKSHA-- THE ULTIMATE GIFT FROM VISHNUs AVATAR ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT\u2014 BRAHMAN DOES NOT ALLOW\nSTAGNATION.. IN SANATANA DHARMA THERE ARE NO CIRCLES\u2014ONLY SPIRALS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH\n--THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE\nDECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST\nASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS\n\"PURGATORY\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR\nANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES -- IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF\n\"GRATITUDE\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE LAWS OF KARMA THAT COMPELS HINDUS TO BEHAVE\nRIGHTEOUSLY AS PER THE UNIVERSAL MORAL ORDER OR LAWS OF DHARMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE HINDU KNOWS THAT KARMA IS IN HIS OWN HANDS .. THIS IS\nWHY A HINDU IS THE SAME OUTSIDE DOORS AND WITHIN DOORS.. A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT\nNEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE RASCAL SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TOLD ON NDTV THAT MEN CAN\nHAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.. MODI GAVE THIS FAKE GURU A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:47 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE OTHER FAKE GURU AND RASCAL SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TOLD ON\nNDTV THAT SANATANA DHARMA ALOWS HOMOSEXUALITY . HAVE YOU HEARD THE VOICE OF\nTHIS PATHETIC FELLOW-- HAVE YOU SEEN HIS FINGERS ? MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI\nSRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/FyOVMqAIFw8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/FyOVMqAIFw8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anonymous companies are\ngetaway cars for the world\u2019s criminal and corrupt .\nWe must puncture their tyres.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They're the financial and deception vehicle of\nchoice for some of the most corrupt, dangerous and ruthless individuals and\nentities in the world. Arms dealers, drug cartels, corrupt politicians,\nscammers, terrorists and cybercriminals are just a few of the frequent users of\nshells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once created, anonymous\nshell companies do little or no actual business. Instead, they often exist and\nfunction entirely on paper, opening bank accounts and owning assets without\never revealing the name of the true person benefiting from its conduct, whether\nlicit or illicit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BFGj5qD5jDA/WK2nt2RfZZI/AAAAAAABRHM/ULatou9r428ojxYox0ZkmL1ZCYguh6SJgCLcB/s1600/2016088507_IRD002_0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BFGj5qD5jDA/WK2nt2RfZZI/AAAAAAABRHM/ULatou9r428ojxYox0ZkmL1ZCYguh6SJgCLcB/s640/2016088507_IRD002_0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anonymous Companies\nBeneficial owner is the technical term for the real people who ultimately own\nor control a company, even if there are layers of companies in between that\n\u201cown\u201d the next company down the chain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although the secrecy\nthat phantom firms provide often invokes images of small, far-away island\nhavens, you can easily create one in almost every jurisdiction in the\nworld.&nbsp; A study found that US was the 2nd\neasiest place in the world for criminals to incorporate an anonymous shell\ncompany for clearly illegal activities, behind only Kenya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All companies should be\nrequired to disclose their ultimate, human, beneficial owner(s) when they are\ncreated, and this information should be listed in a central registry. Ideally,\nthese registries should be freely available to the public, rather than just to\nlaw enforcement so that everyone has the ability to know with whom they are\ndoing business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The UK Government has\npromised to lead the world by establishing the first-ever public registry of\nbeneficial ownership information for all UK companies.&nbsp; The European Parliament voted in March 2014\nin favor of creating a similar registry for all EU companies and trusts,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April of 2014,\nHewlett-Packard agreed to pay more than $100 million in criminal and regulatory\npenalties to the U.S. Department of Justice and Securities and Exchange\nCommission.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hewlett-Packard subsidiaries created a slush fund for bribe\npayments, set up an intricate web of shell companies and bank accounts to\nlaunder money, employed two sets of books to track bribe recipients, and used\nanonymous e-mail accounts and prepaid mobile telephones to arrange covert\nmeetings to hand over bags of cash.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The primary purpose to\nopen a&nbsp; SHELL company is like any other\nbasic fraud scheme: to conceal.&nbsp; Don\u2019t\nget fooled into listening to the legitimate aspects.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This may include the nature, origin, or\ndestination of misappropriated funds and/or concealment of the true owners and\ndecision-makers of a criminal act or conspiracy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One shell company isn't\nenough&nbsp; for BIG FISH \u2014 these fraudsters\nneed a network. Dozens of shells, nominee directors, addresses and fake\nshareholders might be required to conceal a scheme or criminal plot.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big-time\ncriminal conspirators will utilize shell incorporators to do the heavy lifting\nand help create a corporate web of disguise that can perplex and confuse the\nbest of investigators. Shells can come in different shapes and sizes, and the\njurisdiction in which they reside can help further the concealment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a small sum of\nmoney, time and patience, fraudsters can set up a very elaborate web of shell\ncompanies in little time.&nbsp;&nbsp; But\nestablishing the company name is only the first step in creating a shell\nnetwork of deception. The company needs nominee directors and shareholders \u2014 mostly\nillegitimate \u2014 to further the concealment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\">What is SUHEL SETH up\nto ?</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.telegraphindia.com/1030717/asp/nation/story_2172315.asp\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.telegraphindia.com/1030717/asp/nation/story_2172315.asp</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What\u2019s wrong with\nAmerica is what\u2019s wrong with Big Pharma. And what\u2019s wrong with Big Pharma is\nwhat\u2019s wrong with America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the story of Big Pharma\nis the exact same story of how Big Government, Big Oil, Big Agri-Chem Giants\nlike Monsanto have come to power. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The controlling\nshareholders of all these major industries are one and the same. What would\nhappen to you?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\u2019d probably wind up\nrotting in prison, the subject of an FBI investigation and a DoJ prosecution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So why is it okay for a\nmulti-billion-dollar corporation to carry out these same crimes and get away\nwith it? Why are the CEOs of top drug companies given a free pass to commit felony\ncrimes and endless fraud?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\u2019ll tell you why, and\nyou\u2019re not gonna like the answer: Because America has become a nation run by\ncrooks for the benefit of crooks.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK DONALD TRUMP TO\nSET THIS RIGHT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraudsters use nominee\ndirectors, and in some instances, other shell companies, to disguise true\nowners of entities while giving the appearance of legitimacy. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Some nominees simply sell their names to\nfraudsters who use them on company documents. Others actually provide limited\nservices for the shell companies such as processing corporate records, signing\nfor company documents and forwarding mail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Numerous organizations\nhave been working to uncover the network of nominee directors. The U.K.\nGuardian newspaper, with the assistance of other international investigative\nand anti-corruption organizations, has identified that a mere 28 nominee\ndirectors have set up and/or are in control of more than 21,000 companies \u2014\nmany of which have been identified as being involved with criminal\norganizations/individuals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A simple Internet\nsearch of some of these nominee directors easily links their association with\nfrauds such as the United Nations Oil for Food Program.&nbsp; &nbsp;More\nthan 2,400 businesses, including scores of international shell companies and\nmajor blue-chip European firms such as Siemens and Daimler Chrysler, paid nearly\n$1.8 billion in illegal kickbacks to the former Iraqi government through the\nU.N. oil-for-food program<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then only son of former\nU.N. head Kofi Annan courted controversy in 1998, when a firm of his won a big\ncontract under the U.N.\u2019s Oil-for-Food humanitarian program in Iraq. Internal\nMossack Fonseca documents show Koji Annan has held several offshore shell\ncompanies, using one to purchase a half-million-dollar apartment in central\nLondon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/nobel-prize-amartya-sen-kofi-annan-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/nobel-prize-amartya-sen-kofi-annan-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WzJTG5N2C5U/WK3sYDd5nsI/AAAAAAABRHg/guV-cBrEIy4yYKEg4qj0nNt14amBe7o_QCLcB/s1600/17972.mSyfriendarun2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WzJTG5N2C5U/WK3sYDd5nsI/AAAAAAABRHg/guV-cBrEIy4yYKEg4qj0nNt14amBe7o_QCLcB/s640/17972.mSyfriendarun2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM SURE SUHEL SETH\nCAN TELL HIS DEAR FRIEND ARUN ( JAITLEY, FINANCE MINISTER ) ABOUT CALCUTTA\nSHELL COMPANIES.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER\nALL HE IS DIRECTOR OF HAJAAR COMPANIES. &nbsp;&nbsp;..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost, 90 per cent of\nshell companies are in Kolkata.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">POOR JAITLEY, HE IS IN\nTHE DARK \u2013JUST LIKE A MUSHROOM --TOBA TOBA !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are more than &nbsp;150,000 shell companies in Calcutta , with\nnearly 6,000 CAs &nbsp;( most of them with\nFAKE degrees ) involved. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">More than that 1,410 SHELL\ncompanies are registered in different blocks of the 9/12 Lal Bazar Street area\nwith 84 of them based in Room No. 10 in one block.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If one needs to convert\nRs 1 crore capital from \u2018black\u2019 (hidden) to \u2018white\u2019, the original owner of the\nmoney will give Rs 100,000 to an entry operator, who\u2019d divide the sum into\n10,000 shares of Rs 10 each.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SvzI0fB0rBM/WK3wf5HF9MI/AAAAAAABRH0/Jk59QnnEAUgTHc9l9T-hzIbABmsGKMhHwCLcB/s1600/whiteee-to-black-and-back-again.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SvzI0fB0rBM/WK3wf5HF9MI/AAAAAAABRH0/Jk59QnnEAUgTHc9l9T-hzIbABmsGKMhHwCLcB/s1600/whiteee-to-black-and-back-again.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each of the shares\nwould then be sold at an exorbitant premium of around Rs 1,000 to directors of\nshell companies. This would instantly increase the value of the company from Rs\n100,000 to Rs 1 crore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through a network of\nfake companies, the money then moves to the original owner. The entry operator\ncharges a fee. Often, the \u2018directors\u2019 of these companies are daily-wage earners\nlike tea sellers or office guards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The more the capital,\nthe higher the cost of registration for opening such a company. Thus, opening\none with Rs 1 lakh capital would require much less of registration fee than\nopening one with a capital of Rs 1 crore.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ULnGLywMC-g/WK3wy7PGbNI/AAAAAAABRH4/aGTqoKKDnqQsbn5mlGVusfh4avqYfw4CwCLcB/s1600/steps-in-money-ddtransfer.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ULnGLywMC-g/WK3wy7PGbNI/AAAAAAABRH4/aGTqoKKDnqQsbn5mlGVusfh4avqYfw4CwCLcB/s640/steps-in-money-ddtransfer.jpg\" width=\"542\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kolkata, there is a\ncommunity of chartered accountants (CAs), and it is easy to find \u2018directors\u2019,\nwho for Rs 5,000 will sign anywhere. &nbsp;&nbsp;There\nare brokers and entry operators; they run many companies from a single premise\nand a laptop<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcutta advertising\nagency, D.J. Keymer was owned by Jew Rothschild\u2014which would soon become Ogilvy\nand Mather.&nbsp; Jew Rothschild\u2019s AD agency\nin London was run in 1850 by Edmund Mather<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wPBZiZytKEI/WK3zbLsIrmI/AAAAAAABRII/S5AG-1IMJicsCFToXTUDYSbxGKPijPAwgCLcB/s1600/559848kk09.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wPBZiZytKEI/WK3zbLsIrmI/AAAAAAABRII/S5AG-1IMJicsCFToXTUDYSbxGKPijPAwgCLcB/s640/559848kk09.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Pawan Kumar Ruia &nbsp;allegedly&nbsp;</span>floated several &nbsp;SHELL companies in Calcutta , to meet the\ndemand of those beneficiaries who wanted to buy some readymade companies. These\ncompanies were sold to different beneficiaries as commodity for a lump sum\namount..&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMergers acquisitions, and making secret payments to Swiss accounts are\na routine in India. This essentially helps promoters sidestep the Sebi and tax\nauthorities in India</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/cid-gets-pawan-kumar-ruias-custody-for-two-days/articleshow/56412567.cms\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/cid-gets-pawan-kumar-ruias-custody-for-two-days/articleshow/56412567.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main purpose of\nusing a shell is concealment. So, tracing and tracking shell companies to their\nowners isn't easy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One extremely useful\ntool, archive.org, takes snapshots of most websites on the Internet. Even if\nthe website has changed or is no longer being hosted, you may find useful\navailable historical information. These snapshots may help verify known\ninformation or point you in a new direction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIAN BANK MANAGERS\nWORKING FOR FOREIGN BANKS HAVE BLED THE WATAN.&nbsp;\nTHE FOREIGN BANKS SAY, WE WILL PUNISH THEM BY SUSPENSION.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IS THIS THE PROCEDURE\n?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DO THESE BANK MANAGERS\nWITH ILL GOTTEN BRIBES REALLY CARE FOR SUSPENSION ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARE WE NOT SUPPOSED TO\nTHROW THESE DESH DROHI BANK MANAGERS IN JAIL ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In &nbsp;May 2016, internal investigators of a leading\npublic sector bank uncovered a fraud, where the govt and banks were cheated by\nseveral crores of rupees using a maze of 24 ghost companies operating from a\nsingle branch of the bank in Delhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Traditionally, shell\ncompanies in India have been used for rotation and siphoning off of funds by\nthe promoters through fictitious sales, inflated purchases, unjust commissions\nor for creation of equity for ultimate owners who are shielded by cloaks of\ndeceit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modus operandi is\nsimple. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The perpetrator floats\na number of companies usually with the same registered address and with\ndirectors who despite being \u2018real persons\u2019 are untraceable or completely unrelated,\nor illiterate angoota chaap cooks, and driver and peons who are given\nbaksheesh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dummy directors are\nused for anonymity or deniability, who pre-sign cheques and documents and hand\nover to the principals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bank managers ignoring\nKYC norms and due diligence are in cahoots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These bank mangers &nbsp;know that such fraud will NOT be red flagged\nby the bank software as they keep it just below the trigger threshold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u2018seed\u2019 receipt is\nintroduced as capital in the bank account of one shell company with the\nknowledge of bank officials; this money is rotated through bank accounts of a\nset of shell companies\u2014all transactions being completed the same day in the\nsame branch of the bank. Thus, each company shows identical sums as capital and\ninstantly lends or invests in another company. The exercise is repeated several\ntimes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As banks need to\nbalance their books only at the end of the day, colluding bankers ensure that\nthe money rotates through 5-10 accounts in a day, i.e. the money multiplies 10\ntimes in a day, not backed by real transactions, but the daily credit and debit\nbalances in each account falsely display robust business activity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very much like\nthe Panchatantra tale in which a fox shows one crocodile 10 times to its mother\nto convince her that there are 10 of them!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ANCIENT INDIAN KINGS\nWERE BRIMMING WITH WISDOM \u2013THEY COULD NOT BE CHEATED .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>A SUPERIOR MENTORING SYSTEM\nOF PANCHATANTRA STORIES FORMED THE BACKBONE OF THEIR EDUCATION.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THE PRINCES WERE NOT\nGIVEN ANSWERS . THEY HAD TO FIND THE ANSWERS.</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What happens to the\ncapital when it is created?&nbsp; It is\npledged for bank loans, or these shares are valued excessively by conniving\nvaluers and then merged with listed companies which are dormant.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once merger fructifies, the fictitious\ninvestment gets converted into real shares at high prices, and more\nimportantly, gets liquid in a stock exchange.&nbsp;\nThe Supreme Court-appointed SIT noted in its report that investment in\nthe secondary share markets to manipulate stocks and create non-taxable capital\ngains is becoming popular.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the\ncollusion of promoters, some brokers arrange purchase or financing of scrips at\nnominal costs, and then manipulate their sales at exorbitant prices to create\nlong-term \u2018capital gains\u2019 which attract nil or nominal tax.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In case of a fraud\ninvolving foreign exchange, large remittances are sent overseas towards\nfictional imports of stocks and machinery, advances, commissions, etc. Later,\nmoney is moved from such overseas accounts into another set of shell companies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Often, such money comes back through another bank account as receipts from\nexports or payments for share capital in listed and unlisted companies (called\nround tripping).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SIT observed that\ninvestments from Cayman Islands, a tax haven, alone amount to R85,000 crore in\nIndia, highlighting the role of tax havens in money laundering. In either case,\nthe perpetrators avail import credits from the government, like duty drawback\non imports and export benefits.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Otherwise, these shells hold properties or land\non behalf of the real owners or hold payments for fictitious sale of goods or\nservices in India till the money gets \u2018bleached white\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another route of\nintroducing black money into the banking system is by showing large income from\nagriculture, processing and milling of agriculture products and scarp sales,\nall outside the radar of tax nets.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are examples of tiny companies with\nvery small landholdings showing agricultural income in tens of crores of\nrupees. It is not an exaggeration to say that the output of such land would be\nmany times over the total output of the district or the total annual sales in\nthe local mandi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE GOVT MUST GIVE TAX\nBENEFITS ONLY TO FARMERS WHO PRODUCE FOOD\u2014NOT FILTHY RICH PSEUDO FARMERS WHO\nSIT ON THEIR ASSES AND CREATE INEDIBLE CASH CROPS. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">YOU WILL FIND THAT THESE\nCASH CROP PSEUDO FARMERS &nbsp;DO NOT OWN\nTHESE GRABBED LANDS.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">COMMUNISM AND NAXALISM\nIN INDIA WAS ALL ABOUT LAND GRABBING AND BURNING LAND REGISTRY OFFICES .</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; THE TWO ASURAS WHO DRANK A FEW DROPS OF AMRIT ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES -- NOT MORTAL THIEVES.<br />\n<br />\nBefore the amrit went down them mangy throats Sun god Surya and moon god Chandra shouted to Mohini , to use the Surarshan chakra, the scalar vortex and cut off their heads, which she did in one shot.<br />\n<br />\nRahu and Ketu are the North and South Lunar nodes causing the sun and moon eclipses.Sage Varahamihira in Brihat Samhita ( 2660 BC ) devoted one chapter to Rahu and Ketu and considered them not any celestial physical body like other planets but as the nodes of the Moon, ie, points of intersection of orbits of the Moon and the Earth.<br />\n<br />\nThe north point of this intersection is called Rahu (north node) while the south point of that is called Ketu (south node)...In Surya Siddhanta written 5500 years ago, they are considered as nodal points which are now known as Chaya Griha ( shadowy planets).<br />\n<br />\nSince then, Rahu and Ketu were deprived of the amrit by Sun and Moon sneaking , they developed bitter enmity against the Sun and the Moon.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points of the Moon what we call Rahu and Ketu are, clubs of magnetic and gravitational forces of two celestial bodies, the Moon and the Earth and hence are very influential on the life of mankind.<br />\n<br />\nThese points affect our central nervous system as well as sympathetic and para-sympathetic nervous systems which work on the principles of electro-magnetic systems.<br />\n<br />\nThey have direct impacts on the generation of signals of informations in neurons and neuro-transmitters and their movement from brain to various parts of our body and back to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points (Rahu and Ketu) are psycho-somatic which govern not only the stress level of our mind but also the activities of hormones, blood circulation and function of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild used his FAKE KaliDASA to inject poison into Rahu and Ketu in his FAKE work Uttar Kalamrita .<br />\n<br />\nNorth node Rahu is like gravity- pulling us toward something whether we really want to or not, whether we have agency over this desire or not. The South Node Ketu is like anti-matter in a natal chart.<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE AND ALMOST ALL ANCIENT FAMILIES IN KERALA CONSULT THE RAHU KALAM CHART BEFORE WE DO SOMETHING CRITICAL.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENAMI MEDIA AND THEIR RATIONALIST STOOGES WERE RIDICULING OUR ISRO CHAIRMAN FOR PRESSING A BUTTON TAKING CARE OF RAHU KALAM AND FOR PRAYING AT A TEMPLE- BEFORE SENDING OUR ROCKET TO MARS .<br />\n<br />\nIF THE US PRESIDENT PRAYS IN A CHURCH, WWWOOOOH IT IS A DAMN GOOD THING RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS RUNNING AROUND NAKED DOING GRUNT GRUNT, WE ALREADY HAD OUR ASTRONOMICAL ALMANACS FOR SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS.<br />\n<br />\nThe Moon (Chandra) completes its orbit round the earth in about a month crossing the orbit of earth twice in the same period, once when it goes from south to north and at another time while travelling from north to south.<br />\n<br />\nThe ascending point is called \"Rahu\" and descending point - \"Ketu\". These have retrograde motion in the zodiac at the rate of 19\u00b020' per year.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_34MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_34B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_35B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6111368532795483766\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_35M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. This relationship plays an important part in the enfolding of individual consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThe eclipses occur in the vicinity of Rahu Ketu during the Full Moon and the New Moon. (During New Moon when it is +/- 18 degrees from Rahu Ketu, the Solar eclipse takes place. At the full Moon +/- 11 degrees 15' from the nodal position, the Lunar eclipse takes place.)<br />\n<br />\nAs they symbolically eclipse the Sun (consciousness) and the Moon (the Mind), they have a great part to play in darkening our perspective in order to bring in new light. They deal with the concept of death and re-birth, transformation and regeneration.<br />\n<br />\nThey have been given the status of planets to emphasise their significance and the importance placed on eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThey have no substance and are physically non-existent. Yet their influence is full of potency and spiritual significance.<br />\n<br />\nThey work in unison 180 degrees apart, two opposite points in the zodiac with a mission to churn our lives in order to externalise hidden potential and wisdom. In keeping with their shadowy nature, they work on a psychological level.<br />\n<br />\nIt is always difficult to gauge their effect because their main concern is with our emotional makeup. They effect us internally. We are unaware of what exactly is happening to us at the time..<br />\n<br />\nKetu deals with the past Karma and Rahu with the future.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Rahu and Ketu have the ability to keep our mind focused on human instincts- Rahu by exaggerating and Ketu by obscuring or blocking.<br />\n<br />\nRahu Ketu deals with the inner fight within us, the moral and the social choices we have to constantly make and the inner dilemmas.<br />\n<br />\nRahu takes people off their Dharmic past path to tempt them on the road of self destruction. Ketu is considered the keeper of the book of our life- past and present Karmas.<br />\n<br />\nWhen all the planets are hemmed between Rahu and Ketu (i.e., the moon's north node and the moon's south node), Kaalsarpa YOGAM ( not dosham ) is formed.<br />\n<br />\nKalasarpa yogam is a karmic dosha that may run across the generations\u2014bad luck galore<br />\n<br />\nOur gods are all cosmic allegories\u2014personalised in puranas for the common man, who had NO access to the Vedas<br />\n<br />\nThis is why we have DEVAS and ASURAS \u2013 CURSES and BOONS \u2013 all over our puranas .<br />\n<br />\nYET PM AND PRESIDENT RUN TO THOUGH THE FEET OF THIS EVIL DROHI SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR.<br />\n<br />\nIF THEY DO THAT JEW ROTHSCHILD WILL BE VERY HAPPY<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://www.firstpost.com/fwire/homosexuality-not-a-crime-in-hinduism-says-sri-sri-ravi-shankar-1283843.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSORRY-- ROTHSCHILD CANNOT CREATE THEIR LEGACY--THEIR LEGACY WILL BE WRITTEN BY A BLOGGER NAMED VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\nSI SRI RAVISHANKA WHO HAS A GARGANTUAN THONDH DOES NOT EVEN UNDERSTAND THE YOGA OF BREATHING .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/hyperventilation-followed-by-valsalva.html</span><br />\n<br />\nALL THOSE WHO THINK OUR ROGUE GURUS HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL OF UNDERSTANDING SANATANA DHARMA--RAISE YOU HANDS --NOW<br />\n<br />\nGOOD !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedTxdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedTxdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; In BREAKING\nBAD they used a car wash.. &nbsp;The launderer\nthen deposits the money with the shell company, which deposits it into its\naccounts. The company then creates fake invoices and receipts to account for\nthe cash.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such transactions create the appearance of propriety and clean money.\nThe shell company can then make withdrawals and either return the money to the\ninitial criminal or pass the money on to further shell companies before\nreturning it to further cloud who first deposited the money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the U.S.\ngovernment has no authority to require foreign banks to report the interest\nearned by U.S. citizens with foreign bank accounts, the criminal can keep the\naccount abroad, fail to report the account\u2019s existence, and receive the interest\nwithout paying personal income taxes on it in the U.S.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To combat this criminal\nactivity, US Congress passed the Bank Secrecy Act of 1970, which requires banks\nto report any financial transactions of $10,000 or more.&nbsp;&nbsp; US Congress followed up this Act sixteen\nyears later with the Money Laundering Control Act of 1986, which rendered money\nlaundering a federal crime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>IN INDIA THERE MUST BE\nNO NEED TO PROVE THAT THE SHELL COMPANY DID SOMETHING ILLEGAL &nbsp;\u2013&nbsp; WE WONT COPY THE WHITE NATIONS MODEL ( RUN BY\nCRIMINAL JEWS )</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">JUST OWNING A SHELL\nCOMPANY IN INDIA MUST BE MADE A SERIOUS CRIME\u2014FREEZING ASSETS AND IMPRISONMENT.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">MODI MUST SET OF SPECIAL CELLS TO MAP EVERY\nSQUARE METRE OF LAND IN INDIA USING GOOGLE EARTH \u2013OR BETTER OUR OWN SATELLITES.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;MOST OF THE LAND IN INDIA HAS BEEN GRABBED ..\nTHE PEOPLE OCCUPYING THE LAND DO NOT HAVE ADI AADHARAM ( ROOT LAND DEED\nDOCUMENTS )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">USE XRAY MACHINES IN BANK LOCKERS ( VIDEO CAM\nMUST BEUSED )&nbsp; TO GUAGE IF ANYBODY IS\nHIDING GOLD BARS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">PEOPLE ARE HIDING GOLD INSIDE LOCKERS OF GYMS\nAND SCHOOLS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">A few millimeters of metal isn\u2019t necessary\nenough to block X-rays : you can see the truck's engine, bananas , as well as the illegal\nMexican immigrants in the back ...</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ALL BANK LOCKER DOORS MUST HAVE GOLD DETECTING XRAY PORTS ( with govt seal ) &nbsp;IN FUTURE&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vGDbJmTkckI/WK6jhDARx4I/AAAAAAABRIc/f53pt1Ew_SUApICkqeJoHOvQgOdZ3jasQCLcB/s1600/T980483-Illegawwl_immigrants_inside_a_lorry%252C_X-ray-SPLb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"348\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vGDbJmTkckI/WK6jhDARx4I/AAAAAAABRIc/f53pt1Ew_SUApICkqeJoHOvQgOdZ3jasQCLcB/s640/T980483-Illegawwl_immigrants_inside_a_lorry%252C_X-ray-SPLb.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Public records are an\nimportant key to help link entities and individuals together. Some public\nrecords sources require paid subscriptions like LexisNexis or CLEAR, while some\nothers provide public records for free, including www.opencorporates.com, ICIJ\nDatabase, the Panama Free Search Database, and CompanyCheck for the U.K.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As you uncover\ninformation, you should continue tracing the shell to all known associates to\nhelp uncover and map the network. Continue to chase down and cross-reference\nall leads, contacts and sources to get the complete picture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most important task\nfor tracing and tracking shell companies and contacts is to be able to document\nthe linkage between all the information uncovered.&nbsp; The amount of leads, dead ends and\ninformation can be overwhelming; a single piece of important information could\ngo unnoticed or unlinked.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most investigators\ncan't afford expensive mapping technologies.&nbsp;\nThe next best option is a free online mapping and relationship tool,\nwww.draw.io, which investigators can use to create easy relationship diagrams\nfor presentations and reports and keep track of inter-related connections.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Map every piece of\ninformation \u2014 no matter how small. An address or phone number could be the key\nto uncovering the shell network. Search online for various combinations of\nphone numbers and addresses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell incorporators\nmight have been vigilant in concealing public records' information on involved\nentities, but they may have been careless when setting up the corresponding\nwebsite addresses. Using \"Whois lookup\" search engines, you can\ndiscover:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Domain ownership<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IP addresses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Physical addresses of\nwebsites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Website administrators\nand their contact information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Website creation dates.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hundreds of Whois\nwebsites are available. One site, whoisology.com, provides linkage analytics by\nlinking all websites in its database based on characteristics, names and\nfields. Want to know how many websites are located at the shell incorporation\nhot spot address of \"103 Sham Peng Tong Plaza?\"&nbsp;&nbsp; As of April 2014, Whoisology reports that\nthere are more than 900.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell incorporators\nhave a hard time faking an active and robust online presence because these\ncompanies technically don't exist.&nbsp;&nbsp; What\nconstitutes a robust online presence?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
