Therefore, do not indicate that you are someone\nother than the person associated with the number identified.&nbsp; The manner in which a call is answered must\nbe consistent with the anticipated business size.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Internet search engines\nlike Google Maps: Online maps can determine what physical structure is located\nat the known address and whether the address is consistent with the entity\nstructure. Often, the created entity scheme will use the address of a personal\nresidence. Remember that many small businesses operate from the owner's\npersonal residence, so, in this case, reference checking may be preferred in\norder to reveal that the entity does not conduct business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Site visit: By visiting\nthe site, it can be determined what physical structure is located at the known\naddress and whether the address is consistent with the entity structure.\nPrivate detectives often will perform the procedure for a nominal charge, so\nthe use of one may be useful for verifying entities that are not located in\nyour geographic area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Public records: Records\ncan determine whether a governmental agency or business recognizes the entity\nas a real entity, and that the address is recognized by other entities. A legal\ninstrument filed by banks securing a loan indicates that the bank believes the\nentity is real. The loan instrument may provide clues that link to the\nperpetrator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In many parts of the\nworld, corporations will have a VAT number which can be confirmed with a\ngovernment ministry and provider a source of intelligence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Internet has\nextensive databases and search engines to gather information. At the simplest\nlevel, Google is an excellent starting point. At the advanced level, there are\nresearch companies that have made an art on how to navigate Internet data and\nother sources.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bottom line is to\ndetermine if the known physical location of the business is consistent with the\nbusiness on the vendor invoice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proof of insurance:\nReal companies tend to have insurance. The fraud testing procedure would\nconsist of a request of the certificate of insurance. Fortunately, such a\nrequest is a normal control procedure in many companies, but for fraud audit\npurposes, the need is to examine the certificate to take note the date of\ncoverage and types of coverage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Employees: A company\ntelephone directory provides evidence that the company has employees. By\ncalling the company, you are often referred to the company telephone directory\nwhen you do not know an employee's extension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Public records: A\npublic record filed by a bank or a financing company can indicate a lien has\nbeen filed against the described asset. It also indicates that the bank\nrecognizes the entity as a real one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shipping documents:\nDocuments such as, a billing of lading indicates the source of the shipment,\ntherefore providing verification.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vendor invoices:&nbsp; What software produced the document? Was it\nexcel or consistent with a known database accounting software. Is the product\ndescription consistent with industry standards<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Websites:&nbsp; If a company has a web site, does such a site\nprovide matching information about the businesses and services offered?&nbsp; An examination of a website determined that the\ngoods purchased from the company were not consistent with the website revealing\na real company involved in a pass-through scheme with an internal employee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The business capacity\ntest is the most important analysis. The determination is simple: does the\ncompany listed on the invoice have the capacity to provide the goods or\nservices listed on the invoice?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Professional\nassociations: Is the entity recognized by a trade association? Such\norganizations can also provide useful information on trade practice and trends,\nwhich in turn can be used to corroborate representations made by individuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Competitors: Contact\ncompetitors to establish that the entity conducts business consistent with the\ngoods and services described on the invoice. Competitors may also provide other\ninformation regarding ownership and business conflicts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Information published\nregarding the entity may provide names, services and legal actions regarding\nthe entity. Advertisements by the entity would suggest the existence of the\nentity and describe the type of services provided by the entity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ask --is the business\nknown by the industry ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The legal, physical,\nbusiness capacity, and reference checking provides a sound methodology for\nidentifying shell corporations.&nbsp; The\nprocess is not one-dimensional, but rather a process of collecting and\nanalyzing information that correlates to the fraud scenario.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The identification of red flags in both the\nentity structure and the transactional data provides the auditor with\nsufficient circumstantial evidence to recommend an investigation process\nthrough the legal system</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person may open\nvarious accounts across the United States or overseas and use shell companies\nas a means to shield their true identities. Since states do not require certain\nownership information, it is extremely hard for law enforcement officials to\ntrace the money back to the original creator of the shell entity. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Rothschild\u2019s &nbsp;Nevada-based corporation &nbsp;received 3,744 suspicious wire transfers\ntotaling $81 million over a period of two years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the case was\nnot prosecuted because nobody could ( what else is new ) &nbsp;identify the beneficial owner of the\ncorporation.&nbsp; Shell companies have been\nestablished in the United States by international individuals. However, many\ncases were closed due to the lack of information needed to investigate further.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nevada showed up\nprominently in the Panama Papers, the recent leak of 11 million documents from\nthe law firm Mossack Fonseca (MF), the Panamanian firm that specializes in\nshell corporations<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For $174, Robert Harris\nwould set up a company\u2013\u2013licensed and legal in Nevada\u2013\u2013that a person could move\nmoney through without a link to his or her real identity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subsidiary, Mossack\nFonseca backed by Nevada\u2019s strong secrecy laws, offered nearly the same\nservices as Robert Harris\u2014albeit on a much more international scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why incorporate in\nNevada?-- Minimal reporting and disclosing requirements. Stockholders are not\npublic record.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the companies\nthat made its way to Reno, Nevada few blocks from the Harrah\u2019s and Eldorado\ncasinos, &nbsp;was Rothschild Wealth\nManagement &amp; Trust, a firm with a storied history that was looking to move\nafter the crackdown on Swiss banks. It chose Reno.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The offices of Rothschild\nTrust North America LLC aren\u2019t easy to find.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\u2019re on the 12th floor of\nPorsche\u2019s former North American headquarters building, a few blocks from the\ncasinos. (The U.S. attorney\u2019s office is on the sixth floor.) Yet the lobby\ndirectory does not list Rothschild.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead, visitors must go to the 10th\nfloor, the offices of McDonald Carano Wilson LLP, a politically connected law\nfirm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several former high-ranking Nevada state officials work there, as well as\nthe owner of some of Reno\u2019s biggest casinos and numerous registered lobbyists.\nOne of the firm\u2019s tax lobbyists is Robert Armstrong, viewed as the state\u2019s top\ntrusts and estates attorney, and a manager of Rothschild Trust North America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s easy to create an\nLLC, hide money in it or launder cash through it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild has been moving\nthe fortunes of wealthy Jews out of offshore havens such as Bermuda, subject to\nthe new international disclosure requirements, and into Rothschild-run trusts\nin Nevada, which are exempt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No one expects offshore\nhavens to disappear anytime soon. Swiss banks still hold more than 2 trillion\nUSD in assets not reported by account holders in their home countries<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">U.S. is one of the few\nplaces left where advisers are actively promoting accounts that will remain\nsecret from overseas authorities. Offering secrecy to clients is not against\nthe law, but U.S. firms are not permitted to knowingly help overseas customers\nevade foreign taxes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For decades,\nSwitzerland has been the global capital of secret bank accounts. That may be\nchanging. In 2007, UBS Group AG banker Bradley Birkenfeld blew the whistle on\nhis firm helping U.S. clients evade taxes with undeclared accounts offshore.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swiss banks eventually paid a price. More than 80 Swiss banks, including UBS\nand Credit Suisse Group AG, have agreed to pay about $5 billion to the U.S. in\npenalties and fines. Those firms also include Rothschild Bank AG, which last\nJune entered into a nonprosecution agreement with the U.S. Department of\nJustice.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bank admitted helping U.S. clients hide income offshore from the\nInternal Revenue Service and agreed to pay a&nbsp;\nTOKEN&nbsp; $11.5 million penalty and\nshut down nearly 300 accounts belonging to U.S. taxpayers, totaling $794\nmillion in assets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.business-standard.com/article/economy-policy/mauritius-assures-india-about-disallowing-shell-companies-115061901208_1.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.business-standard.com/article/economy-policy/mauritius-assures-india-about-disallowing-shell-companies-115061901208_1.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-82AN-NMdR_o/WLA5A6hjLAI/AAAAAAABRMY/yuvoo-AM9jEZLRO6LuqfCFGtOV4ylZL_wCLcB/s1600/white-to-5TTblack-and-back-again.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-82AN-NMdR_o/WLA5A6hjLAI/AAAAAAABRMY/yuvoo-AM9jEZLRO6LuqfCFGtOV4ylZL_wCLcB/s1600/white-to-5TTblack-and-back-again.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian-born businessman\nVirendra Rastogi's gigantic scam to defraud the world of finance of 750 million\ndollars - much of it still untraced was so audacious it could have come out of\nBollywood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viren Rastogi, the\nbusinessman behind a global metals trading fraud that duped 20 banks -\nincluding West LB, JP Morgan Chase and Dresdner Bank - out of $750m (\u00a3383m),\nhas been jailed for nine and a half years.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rastogi was described by a judge at Southwark crown court as \"the\nreal brains\" behind a network of bogus international metal trades against\nwhich his company RBG Resources, and a sister company, Allied Deals, run by his\nbrother Narendra Rastogi in New York, raised hundreds of millions of dollars in\nloans.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rastogi family, from India, honed their elaborate fraud techniques\nfirst in Dubai and then in New York, before offices were set up in London's\nPiccadilly in 1996. Almost overnight the UK business appeared to be booming,\nwith turnover reaching $1bn and Viren paying himself a salary of \u00a3650,000.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virendra Rastogi ran\nhis racket through a network of 324 non-existent shell companies - but they\nincluded a cowshed in India, a laundrette in New Jersey, US, the home of an\nelderly woman who sold scrapbooks, and flats and shops with only a table and\nchair.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each 'shell trader' had\na headed notepaper and company stamp, through which Rastogi created a paper\ntrail of bogus orders, deliveries and accounts, apparently ordering vast\nquantities of metal through RBG from the US, the United Arab Emirates, Hong\nKong and Singapore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With employees in the\nUS, Hong Kong, Singapore, Dubai, India, France and Italy, the company secured\nhuge loans from creditors in such companies as the German-based West LB and\nGeneral Motors, but averted suspicion by paying them back with even bigger\nborrowings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RBG Resources was a\nBritish public-limited firm based in London that was allegedly involved in a\nserious fraud worth close to \u00a3300 million (US$600 million). RBG Resources made\n$1.1 billion in sales in 2000<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Investigators found\nthat although US and British banks had been conned into lending several billion\ndollars, the \u201ccircular movement of monies\u201d meant that 343.5 million pounds had\nactually disappeared.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much of it was\nlaundered through Dubai and Switzerland, with at least 40 million pounds\nthought to have been sent to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of the money has\nbeen recovered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After fooling the world\nof finance with a sophisticated fraud spanning three continents and six years\nfrom 1996 to 2002, Rastogi's RBG Resources fell under the suspicion of\nBritain's Serious Fraud Office (SFO) because of a simple unintended human\nerror.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2002 a PricewaterhouseCoopers\nauditor in Romania became suspicious when six documents - purporting to be sent\nfrom six different companies all over the world - were all sent from the same\nfax machine in Hong Kong.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But as the dragnet\nclosed in on him a desperate Rastogi ordered workers into his office in\nPiccadilly, central London, for \"file tidying\" weekends, investigators\nsaid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Workers were issued\nwith \u201cpure theatre\u201d scripts to learn in case new auditors called.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When SFO investigators\nfinally burst into his office in 2002, Rastogi was found frantically shredding\ndocuments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rastogi and his family\nwere using \"boiler rooms\" around the world to manufacture a bogus\npaper trail to support their metals trading scam. Unbeknown to the lending\nbanks and auditors, Rastogi was in control of more than 200 supposed trading\ncounterparties at \"brassplate\" addresses in more than 20 different\ncountries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of shipping\nmillions of tonnes of metals around the world, the web of bogus transactions\nsimply churned cash lent from the banks - with a proportion being salted away\nin a maze of offshore trusts in the British Virgin Islands. In the end the towering\nfacade was cracked by a simple mistake.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 2001 eight counterparty\nconfirmation letters were mistakenly faxed from Hong Kong along with some\nroutine paperwork to PricewaterhouseCoopers, RBG's auditors. These\ncounterparties were supposed to be competitors operating in separate parts of\nthe world, yet their signed paperwork had come through from the same far east\nfax number. Within two months PwC had quit as auditors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rastogi protested that\nPwC's claims were \"ill-founded\", suggesting auditors were focusing on\njust \"3% to 4% of the total business\". It was another lie. In May\n2002 police, lawyers and liquidators raided the homes and offices of the Rastogi\nempire in London.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They found Viren stuffing documents into a shredding machine.\nParallel raids took place in the US.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Three\nRastogi-controlled boiler rooms in Dubai, Singapore and Hong Kong were found to\nbe operated by Viren and two more brothers Ravindra and Subash Rastogi. Stamps\nand stationery relating to hundreds of bogus counterparties were discovered at\nthese forgery factories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taking the evidence to\nthe high court in London two years later, Grant Thornton were able to secure a\nsummary judgment against Viren Rastogi, ordering him to repay $360m. So\nincontrovertible was the evidence that the judge refused to hear a defence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viren refused to hand\nover any assets and was declared bankrupt. As a result, it will be the taxpayer\nwho must pick up the bill for Rastogi's defence throughout the seven-month\ntrial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viren's London\nlieutenants, Anand Jain and Gautam Majumdar, were jailed for eight and a half\nyears and seven and a half years respectively. Judge Wadsworth said the three\nhad \"created a very impressive front that fooled banks, the metal\nexchanges in the UK and US, and well-respected accountancy firms\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brothers Ravindra and\nSubash have not been prosecuted.&nbsp; Sheetal\nRastogi, Viren's niece, is also understood to be in India.&nbsp; She allegedly played a major role in the\nLondon fraud but fled the country a month before RBG was raided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, Narendra,\nwho gave evidence at the trial against his brother, has been sentenced in the\nUS to seven years for his role in the fraud. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Narendra baby signed a plea bargain after being told he\notherwise faced a maximum sentence of 865 years in jail--&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>AIYOOOOOOOO.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8661338152873450480\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_41M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering.html?showComment=1487833847597#c8661338152873450480\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 23, 2017 at 12:40 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_41MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">WE THE PEOPLE DEMAND AN INQUIRY INTO WHY THE Z+ SECURITY OF TAMIL NADU CM JAYALALITHAA WAS WITHDRAWN .</span></b><br />\nWHY WAS ONLY ONE WOMAN NAMED SASIKALA ( A MERE SERVANT ) ALLOWED TO CONTROL JAYAs DESTINY IN APOLLO ?<br />\n<br />\nTHE <b><span style=\"color: purple;\">\"MEDICAL COUNCIL CODE\"</span></b> DOES NOT APPLY TO A VVIPs ( IN THE DEATH HIT LIST OF LTTE ) &nbsp;LIKE JAYA<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT MODI TO INITIATE AN INQUIRY AND PUNISH ALL THOSE WHO DERELICTED THEIR DUTY<br />\n<br />\nJAYA HAD THROWN OUT MANNARGUDI MAFIA FROM HER POES GARDEN BUNGLOW AFTER THE INMATES FORGED HER SIGNATURES--ALL KNOW THIS<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><b>WE ALSO WANT TO KNOW WHY IT DEPT OF AIDMK IS THREATENING PEOPLE WHO ASK QUESTIONS&nbsp;</b></b></span></div>\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN PRESDIENTs , PMs, HOME MINISTERs, LAW MINISTERs, HEALTH MINISTERs WEBSITES --ASK FOR AN ACK<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY TAMIL READERS TO CO-OPERATE.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 5, BELOW</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_24.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_24.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-z_qDEU7Adho/WK2m2LuqwOI/AAAAAAABRHE/ICVFf06cIrAN4UPANpWTfQBQkfuPTQdcACLcB/s1600/Photo0141.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-z_qDEU7Adho/WK2m2LuqwOI/AAAAAAABRHE/ICVFf06cIrAN4UPANpWTfQBQkfuPTQdcACLcB/s320/Photo0141.jpg\" width=\"209\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "115", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7674564217973338281/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5283414562126158175", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-02-22T10:41:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-12-13T14:50:21+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTEzMTU2ODIxMjkxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_22.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5283414562126158175", "title": "SHELL COMPANIES for money laundering, tax evasion, hiding kickbacks, layering PART 3 -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_3QhbkKGji8/WK0eSvDDKoI/AAAAAAABREo/32EdqhCmmxwCMCzbsn7U2GQg8-YfKsoCACLcB/s1600/cfcs-onlssine-prep-part-1-introduction-money-laundering-and-compliance-12814-18-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_3QhbkKGji8/WK0eSvDDKoI/AAAAAAABREo/32EdqhCmmxwCMCzbsn7U2GQg8-YfKsoCACLcB/s640/cfcs-onlssine-prep-part-1-introduction-money-laundering-and-compliance-12814-18-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A black money operator\nopens many shell companies to route money before it is invested. This is called\n'layering', and it helps in covering up the money trail.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assets are rarely in\nthe beneficiary's name and money is moved through jurisdictions where Indian\nlaws are not respected.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the years, many such perfectly legal but complex\nfinancial systems have evolved that help convert black money from bribes /\nkickbacks into white.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is surprisingly easy\nand cheap to set up a shell company abroad. &nbsp;It costs as less as $500. &nbsp;Some countries allow companies to be set up\nthrough websites. &nbsp;Most Indians prefer\nlayering services to be rendered through chartered accountants, lawyers and\nprofessional services companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In tax havens,\nprofessional beneficiary services is an organized industry and are bound by the\nlaws of the land. The chances of these firms perpetuating fraud are negligible\nand that explains their popularity.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These companies are\nlegal entities and are bound by professional beneficiary agreements, which act\non clients' instructions and maintain 100 per cent confidentiality.&nbsp; Since the beneficial owner of the trust is a\nforeigner, there is no way to know whose money is being handled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some banks allow\n'numbered accounts', where the account holder is identified by a number rather\nthan his name.&nbsp; Blind shields are created\nthrough trusts in these jurisdictions to protect the identity of the ultimate\nbeneficiary. The trust deed always remains a private document.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many professional\nservices companies advise on converting black money to white.&nbsp; While the money is typically used to buy\nproperty abroad, holidaying, gambling , on \u201cheathcare\u201d ( read as sex with\nbeautiful models and children ) and buying jewellery,&nbsp; they are also routed back to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The return journey of\nblack money typically has a sequence. Money is parked in a trust-friendly\njurisdiction, such as Switzerland, before it is moved to a tax-efficient\ncountry such as Cyprus, where the taxation levels are very low, or have no\ntaxes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is then routed to a\ntax-friendly country like Mauritius, before reaching the final destination in\nIndia.&nbsp; India has a Double Taxation\nAvoidance Treaty (DTAA) with Mauritius. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most sailors know that\ntheir monthly allotments ( salaries sent to home bank ) emanate from shell\ncompanies offshore.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do you mean to say\nbanks in India or finance ministry don\u2019t know all these things. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All are hand in glove.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">If I want I can sent\nseveral of my past employers on a one way ticket to jail.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">They will read this post and shit in their\npants from today onwards.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bastards even\nforged my FLAG OF CONVENIENCE &nbsp;( say\nPanama flag on ship\u2019s stern ) certificates like &nbsp;Certificates of competency, CDC, &nbsp;Specialisation course certificates . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have commanded\nseveral Panama flagged ships though owners may be Japs, European , Americans etc.&nbsp; At one single time sailors hold several Panama\ncertificates of competency made by different Ship Manning agencies in Mumbai . &nbsp;These are given on the basis of National flag\ncertificates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is impossible\nunless it is forged. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forgery is done in\nIndia , Phillipines etc . And the best part is that these bastard companied\ncharged the sailors for these forged certificate ( usually comes to 500- &nbsp;800 US dollar ) and at the same time charged\nthe owners in Japan, Europe etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the\nshipmanagement companies in Mumbai sent forged account of wages to the owners.\nThey would pay sailors a pittance and double the wages ( on paper ) &nbsp;, forge their signatures and send it to the\nowners .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everybody knows these things. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even ITF knew this .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen forged\nIndians CDCs&nbsp; with govt of India&nbsp; ashoka chakra stamps. &nbsp;If I wish I can send all these Indian motherfuckers\nto jail. Probably one day I will dedicate a special post about these criminal bastards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flag of convenience\n(FOC) is a foul but accepted business practice whereby a merchant ship is\nregistered in a country other than that of the ship's owners, and the ship\nflies that country's civil ensign.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Owners of a ship may register the ship under\na flag of convenience to reduce operating costs or avoid the regulations of the\nowner's country. All standards are lowered\u2014 wages, safety , even death\ncompensations . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every son of a bitch\nashore including IMO knew of all these things\u2014they just played along. Thousands\nof sailors have died and been maimed severely due to the lack of safety. &nbsp;They cut the budgets, employ fake sailors with\nforged certificates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A ship operates under\nthe laws of its flag state, and these laws are used if the ship is involved in\na case under international<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modern practice of\nflagging ships in foreign countries began in the 1920s in the United States,\nwhen Jewish shipowners wanted to bypass safety and quality regulations and\nrising labor costs .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild &nbsp;( SHELL oil ) and his Chillar crypto Jew agent\nRockefeller ( STANDARD OIL ) were the first to do this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration: none;\">February 22, 2017 at 11:15 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_56MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMY EAST EUROPEAN OFFICERS WERE VERY DISCIPLINED<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THEM HAD FORGED CERTIFICATES<br />\n<br />\nTHE BEST PART IS THAT THE FORGED CERTIFICATES LOOKED BETTER THAN THE ORIGINALS<br />\n<br />\nI KNEW HOW TO TO DETECT IT-- &nbsp; THE SHORE TECHNICAL MANAGERS AND THE SHORE MANNING MANAGERS WERE IN CAHOOTS AND THEY COULD PAY A PITTANCE IN WAGES.<br />\n<br />\nBUT THIS SERIOUSLY AFFECTED THE SAFETY OF THE SHIP<br />\n<br />\nWHEN SUCH FAKE OFFICERS SHOWED \"ATTITUDE\" I WOULD CALL THEM TO MY CABIN ,, SHUT THE DOOR BEHIND THEM.<br />\n<br />\nIMMEDIATELY THEY WOULD KNOW WHAT WOULD HAPPEN NEXT OUT OF 20/ 20 HINDSIGHT<br />\n<br />\nI WILL STAND ON A CHAIR TO MEET THEM EYE TO EYE , AND WITH A SMART KALARI TAP DRAW BLOOD FROM THE NOSE-- &nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BLOOD GUSHED OUT LIKE A OPEN TAP STAINING THEIR DRESS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WAKE UP CALL !</b></span><br />\n<br />\nEITHER THIS -- OR I ARRANGE FOR A \"PRISON SESSION \" OF MINIMUM FIVE YEARS BACK HOME<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedehfD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedehfD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">DIGRESSION:</span></i><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">I had a Turkish pumpman\n( chemical tanker ) who extended his contract as soon as I came on board.&nbsp;&nbsp; Rest all signed off in a Turkish port.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">So I mustered him \u201cWhy\ndont you sign off with the rest-- it is cheaper for the company. We are going\noff to South America \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">He said--&nbsp; \u201cAs long as you are on board I will sail .\nThe day you get off i will sign off.&nbsp;\nWith you I can learn my job\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">And then the next day\nhe brought his wife and 13 year old daughter on board -- lovely family- his\nwife was a Math professor - they had culture.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">He told his wife who\nspoke excellent English \u2013 \u201cThis Indian captain is the only captain , who never\ndemanded HAND KISSING at regular intervals from his officers/ crew \u201c .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">My Turkish crew loved\nme -- I dont know why for I was harsh with them -- my cabin used to be full of\nBAKLAVA SWEETS&nbsp; ( mouth watering variety\n) when my ship went to Turkish ports.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">Anyway to cut a long story\nshort--&nbsp; my Russian chief officer ( 50%\nGerman blood \u2013 a most intelligent man ) once told me--the Turkish pumpman is\nbetter than my other officers .&nbsp; I trust\nhim.&nbsp; This was in reply to why he was\nallowing liberties in the Cargo Control Room.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">I remembered this.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple;\">The day i was signing\noff , i called this Turkish pumpman and gave him a piece of paper.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
