Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 20, 2014 at 8:03 PM<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nThe government of Israeli prime minister Benyamin Netanyahu was involved in these FALSE FLAG operations. PM MODI BEWARE\u2014THE SAME KISSING AND HUGGING ZIONISY FRIENDS WILL ONE DAY DEAL WITH YOU LIKE HOW THEY DEALT WITH GADDAFI ON THE STREETS , IF HE IS NOT WISE TO WORLD INTRIGUE.<br />\n<br />\nThe unelected government, headed by Arseniy Yatsenyuk of the right-wing Fatherland Party, includes no fewer than six ministers from Svoboda, including deputy prime minister, general prosecutor and minister of defence. This is Svoboda\u2019s reward for providing many of the shock troops in the Maidan protests that overthrew Yanukovych. I REPEAT.<br />\n<br />\nThe Svoboda party\u2019s founder and leader, Oleh Tyahnybok, is the same guy who has spoken repeatedly in an unsolicited manner , his determination to crush the \u201cRusskie-Yid mafia that controls Ukraine.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSen. John McCain, the leading supporter of the Zionist war agenda in the U.S. Congress.<br />\n<br />\nOn February 20 2014 , snipers opened fire on the protestors and the police, killing many on both sides with shots to the head. This is the same kind of false-flag terrorism tactic that has been used by the rebels fighting against the Syrian government.<br />\n<br />\nLET THIS NOT HAPPEN TO INDIA \u2013 LET US REMEMBER NAMBINARAYANAN .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The families of\nseafarers that die on FOC ships most of the time do not receive a penny in\ncompensation from the ship-owners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRATIBHA CAUVERY IS\nREGISTERED IN MUMBAI \u2014 PRATIBHA IS SHARAD PAWARS WIFE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Pawar-brothers-of-Pratibha-Shipping-arrested/articleshow/18842482.cms\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Pawar-brothers-of-Pratibha-Shipping-arrested/articleshow/18842482.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.thehindubusinessline.com/economy/logistics/pratibha-shipping-an-albatross-around-marine-depts-neck/article4544461.ece\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.thehindubusinessline.com/economy/logistics/pratibha-shipping-an-albatross-around-marine-depts-neck/article4544461.ece</a><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</span><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.moneylife.in/article/the-mt-pratibha-cauvery-tragedy-at-chennai-some-hard-truths-and-unsavoury-facts/29495.html\">http://www.moneylife.in/article/the-mt-pratibha-cauvery-tragedy-at-chennai-some-hard-truths-and-unsavoury-facts/29495.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OWNING A SHIPPING\nCOMPANY IS A GREAT WAY TO LAUNDER MONEY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMETIMES UNSCRUPLOUS\nSHIPOWNERS SINK THEIR OWN SHIPS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The M/V Jahan (Belize\nFOC registered) was reported sunk in the South Atlantic Ocean in good weather,\nand all 28 crewmembers were reported lost. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A distress call reported,\n\"uncontrollable flooding\" and that the crew, mostly Bangladeshi\ncitizens, would be forced to abandon ship. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distress call was\nnot a general call but rather was a normal telex sent to the ship-owners. The\nship had an Inmarsat C system that was not used. Australian Marine Rescue, the\nSouth African Air Force and three bulk carriers searched for the ship and found\nnothing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later the ship\nresurfaced in Tema, Ghana displaying a different name. It seems that the ship\nhad a lien on it and it sought to fake its own sinking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON CHEMICAL TANKERS IT\nIS ABSOLUTELY NO -NO -NO TO HAVE OFFICERS WITH FAKE CERTIFICATES OF COMPETENCY\nAND FUDGED EXPERIENCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOST OF THE TERRIBLE\nACCIDENTS AT SEA ARE HUMAN IGNORANCE CAUSED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a report \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"During port\noperations, I was serving as chief officer and had worked continuously for 48\nhours. I contributed to a chemical overflow in which serious injury occurred by\nnot concentrating on the loading operation. Acrylonitrile overflowed and\ncovered two men <span style=\"background-color: white;\">when I hot-washed an adjacent tank.\"</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SUCH A THING CAN HAPPEN\nONLY TO AN IMPOSTER, WITH FAKE EXPERIENCE AND FAKE CERTIFICATES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/acrylonitrile-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/acrylonitrile-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following are some\nexamples of abandon FOC ships :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FOC Maltese flagged\nMN Verona was left stranded in the port of Hamburg, Germany after it was\ndetained for technical deficiencies. The Polish and Filipino crew was left\nwithout food or water, and the Swedish owners had not paid the crew for over 5\nmonths.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crew of the MN\nTerpsichore (Maltese FOC flag) were abandon in the Port of Mongla, Bangladesh\nwithout food, clean drinking water and electricity. Because of the appalling\nconditions crewmembers were in poor health and there was an outbreak of hepatitis.\nBecause the crew had not been paid in 10 months they were forced to sell their\nbelongings to buy food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crew of the Queen\nof Vevey (Panamanian FOC flag), made up of Russian and Ukrainian seafarers, was\nabandon at anchorage at Port Stanley in the Falkland Islands in unsanitary\nconditions. The ship was said to be \"unseaworthy\". The crew remained\nunpaid and a local Seamen's Mission was supplying them with food and water. The\nship was sold and changed its name to the Maimad and reflagged to the FOC St.\nVincent register. The authorities of the Falkland Islands did little to help\nbecause, as they stated \"it is only too likely that unscrupulous\nship-owners would be encouraged to abandon their vessels there...\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Burmese crew of the\nBrahm (Maltese FOC flag) was abandoned off the coast of Lagos, Nigeria for\nalmost six months. They were forced to cook and clean with river water and\nbecame stricken with tropical diseases. Several crewmembers became so ill that\nthey had to be transported to a hospital. The crew also had not been paid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ukranian crew of\nthe Alcor (Maltese FOC flag) was abandoned in the St. Lawrence River off of\nQuebec City, Canada after it ran aground. The reason it ran around was that it\nsuffered a rudder breakdown. The vessel had vertical crack in the hull running\nfrom deck to water level. The crew had not been paid in months.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sri Lankan,\nUkrainian and Romanian crew of the Elijeanne (Panamanian FOC flag) were\nabandoned in Port Au Prince, Haiti. The crew was forced to sleep in alleyways\nand on hatch covers. The vessel was infested with mosquitoes that led to an\noutbreak of malaria. The crew also had not been paid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crew of the MN\nEndurance (Belizean FOC flag) was abandoned in the Port of Maputo, Mozambique.\nThe captain left the ship without food, water or fuel for electricity. The crew\nhad not been paid wages in months.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crew of mixed\nnationality from Central America and Asia of the MN Ocean Wave (Panamanian FOC\nflag) were abandoned in Mongla, Bangladesh after the ship went aground. Because\nof serious structural deficiencies and the likelihood of the ship breaking up,\nthe crew left the ship and were placed in custody by Bangladesh authorities.\nThere they waited for their wages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pakistani crew of\nthe Normar Pride (Panamanian FOC flag) was abandoned in Curacao, Netherlands\nAntilles without food, water and their wages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crews of the sister\nships oil tankers Luigi S and Zagara were abandoned after another sister ship\nthe Erika (all three are Maltese FOC flagged) broke up and sank in the Bay\nBiscay, polluting the Brittany beaches with heavy fuel oil. The crew of the Luigi\nS was abandoned in Montenegro, and the crew of the Zagara was abandoned in\nSicily. The crews had not been paid in over a year. The abandonment came about\nout of the ship-owners wanting to cut their assists and avoid responsibility\nfor the costs of the pollution of the Erika.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crew of the\nKarteria (Maltese FOC flag) was abandoned in the Port of Antwerp, Azores after\na horrific explosion that left two dead and another with a broken back with 30%\nburns. That crewmember was left in a hospital that could not treat him until\nthe ITF intervened. The rest of the crew was abandon with an unstable cargo\nthat continued to emit explosive quantities of hydrogen gas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pakistani crew of\nthe Delta Pride (Maltese FOC flag) was abandoned off the coast of South Padre\nIsland, Texas for over 10 months. The ship had its papers and the seafarer's\npassports confiscated after the owner skipped out of dues by going bankrupt.\nThe SOS calls from the crew were ignored and they ran out of fuel, thus not\npower for lights and cooking. They had to save rainwater, for they had run out\nof fresh water and they had to fish in order to eat. The crew became\nmalnourished and sick from having to drink dirty water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most seafarers on FOC\nships are recruited by shipping agents (job sharks) and are forced to sign over\ntheir first month's wages to these employment agents. If any of them express\nany grievance or speak of unions they become blacklisted for future employment\nat sea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Getting back to SHELL\ncompanies-</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While campaigning in\n2008, President Obama slammed the \u201cUgland House,\u201d a five-story building in the\nCayman Islands that is reportedly home to over 18,000 companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"That's either the\nbiggest building in the world, or the biggest tax scam on record,\" said\nObama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panama Papers \u2014 the\ncache of leaked documents from a Panama law firm, Mossack Fonseca \u2014 have\nrevealed how thousands of the firm\u2019s clients, including an array of powerful\nfigures around the world, stashed billions of dollars in tax havens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Financial institutions must\n&nbsp;verify the identities of customers with\nAADHAR card , who set up accounts in the names of shell companies, thus closing\na loophole in the banking system that thwarts transparency efforts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After revelations came\nto light about Americans using Swiss bank accounts to evade taxes, the United\nStates in 2010 passed the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act, which requires\nfinancial firms in other countries to disclose details about American clients\nwith offshore accounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet the United States\nis one of the few countries that has refused to sign new international\nstandards for exchanging similar financial information with other countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United States\ndemands that the rest of the world tell it when an American holds an account at\na foreign institution, but the U.S. does not return the courtesy by automatically\nproviding comparable information on foreign investors in U.S. banks to their\nhome tax jurisdictions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When politicians steal,\nthey reduce the amount of public cash left over for roads or schools. When they\ngive sweetheart contracts to their chums, they defraud taxpayers and deter\nhonest firms from investing in their country. All this hobbles growth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many schemes described\nin the Panama papers involve anonymous shell companies, whose real owners hide\nbehind hired \u201cnominees\u201d.&nbsp;&nbsp; Such vehicles\nare known as the \u201cgetaway cars\u201d for tax dodgers, launderers and crooked\nofficials.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is time to untint their\nwindows by creating central registers of beneficial ownership that are open to\ntax officials, law-enforcers\u2014and the public. The penalties for lying when\nregistering a firm should be stiff with minimum number of years of rigorous\nincarceration<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Too many are paid to\nact as buffers, offering an extra layer of protection against those who pry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To see just how far\nthey could go to secure an untraceable shell company,&nbsp; investigators and research teams impersonated\na range of criminals \u2014 from money launderers to terrorist financiers to drug\ntraffickers.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">They made email\nsolicitations to nearly 4,000 services in more than 180 countries around the\nworld.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite the glaring red flags\nsignaling potential security threats, they were able to secure approval to set\nup untraceable shell companies online for as little as a few hundred dollars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost half of the\nfirms they solicited failed to ask for proper identification \u2014 and one-fifth\ndid not want any photo ID at all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.S. is among the\ntop offenders. The findings show that D elaware, Nevada, Montana, and Wyoming\nare some of the easiest places in the world to score an illicit shell\noperation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we could understand\nthe money-laundering process and take steps to track the real people in control\nof shell companies, it would be much more difficult for organized criminals and\npossibly terrorists to carry out their nefarious activities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let's say you're a\ngovernment official or corporate executive, and you want to receive a $1 million\nbribe or kickback for giving a lucrative and excessively priced contract to a\nforeign or local business. You approve the contract, and its payment, and pad\nthe consideration by a few million, which includes $1 million for yourself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The client puts your $1\nmillion overpayment into a shell company in an offshore jurisdiction, where\nyour ownership can remain anonymous. You are then free to invest or spend the\nmoney. The business writes it off as an expense, paid out to an offshore\nconsultant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or perhaps you'd prefer\nthat your $1 million be used to buy an asset offshore for you, or that it be\npaid out gradually in salaries or fees to family members. Either way, you're\ngood to go.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's the same thing in\nreverse. Simply sell your goods or services to a business at a price that is\nless than the goods or services are worth. Then, out of the embezzled funds,\nyou get $1 million directly from the company that got the bargain. These funds can\nbe placed directly into anonymous offshore account or into an asset of your\nchoice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let's say you want to\nbring $1 million into your country without detection by tax authorities.&nbsp; Clients were urged to buy diamonds for cash,\nthen smuggle them overseas in toothpaste tubes to fool authorities. The gems\ncan then be sold for cash, to private dealers, once you rinse off the Colgate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another technique is to\ntransfer your funds to anonymous debit cards. And if you want to go old-school,\ncollectible stamps still have their fans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Credit Suisse admitted\nguilt to such activities and others - such as shredding documents and keeping\ntransactions below the US $10,000 reportable limit - to help American clients\navoid taxes, paying a fine of $2.6 billion<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The largest recipient\nof FDI (Foreign Direct Investment) is&nbsp;\nthe British Virgin Islands, an archipelago with 23,000 residents.&nbsp; More than 100 billion USD washed up there.&nbsp; Other havens receiving massive\n\"investments\" included the Cayman Islands, Liechtenstein, Monaco, Andorra,\nand Vanuatu.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These funds also dominate\nstock and bond markets. By 2012, tax havens held more than 30% of the total\nforeign investment (corporate, bonds, stocks) in the US.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One high-profile case\nin is now underway in Spain, where the world's greatest soccer superstar,\nLionel Messi, and his father stand accused of laundering $5.56 million (4.2\nmillion euros) worth of sponsorship dollars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Learn to take with a\npinch of salt tall stories about Bollywood movies hitting the 200 crores mark. You will get\nan idea why producers are very keen to release movies in Pakistan</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: Banker wife Amruta of the CM Fadnavis singing at UMANG ( Bollywood function ) &nbsp;for Mumbai police.!</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1bhX-IEs8rs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1bhX-IEs8rs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS HIGH TIME PM MODI\nHAS A PEEK UNDER THE DARK UNDERBELLY OF BOLLYWOOD , THEIR DIRTY MONEY AND SHELL\nCOMPANIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the biggest\nproduction houses of Bollywood \u2013 Shree Ashtavinayak Cine Vision. This\nproduction house is credited with most number of blockbuster franchises in\nBollywood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The company earned the\ndubious distinction of engineering a massive scam of around Rs 1000 crores\n(approx) which is a record in itself. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first case appeared\non the horizon in 2007, when a line producer (Tejpal Ambalal Shah) alleged that\nthe production company hasn\u2019t paid him to the tune of Rs 41 crores.&nbsp; &nbsp;He\nfiled a case and won. The court asked Ashtavinayak to pay him back in full with\npenalties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ashtavinayak was one of\nthe producers of the superhit films, Dabangg, Jab We Met and Golmaal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But unfortunately, even\nafter he won and had a court order in hand, he found that Ashtavinayak\u2019s\ncheques were bouncing. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then approached the\nCompany Law Board (CLB). The CLB found evidence that the company was siphoning\noff funds to shell companies on the pretext of making films. Some of these\ncompanies were registered in India whereas others were in tax havens, like\nDubai.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Altogether, the CLB\ncould gather evidence of about Rs 824 crore which was siphoned off to different\ncompanies (or subsidiaries) for making films. The production of those films\nwere never started. The physical address of those companies could not be traced\nas well.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moreover, in some companies their go-down security guards and a few\nhousewives were registered as directors. They had no clue about their own\ncompanies either.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This started a chain of\nevents including more criminal cases getting registered against all the\ndirectors of Shree Ashtavinayak Cine Vision. As the Bombay High Court didn\u2019t\ngrant them any further protection (against the criminal cases registered\nagainst them), some of the directors of the company went into hiding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the evidences\nstarted piling up, the police started arresting the top officials of the\ncompany. Finally, on April 16, 2015, the chief managing director of the company\nDhilin Mehta and his father, ironically named Harshad Mehta, were arrested.\nDhilin was arrested by the Rajasthan Police just minutes before he was to catch\na flight to Dubai.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two were jailed at\nArthur Road prison and all their offices were sealed. Though some of the\ndirectors of the company have now been freed, Dhilin and Harshad are still\nlanguishing in jail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The production house\nhas since closed down all operations and its offices have been taken over by\ncreditors and the law enforcement agencies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cases are on against\nthem for floating bogus shell companies, siphoning off public money through\nthem and dealing in black money. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All their investors and\ntheir business associates have lost crores since this massive scam came to the\nfore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bollywood doesn\u2019t want\nyou to know that one of its biggest production houses turned out to be a house\nof scams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the story of\nBollywood<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Every year Bollywood\ndances for the Mumbai police\u2014with even CM of Maharashtra sitting in the front\nrow. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Does he even know of\nthe deals made backstage between crooks and police &nbsp;?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/L_rOxBM-FrE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/L_rOxBM-FrE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CRIMINAL ABDUL KARIM\nTELGI WHO PRODUCED BOLLYWOOD FILMS ONCE SHOWERED 93 LAKHS ON A WHORE IN A\nCHAMIYA BEER BAR IN A COUPLE OF HOURS.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/telgi-stamp-paper-scam-must-be-exhumed.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/telgi-stamp-paper-scam-must-be-exhumed.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DtKkxPkaX18/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/DtKkxPkaX18?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE SUPREME COURT\nCOLLEGIUM JUDGES BURNT MIDNIGHT OIL TO OPEN CHAMIYA BAR BEER BARS IN MUMBAI</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://indianexpress.com/article/india/india-news-india/dance-bars-to-reopen-in-maharashtra-as-supreme-court-puts-ban-on-hold/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://indianexpress.com/article/india/india-news-india/dance-bars-to-reopen-in-maharashtra-as-supreme-court-puts-ban-on-hold/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">BUT HEY \u2013 BREADWINNERS\nOF ENTIRE FAMILIES ARE ROTTING AS UNDERTRIALS FOR DECADES.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-onPRB4V3lmE/WK16coPfAbI/AAAAAAABRFk/GSsJIl-SAPEINz3n9o6c-jC9n1Y8EkG4gCLcB/s1600/ttmoney_laundering_scheme_big.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"388\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-onPRB4V3lmE/WK16coPfAbI/AAAAAAABRFk/GSsJIl-SAPEINz3n9o6c-jC9n1Y8EkG4gCLcB/s640/ttmoney_laundering_scheme_big.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A shell corporation may\nalso arise when a company's operations have been wound up, for example\nfollowing a takeover, but the \u201cshell\u201d of the original company continues to\nexist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies are the\nmain component of the underground economy, especially those based in tax\nhavens.&nbsp;&nbsp; They may also be known as\ninternational business companies, personal investment companies, front\ncompanies, or \"mailbox\" companies.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Shell companies are be used for\ntax avoidance.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like how superstars have\nfakes running facebook and twitter accounts \u2013same way shell corporations have\nbeen used to commit fraud, by repeatedly creating an empty shell corporation\nwith a name similar to existing famous real corporations, then running up the\nprice of the empty shell and suddenly selling it (pump and dump).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are shell companies\nthat were created for the purpose of owning assets (including tangibles, such\nas a real estate for property development, and intangibles, such as royalties\nor copyrights) and receiving income.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nReasons behind creating such a shell company may include protection\nagainst litigation and/or tax benefits (some expenses that would not be\ndeductible for an individual may be deductible for a corporation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term merger and\nacquisition (\"M&amp;A\") refers to the aspect of corporate strategy,\ncorporate finance and management dealing with the buying, selling and combining\nof different companies that can aid, finance, or help a growing company in a\ngiven industry grow rapidly without having to create another business entity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corporate exercises,\nincluding mergers and acquisitions, the motive is always value addition&nbsp; In reality, most of the commercial\ntransactions are initiated and signed off by management on the company\u2019s\nbehalf, instead of shareholder per se.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The management, who runs the company, if not\nfor hostile purpose, may not always share identical aim with the shareholder of\na body corporate. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the past years, a\nconsiderable number of empirical studies have been conducted to explain mergers\nand takeovers activities, including reverse takeover, with financial theories\nsuch as Value Maximisation, Social Efficiency and Empire Building, the results\nof which are yet inconclusive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Compared with the\nvoluminous researches on of merger and acquisition, reverse takeover, being a\nspecific type of acquisition transaction, is seldom discussed and examined by\nValue Maximisation theory and Empire Building theory, let alone Opportunism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reverse mergers are\noften the most expedient and cost-efficient way for private companies that hold\nshares that are not available to the public to begin trading on a public stock\nexchange. Prior to the rise of reverse mergers, the vast majority of public\ncompanies were created through the initial public offering (IPO) process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a\nreverse merger, an active private company takes control and merges with a\ndormant public company. These dormant public companies are called \"shell\ncorporations\" because they rarely have assets or net worth aside from the\nfact that they previously had gone through an IPO or alternative filing\nprocess. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reverse mergers allow owners of\nprivate companies to retain greater ownership and control over the new company,\nwhich is a huge benefit to owners looking to raise capital without giving their\ncompanies away. &nbsp;&nbsp;Reverse merger is used\nas a way of going public without the expense and time required by an IPO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usually mergers occur\nin a consensual (occurring by mutual consent) setting where executives from the\ntarget company help those from the purchaser in a due diligence process to\nensure that the deal is beneficial to both parties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acquisitions can also\nhappen through a hostile takeover by purchasing the majority of outstanding\nshares of a company in the open market against the wishes of the target's\nboard. An acquisition may be friendly or hostile. In the former case, the\ncompanies cooperate in negotiations; in the latter case, the takeover target is\nunwilling to be bought or the target's board has no prior knowledge of the\noffer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acquisition usually refers to a purchase of a smaller firm by a larger\none. Sometimes, however, a smaller firm will acquire management control of a\nlarger or longer established company and keep its name for the combined entity.\nThis is known as a reverse takeover.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAD FIRST HEARD OF\nTHE ANGLO EASTERN UNIVAN MERGER 18 YEARS BEFORE IT HAPPENED\u2014FROM THE HORSES\nMOUTH <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I WAS THE BLUE EYED BOY\nOF THE \u201cWICKED JEW\u201d CAPT CAJ VANDERPERRE . FOR HIM MY SHIT WOULD NOT SMELL.</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.maritime-executive.com/article/anglo-eastern-and-univan-merge\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.maritime-executive.com/article/anglo-eastern-and-univan-merge</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ckoTjZtje8A/WK2NMSn__OI/AAAAAAABRF0/f5QFHKbuincN4BGg7E2utf92lxcWjaKBQCLcB/s1600/strip77tease-generic-8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
