Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_22.html?showComment=1487768246726#c2759919008654747391\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 22, 2017 at 6:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_30MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIF YOU HEAR THE STORIES OF ABANDONED SAILORS , BECAUSE THEIR SHIPS GOT ARRESTED, IT WILL BE MORE JUICY THAN A \"PAPILLON \" NOVEL<br />\n<br />\nI am very familiar with the city of KINGSTON in Jamaica--as it was my home port with Jamaican officers and crew<br />\n<br />\nMy Chief officer used to tell me stories of his stay in Kingston --when he was a 17 year old cadet.<br />\n<br />\nThey were tied up at an idle berth without fuel, water food&nbsp;--ship was arrested<br />\n<br />\nThey survived for many months--all Indians on board<br />\n<br />\nThe old Captain was selling some fast junk food on the streets<br />\n<br />\nEvery crew member pooled in --they used to beg from neighboring ships--telling them WE ARE ON STRIKE<br />\n<br />\nAfter two months the Indian Ambassador comes sauntering in with some food in his car trunk<br />\n<br />\nOnce crew member ( whose daughter died ) pasted him on the jetty itself causing him to run away--he never came back<br />\n<br />\nThe whole thrust was for the crew to collect food and distribute it among themselves<br />\n<br />\nMy chief officer was a STREET SMART guy<br />\n<br />\nHe gravitated to a posh strip tease joint<br />\n<br />\nHe job was initially to cart beer cases from the godown to the bar<br />\n<br />\nLater the owner ( MA BAKER ) noticing that he was smart with numbers made him the accountant<br />\n<br />\nHe prospered as an accountant and he soon was bossing around even giving PAY RAISE to whomever he fancied<br />\n<br />\nThe attractive strip tease dancer fell in love with him-- &nbsp;and pretty soon instead of coming back to the ship-- he used to spend the daytime &nbsp;FUCKING HER in her AC bungalow&nbsp;. She was rich.<br />\n<br />\nOne day the ship was released --and they sailed out.<br />\n<br />\nHe slipped away without telling the girl.<br />\n<br />\nThe bar owner ( MA BAKER ) put a SUPARI CONTRACT against him-- if he goes back to kingston , the mafia who has his photo will kill him<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_31b+seedB8Q4D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_31b+seedB8Q4D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yLzqMJQzzcA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/yLzqMJQzzcA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The number one reason\nfor a domestic company to set up a shell company is to realize a tax haven\nabroad.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Multinational\nbusinesses have been known to set up shell companies in countries with\nsuper-low corporate tax rates. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They do their\ninternational operations through their shell, thus not having to report to the\ncountry (where their operations are taking place) the sums involved, and\nconsiderably reduce their tax bill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large corporations,\nlike in the Apple example, have decided to move jobs and profits offshore,\ntaking advantage of looser tax codes. This is the process of\n\"offshoring\" or \"outsourcing\" work that was once conducted\ndomestically.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Significantly high\nearners set themselves up as shell companies in one or many locations, like the\nCayman Islands. This is a gray area of tax evasion where people funnel earnings\nthrough shell companies in such a way that it isn't counted toward personal\nincome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most interesting\ntype of shell company (to investors) is one that has a listing. Given that it\ntakes time and money to obtain a listing, a listed shell has significant value\neven if it does not have any assets. Listed shells are therefore often the\ntargets of reverse takeovers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A shell company, is a\nfirm with no current business activity or significant assets. Some shell\ncompanies may have had operations in the past, but these have dwindled due to\neither mismanagement or unfavorable market conditions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money launderers send\nmoney across the world using and abusing shell companies, intermediaries and\ntransmitters. Their aim is to create a web of confusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All know the convoluted\nways certain American multinationals such as Starbucks operate in order to\navoid paying taxes. Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Jew Howard Schultz, Starbucks CEO is\nnow giving pin pricks to Donald Trump. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lFEGkViaFKk/WK2cQfFQaWI/AAAAAAABRGE/7-c84pBnNIQcqDgycKhxgfwv9hhGr_VtQCLcB/s1600/ww.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"472\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lFEGkViaFKk/WK2cQfFQaWI/AAAAAAABRGE/7-c84pBnNIQcqDgycKhxgfwv9hhGr_VtQCLcB/s640/ww.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evil corp Starbucks has promised to hire\n10,000 refugees over five years in response to Donald Trump\u2019s executive order\ntemporarily barring refugees access to the US and banning entry for anyone from\nseven majority Muslim countries.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All know the greedy Jew wants to give less\nwages and profit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All know how this Jew Schultz uses his shell companies to\ndodge taxes and launder money</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/capt-ajit-vadakayil-does-not-drink.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/capt-ajit-vadakayil-does-not-drink.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AmN93M-_no8/WK2cpntev4I/AAAAAAABRGI/6as6DD2eWEo7uk4TgSM1b6HK4eNMGCp4QCLcB/s1600/P02940103300202-962950.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AmN93M-_no8/WK2cpntev4I/AAAAAAABRGI/6as6DD2eWEo7uk4TgSM1b6HK4eNMGCp4QCLcB/s640/P02940103300202-962950.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 2014,\nEuropean Union antitrust regulators ruled that a deal struck between Dutch\nauthorities and Starbucks might be illegal, with the Netherlands giving the\ncoffee-shop chain giant unfair tax breaks.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nAccording to the Commission, Starbucks was using a Netherlands\nsubsidiary to shift revenue from higher-tax nations to lower-tax ones.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UI21nCplSwI/WK2gXR-RDtI/AAAAAAABRGY/6VJaHTJoGIsLtrccB7DS2OmqF50whA-_ACLcB/s1600/money99-laundering-5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UI21nCplSwI/WK2gXR-RDtI/AAAAAAABRGY/6VJaHTJoGIsLtrccB7DS2OmqF50whA-_ACLcB/s640/money99-laundering-5.jpg\" width=\"476\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering aims\nto conceal the identity, source, and destination of illicitly-obtained money.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The money laundering process can be broken down into three stages.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First, the\nillegal activity that garners the money places it in the launderer\u2019s hands.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Second, the launderer passes the money through a complex scheme of transactions\nto obscure who initially received the money from the criminal enterprise.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Third, the scheme returns the money to the launderer in an obscure and indirect\nway.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1996,\nHarvard-educated economist Franklin Jurado went to prison for cleaning $36\nmillion for Colombian drug lord Jose Santacruz-Londono. People with a whole lot\nof dirty money typically hire financial experts to handle the laundering\nprocess. It's complex by necessity: The whole idea is to make it impossible for\nauthorities to trace the dirty money while it's cleaned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Structuring deposits also\nknown as smurfing, entails breaking up large amounts of money into smaller,\nless-suspicious amounts. In the United States, this smaller amount has to be\nbelow $10,000 -- the dollar amount at which U.S. banks have to report the\ntransaction to the government. The money is then deposited into one or more\nbank accounts either by multiple people (smurfs) or by a single person over an\nextended period of time.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r6PvgWSo82g/WK2ixu02fBI/AAAAAAABRGs/j668m1NnSMIXL1ny6c6y69Ssdhip2D77gCLcB/s1600/red-flags-ofmm-money-laundering-3-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r6PvgWSo82g/WK2ixu02fBI/AAAAAAABRGs/j668m1NnSMIXL1ny6c6y69Ssdhip2D77gCLcB/s640/red-flags-ofmm-money-laundering-3-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After arranging a smurf\ndeal by phone or email, you'll be asked to have the cash couriered to a smurf's\nresidence . The smurf will then deposit small amounts of your cash into an\naccount every day for weeks or months - or years - avoiding watchful eyes by\nkeeping the numbers small.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Along the way, you can ask your\nsmurf to withdraw some cash - which has since been rendered untraceable - for a\nshopping spree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smurfs are supposed to\nstay under the radar. That's what makes them smurfs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the rise of internet\nbanking had made smurfing even more lucrative, and some top practitioners\nbecame so big they began to draw attention.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For years, Hong Kong's most\nprolific money launderer was a teenager named Luo Juncheng , who originally\nopened a Bank of China account with a $500 deposit. During the next eight\nmonths, he made nearly 5,000 deposits, and more than 3,500 withdrawals\nelectronically, moving $1.67 billion offshore before attracting notice. He was\nsentenced to 10 years in prison in 2013 - bad news for the smurf, and his\nclients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other smurfs come to\nattention of authorities through their flamboyant lifestyles. In March, another\nHong Kong resident, Carson Yeung , was sentenced to six years for laundering\n$91.27 million through his bank accounts between 2001 and 2007. A former\nhairdresser who'd since bought the UK's Birmingham City football team, he\nclaimed he had accumulated hundreds of millions of dollars in profits from stock\ntrades, a hair salon, and gambling.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A smurf deposits illegally gained money into\nbank accounts for transfer in the near future. To prevent money laundering by\ncriminals involved in illegal activities, such as drugs and extortion,\ncountries such as the United States and Canada require a currency transaction\nreport be filed by a financial institution handling a transaction exceeding\n$10,000 in cash.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, a criminal group with $50,000 in cash for\nlaundering may use several smurfs for depositing anywhere from $5,000 to $9,000\nin a number of accounts geographically dispersed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, a smurf\nmay pack cash in a suitcase and smuggle it to another country for gambling,\nbuying international currency or other reasons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the layering\nstage, illicit money is separated from its source by sophisticated layering of\nfinancial transactions that obscures the audit trail and breaks the link with\nthe original crime. For example, the smurfs move funds electronically from one\ncountry to another, and then divide the money into investments placed in advanced\nfinancial options or overseas markets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The integration stage\nis where the money is returned to the criminal from what appear to be\nlegitimate sources. Although there are numerous ways of getting the money back,\nfunds must appear to come from a legitimate source, and the process must not\ndraw attention. For example, property, art work, jewelry or high-end\nautomobiles may be purchased and given to the criminal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cuckoo smurfing is one\nway criminals move money internationally. For example, say a New York criminal\nowes a London criminal $9,000, and a London merchant owes a New York supplier\n$9,000. The London merchant goes to London Bank and deposits $9,000 with\ninstructions to transfer the money to the New York supplier\u2019s bank.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kchX6An2iAQ/WK2iTKgPhgI/AAAAAAABRGk/y5-3R50yFnYVZgBXLmoxK8tkcalfm5DggCLcB/s1600/37c5dbd3d407bc8ee987cef3b7eb5e278f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kchX6An2iAQ/WK2iTKgPhgI/AAAAAAABRGk/y5-3R50yFnYVZgBXLmoxK8tkcalfm5DggCLcB/s640/37c5dbd3d407bc8ee987cef3b7eb5e278f.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The London\nbanker, working with the New York criminal, instructs the New York criminal to\ndeposit $9,000 in the New York supplier\u2019s bank account. The London banker then\ntransfers $9,000 from the London merchant\u2019s account to the London criminal\u2019s\naccount. The London merchant and the New York supplier do not know the funds\nwere never directly transferred; all they know is the London merchant paid\n$9,000 and the New York supplier received $9,000.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money launderers often\nsend money through various \"offshore accounts\" in countries that have\nbank secrecy laws, meaning that for all intents and purposes, these countries\nallow anonymous banking. A complex scheme can involve hundreds of bank\ntransfers to and from offshore banks. According to the International Monetary\nFund, \"major offshore centers\" include the Bahamas, Bahrain, the\nCayman Islands, Hong Kong, Antilles, Panama and Singapore.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j3qVJoNl9l8/WK2ijkpINPI/AAAAAAABRGo/CUqPwOhYaKQaLaj7dwsUvTi6-MgN0L8UgCLcB/s1600/structurineeg-and-smurfing-7-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j3qVJoNl9l8/WK2ijkpINPI/AAAAAAABRGo/CUqPwOhYaKQaLaj7dwsUvTi6-MgN0L8UgCLcB/s640/structurineeg-and-smurfing-7-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India has &nbsp;well-established, alternative banking systems\nthat allow for undocumented deposits, withdrawals and transfers. These are\ntrust-based systems, often with ancient roots, that leave no paper trail and\noperate outside of government control. This includes the hawala system .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies &nbsp;are fake companies that exist for no other\nreason than to launder money. They take in dirty money as \"payment\"\nfor supposed goods or services but actually provide no goods or services; they\nsimply create the appearance of legitimate transactions through fake invoices\nand balance sheets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Launderers sometimes\nplace dirty money in otherwise legitimate businesses to clean it. They may use\nlarge businesses like brokerage firms or casinos that deal in so much money\nit's easy for the dirty stuff to blend in, or they may use small,\ncash-intensive businesses like bars, car washes, strip clubs or check-cashing\nstores. These businesses may be \"front companies\" that actually do\nprovide a good or service but whose real purpose is to clean the launderer's\nmoney.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This method typically works in one of two ways: The launderer can\ncombine his dirty money with the company's clean revenues -- in this case, the\ncompany reports higher revenues from its legitimate business than it's really\nearning; or the launderer can simply hide his dirty money in the company's\nlegitimate bank accounts in the hopes that authorities won't compare the bank\nbalance to the company's financial statements.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2W7udQU4z50/WK2jW0UOEXI/AAAAAAABRG0/UBHv0OT2FvIvvZAZKEXI28QsZki4VLIyACLcB/s1600/itmages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2W7udQU4z50/WK2jW0UOEXI/AAAAAAABRG0/UBHv0OT2FvIvvZAZKEXI28QsZki4VLIyACLcB/s400/itmages.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most money-laundering\nschemes involve some combination of these methods, although the Black Market\nPeso Exchange is pretty much a one-stop-shopping system once someone smuggles\nthe cash to the peso broker. The variety of tools available to launderers makes\nthis a difficult crime to stop, but authorities do catch the bad guys every now\nand then. In the next section, we'll take a look at two busted money-laundering\noperations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c760868103807893667\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513155114260#c8442811518030880826\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 13, 2017 at 2:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_123MC\" style=\"color: red; margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: black;\">hi sd,</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">IN THIS AGE WE MAKE SUPER COMPUTERS WITH SILICON AND METAL&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS MAHARISHIS HAD 12 STRAND DNA --MORTAL AVATARS OF VISHNU HAD 13 STRAND DNA AND MORE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">THEY COULD DO MILLION TIMES BETTER USING THEIR OWN BODIES AS A SUPER COMPUTER</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">WHEN IN VEDAS AND PURANAS --700O YEARS AGO WE TALKED ABOUT VAMANA BEFORE KERALA KING MAHABALI OR KRISHNA BEFORE ARJUNA / BHISHMA TAKING \"VIRAAT ROOPS\" OR USING REMORE CONTROL-- HOW THE WHITE MEN RIDICULED AND LAUGHED WITH EXTREME SARCASM!</span><br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5CqUYBopWLs<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EzL6-6144nw<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">VEDAS WAS THE FIRST TO TALK ABOUT HOLOGRAM--PENNED DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">Because space time is holographic, they could access it by quantum processes inside their brains. Vaastu is the basis of Hindu architecture.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">DNA can be influenced by acoustic, electromagnetic and SCALAR WAVES. In the quantum holographic DNA-wave bio-computer theory, DNA is a self-calibrating antenna working by phase conjugate ( scalar waves and phase conjugation) adaptive resonance capable of both receiving and transmitting scalar energy .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black;\">As per Vedanta we are essentially holographic energy beings existing in a state of resonance with the scalar field of the cosmos. . Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/draw-diagram-marine-two-stroke-main.html?showComment=1487653967721#c8428955549381482149\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 21, 2017 at 10:42 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDIGRESSION:<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECT: LOCKING STABLE DOORS AFTER THE HORSES HAVE BOLTED ??<br />\n<br />\nI was a very successful Captain at sea as I did something which nobody did or even dreamt of at sea .<br />\n<br />\nI did PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE at sea\u2014an unknown concept.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Capt Ajit Vadakayil predicts , you know how effective it can be.<br />\n<br />\nI treated every machinery like a human body-- which is the most complicated machine.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/predictive-maintenance-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI ignored the company\u2019s peabrained PMS ( Planned maintenance programme ) . This made my bosses very unhappy. But then I have always worked for my ship- never to keep my bosses happy. And my bosses knew that I run a good ship.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/draw-diagram-marine-two-stroke-main.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI checked the emissions from the main air compressor in the engine room and found it had Lub Oil carryover. Then I monitored the compressor for a few days and found it was running 18 hours a day, when a healthy compressor must work less than 4 hours a day in charging the air bottles .<br />\n<br />\nI had a site inspection of the main air compressors in the Engine room and found it was below the water level during loaded passage and that it was next to the shipside with the HP ( high pressure ) part facing the hull.<br />\n<br />\nI sent an email to the company\u2014in New York\u2014all pea brained white men in the office. .<br />\n<br />\nI demanded a 24 HOUR BLACKOUT AT THE BERTH IN BROWNSVILLE USA after cargo discharge .<br />\n<br />\nThe company threw up .<br />\n<br />\nAfter all this demand was coming from a DECK BOY not the Chief Engineer.<br />\n<br />\nI told them \u2013 \u201cListen, I am getting off at Brownsville USA with my family as my contract is over . I am doing this for the next captain whose will NOT have a technical brain\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe company replied that one day of idling after cargo discharge ( veg oils ) is unimaginable\u2014there will be much of financial loss.<br />\n<br />\nThen I held a SAFETY COMMITTEE MEETING the same day<br />\n<br />\nI explained the scenario to all the engineers . None of them had the cerebral wherewithal to understand why I wanted INSTANT REPAIRS<br />\n<br />\nI made the MINUTES OF THE MEETING ( process verbal ) \u2013got it signed by all officers and crew SAFETY REPS .<br />\n<br />\nThe last line at the bottom was from Captain\u2014<br />\n<br />\nNEVER LOCK THE STABLE DOORS AFTER THE HORSES HAVE BOLTED !<br />\n<br />\nThis report was FAXED.<br />\n<br />\nAll in the company read this\u2014even the women.<br />\n<br />\nThey all knew me well as a Captain par excellence . The PRESIDENT who knew me got involved .<br />\n<br />\nThey sort of kept it on the back burner as the white skinned Engineer Technical bosses did not agree ( more out of jealousy ).<br />\n<br />\nThis is despite me warning\u2014if what I fear happens , we will not have time to launch our life boats. The engine room will lose its reserve buoyancy and the ship will sink in a jiffy with all souls<br />\n<br />\nThree days later I was woken up at 3PM ( after noon nap ) by a mighty explosion \u2013the whole ship rocked.<br />\n<br />\nI ran down to the engine room telephoning Chief Engineer who was also sleeping to follow me to the starboard side at the main air compressor.<br />\n<br />\nThe heavy compressor block has shattered and huge heavy pieces of steel projectiles destroyed everything in its path.<br />\n<br />\nLUCKILY THE HP SIDE FACING THE HULL WAS INTACT AS THE COMPRESSOR EXPLODED FROM THE LP SIDE.<br />\n<br />\nA FINE SPRAY OF LUB OIL HAS A LOWER IGNITION POINT THAT GASOLENE\u2014HARDLY ANYBODY KNOWS THIS<br />\n<br />\nWithin two minutes the Chief Engineer arrived at the spot.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_5BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; All were leaking.<br />\n<br />\nThe compressors were not cutting off ( to take rest ) as both air bottles were running down together and the compressors were struggling to charge them back to the highest pressure ( cut in / cutout limits )<br />\n<br />\nSo my compressors were like 45 years old , though the ship was just ten years old.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/naive-sailor-main-air-compressors-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN I SAID , I WAS 100% COMPETENT AT SEA \u2013 EVEN MY MOST VICIOUS DETRACTORS DARE NOT DISAGREE.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN SUCH A THING HAPPENS YOU BECOME A <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">LIVING LEGEND</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE NO SHIP CAPTAIN KNOWS A SHIT ABOUT ENGINEERING<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS WOULD HAVE BEEN PART OF MY BOOK \u201cGAMES CAPTAIN PLAYED \u201c .. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CASHEW IMPORTERS FROM\nNIGERIA WERE GIVEN HUNDREDS OF CRORES BY \u201cINDIAN BANK\u201d OF TAMIL NADU &nbsp;( CHID BABYs FRIEND &nbsp;CMD-M GOPALAKRISHNAN CASE ) -- &nbsp;USED BY LTTE TO BUY FOREIGN ARMS&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A big percentage of all\ncurrency that was demonetised has come back into open circulation as white\nmoney.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARE WE STUPID?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DON\u2019T OUR NATIONAL\nSECURITY AGENCIES HAVE AN IOTA OF BRAINS ? ARE THEY BABES IN THE WOODS?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND WHY IS AXIS BANK\nPUNISHING THEIR ERRANT BANK MANAGERS BY \u201cSUSPENSIONS\u201d &nbsp;.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IS MODI NOT SUPPOSED TO\nINCARCERATE THEM?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of channels for\nconverting black money into white are shell companies.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY ARMS MIDDLEMAN IN\nINDIA OPERATES DOZENS OF SHELL COMPANIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.financialexpress.com/india-news/indias-2nd-vijay-mallya-arms-dealer-sanjay-bhandari-flees-india-seeks-asylum-in-london/559103/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">&nbsp;http://www.financialexpress.com/india-news/indias-2nd-vijay-mallya-arms-dealer-sanjay-bhandari-flees-india-seeks-asylum-in-london/559103/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR GOVT DOES NOT EVEN\nHAVE A LIST OF ARMS DEALS WHO OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES\u2014AFTER ALL THESE\nPOLITICIANS GET KICKBACKS AND THEY TOO OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The IT dept had seized\nhuge quantity of Panama\u2019s bearer shares from Sanjay Bhandari\u2019s premises in\nDelhi during the raid in April 2016. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\nhad explained about BEARER SHARES in part 1 of my post , at the end ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panama\u2019s\nbearer shares are untraceable certificates of ownership and a mode to stash\naway black money in the tax haven. Such bearer shares ensure anonymity of the\nowner. Bhandari baby operated dozens of SHELL companies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhandari was not on\nradar till the I-T officials raided a Delhi-based hawala operator, Deepak\nAgarwal, in a case related to funding Aam Aadmi Party in July 2015. During the\nraid, I-T officials recovered a number of bogus bills, worth Rs 100 crore, in\nthe name of Sanjay Bhandari.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This led to a separate tax survey for Bhandari\u2019s\n20 shell companies. This is when I-T officials found some suspicious entries\nand defence ministry\u2019s documents. His phone was put on surveillance and then\nemerged his nexus with politicians, senior journalists and defence officials.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I-T department has\nfocussed on Bhandari\u2019s three main companies and his foreign accounts. These\ninclude his Delhi-based flagship company Offset India Solutions Pvt Ltd, which\nwas floated in 2008 with paid-up capital of just Rs one lakh; Micromet Ati\nIndia Pvt Ltd, which had subscribed to Panama bearer shares; and Ayaana\nSoftware and Services Pvt Ltd, which was allegedly used for money laundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suresh_Nanda\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suresh_Nanda</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Below: Yemen is being bombed and women/ children die because some JEWS want to make money -- British arms exports to crypto Jew Al Saud dynasty of Saudi Arabia</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
