, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometime in 1990, US\nCustoms intercepted a ton of cocaine being smuggled through Miami International\nAirport. A Customs and DEA investigation quickly revealed that the smugglers\nwere the Venezuelan National Guard headed by General Guillen, a CIA \u201casset\u201d who\nclaimed that he had been operating under CIA orders and protection.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The CIA\nsoon admitted that this was true. If the ROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED CIA is good at\nanything, it is the complete control of American mass media.</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild, the\ncenturies-old European financial institution, has opened a trust company in\nReno, Nev., a few blocks from the Harrah\u2019s and Eldorado casinos. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is now moving the\nfortunes of wealthy foreign clients out of offshore havens such as Bermuda,\nsubject to the new international disclosure requirements, and into\nRothschild-run trusts in Nevada, which are exempt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyone closely\nfollowing the Panama Papers tax haven story, is by now familiar with the role\nthat Rothschild plays in providing virtually identical services right inside\nthe US by the Rothschild Trust<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For financial advisers,\nthe current state of play is simply a good business opportunity. In a draft of\nhis San Francisco presentation, Rothschild\u2019s Penney wrote that the U.S.\n\"is effectively the biggest tax haven in the world.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.S., he added in\nlanguage later excised from his prepared remarks, lacks \u201cthe appetite &nbsp;to enforce foreign tax laws \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">PM MODI-</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BEFORE YOU STRIKE &nbsp;(</b><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> YOU MUST</b><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> ) &nbsp;I SUGGEST THAT YOU WAIT FOR ME TO COMPLETE THIS POST -- PROBABLY 4 PARTS .</b><br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://postcard.news/pm-modi-planning-another-surgical-strike-can-people-escape/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://postcard.news/pm-modi-planning-another-surgical-strike-can-people-escape/</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Wikileaks cable shows\nthat the Rothschilds were involved in a billion dollar money laundering scheme\nin Africa. &nbsp;The classified cable from the\nPublic Library of US Diplomacy published by WikiLeaks exposes Rothschild Bank\n\u201cadvising\u201d a \u201csecret and corrupt\u201d billion dollar transaction in order to create\na \u201cmassive money laundering scheme\u201d in Senegal and crash the struggling\nnation\u2019s economy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A study of 3,700\nincorporation agents over 182 countries, Kenya emerged as the nation in which\nagents were least likely to ask for proper identification.&nbsp;&nbsp; Law firms in Kenya were pretty willing to\nset up a shell company no questions asked for even obviously high risk\ncustomers.&nbsp; They say--\u201d We don\u2019t care who\nyou are, if you have the money we have the company for you\u2019</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, Panama's\nfinancial laws remain extraordinarily lax. Foreign firms can bring unlimited\namounts of money into the country without paying taxes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWISH American banks\nhelped turn Panama into a financial center, and the country emerged as a tax\nand money-laundering haven in the 1970s after the government passed some of the\nworld's strictest financial-secrecy rules. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That likely encouraged\nMossack Fonseca to establish itself here in 1977. The financial-secrecy rules\ndidn't just promise foreign investors confidentiality\u2014they made it a crime for\nbanks to disclose any information about clients unless they were ordered to by\na court in a case that involved terrorism, drug trafficking, or another serious\noffense (tax evasion was specifically excluded from that category). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Americans are believed\nto hold more than $1 trillion secreted in offshore havens, with annual losses\nto the IRS alone coming to some $100 billion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Financial firms\nincluding Rothschild are moving offshore accounts from locations such as\nSwitzerland and Grand Cayman Islands into the U.S. to take advantage of the\ncountry\u2019s relative lax regulations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nearly half of residential properties\npurchases of over $5 million made in the U.S. in the last few years were\ncarried out by anonymous shell companies, data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://zeenews.india.com/news/india/rahul-gandhis-uk-firm-a-shell-company-to-receive-defence-kickbacks-subramanian-swamy_1823160.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://zeenews.india.com/news/india/rahul-gandhis-uk-firm-a-shell-company-to-receive-defence-kickbacks-subramanian-swamy_1823160.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>SHELF </b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">companies are\nlegally formed firms, which are inactive but can be purchased to start a\nbusiness right away.&nbsp;&nbsp; Shell companies that\nare created without a business or a listing are known as shelf companies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These companies are\nthen bought by another company which may have some legitimate business but may\nnot want to spend time, money and effort that goes in creating a company<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are incorporated\npurely to sell off-the-shelf.&nbsp;&nbsp; This\noffers a convenient alternative to setting up a company from scratch (the name\nof the company can be changed, new directors appointed, and possibly shares\nissued).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A shell company may be\nset up or purchased in order to obtain financing before starting actual\nbusiness. In such cases, the term has the same meaning as a shelf company<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some fraudsters create\nshell companies for single uses and then discard them. Or they may use them\nrepeatedly and have them change hands multiple times. They also may form\n\"shelf companies\" and not use them for a period of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A shelf company has a better chance of\nappearing legitimate and fooling a novice investigator or basic due diligence\nmechanisms because it appears to have existed longer than it really has. An\nolder shelf could predate any specific areas of concern, which would allow it\nto engage in business activities when it otherwise shouldn't.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There's also an\nopportunity to buy a 'shelf company'. This is a company that has been\nestablished a few years earlier. By trading under this company name it will\nsuperficially appear your brand new company has a longer track record.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is particularly\nuseful if you're going for a loan.&nbsp; It\ncan be helpful to have a company that didn't come down in the last shower.&nbsp; And if you're a criminal it can further confuse\nthe trail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.switzerland-4you.com/swiss-shelf-company.htm\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.switzerland-4you.com/swiss-shelf-company.htm</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One international asset\nmanager who talked to Mossack Fonseca about doing business said that the firm\noffered to sell a 50-year-old shelf company for $100,000<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The age of your company\ncan affect the business you wish to conduct. The number of years a company has\nbeen in existence may affect how much confidence potential business associates\nsuch as buyers or creditors have in a company.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you want to obtain bank\nloans, corporate credit cards, leases and other credit facilities, an aged\ncompany will be in better standing than a new incorporation. Showing longevity\nand enhances your image with customers and lenders. In many countries,\ngovernment contracts may only be awarded to companies that have been trading\nfor a number of years - an aged company may be beneficial to secure these.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obtaining a Business Visa or Work Permits for\ncompany directors is easier with an established company.. It is easier to gain\naccess to investment capital and corporate credit..</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ncompany directors will be changed from the nominee staff directors to the\ndirectors of your choice as part of the transfer process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; It exists only on paper and can be set up within a\nmatter of hours.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The result was the Hay-Bunau-Varilla Treaty of November 1903,\nestablishing permanent U.S. rights to a Panama Canal Zone several miles wide,\nstretching across the isthmus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panama became independent that same month. The Panama registry reportedly\nprovided offshore escape routes from the outset.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first transfer of\nships to Panama\u2019s register in 1922 involved two US passenger ships wishing to\nserve alcohol to passengers during Prohibition. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first, called The\nTreaty Concerning the Permanent Neutrality and Operation of the Panama Canal,\nor the Neutrality Treaty, stated that the United States could use its military\nto defend the Panama Canal against any threat to its neutrality, thus allowing\nperpetual U.S. usage of the Canal.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second, called The Panama Canal Treaty,\nstated that the Panama Canal Zone would cease to exist on October 1, 1979, and\nthe Canal itself would be turned over to the Panamanians on December 31, 1999.\nThese two treaties were signed on September 7, 1977.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"col-xs-12\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; min-height: 1px; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; position: relative; width: 758px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"col-xs-12\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; float: left; min-height: 1px; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; position: relative; width: 758px;\">\n<div id=\"postcontent\" style=\"background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.992157); border-radius: 0.3em; box-shadow: rgb(170, 170, 170) 0.1em 0.1em 0.4em; box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 1em; padding: 0.5em; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<div id=\"posttext\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: #333333; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; margin-bottom: 10px;\">\nT 2232 -My statement to media yesterday re Panama not come out in some papers. Here it is :<br />\nOn the Panama disclosures, I wish to state that queries continue to be sent to me by the media. I would humbly request them to kindly direct these to the GOI where I, as a law abiding citizen have already sent, and shall continue to send, my responses. I stand by my earlier statement on the \u2018misuse of my name\u2019 in the matter and in any event the press reports do not disclose any illegal act committed by me.</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/o64QQfqsYag/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/o64QQfqsYag?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">ALMOST EVERY SUPER YACHT OWNER ( EXAMPLE BELOW) &nbsp;OPERATES SHELL COMPANIES&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/R3lSk5LaLAU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/R3lSk5LaLAU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you're a African warlord\nor a corrupt politician, you like shell companies because they provide an\nanonymous way to take ill-gotten money and move it into the legitimate\nfinancial system \u2014 good for buying super yachts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the assets\ncycled through the shell companies were used to buy yachts, private jets,\nManhattan penthouses and luxury homes in Beverly Hills, Calif., the Panama law\nfirm documents show.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 68-year-old Mossack\nowns a yacht named Rex Maris, a collection of gold coins, a teak plantation,\nand a helicopter, among other assets, according to the ICIJ.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca\u2019s\nfingers are in Africa\u2019s diamond trade, the international art market and other\nbusinesses that thrive on secrecy.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;The firm has serviced enough Middle East\nroyalty to fill a palace. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s helped\ntwo kings, Mohammed VI of Morocco and King Salman of Saudi Arabia, take to the\nsea on luxury yachts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another banker\nexplained that yachts and real estate could also be sold a lot easier avoiding\ntime-consuming bureaucracy, when a boat or a villa was owned by an offshore\ncompany. All the owner had to do was to sell the entire shell company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here's how the scheme\nworks : Say you've got a super yacht parked in some Pacific &nbsp;island., but you don't want anybody to know\nthat it belongs to you, perhaps because you're a corrupt government official\nwho shouldn't be able to afford such a thing.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of the yacht\nbeing registered under your name, it can be bought and registered under the\nname of the shell company that Mossack Fonseca has created for you in the\noffshore tax haven of your choice. Now, if someone wants to find out who owns\nyour yacht, it will be virtually impossible. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same setup could be\nused to hide your ownership of a private island, $100 million in cash, private\njet or any number of other assets or funds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The so-called Panama\nPapers released in April revealed that King Salman was involved in offshore\ncompanies in Luxembourg and the British Virgin Islands. &nbsp;The records linked him to a super yacht and\nmultimillion-dollar properties in London \u2014 one a majestic home with a\nbalustraded balcony near Hyde Park in the tony Mayfair district.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Princess Basmah bint\nSaud, a daughter of King Saud, five years ago put the number of royals at\n15,000.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Expensive assets can be\nplaced into a shell company and sold as a way of avoiding taxation and\nregistration fees. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A millionaire\u2019s yacht,\nfor example, can be listed as the property of a shell company. Instead of\nselling the vessel itself, the company can be sold as a whole. No new\nregistration fees, and no new taxes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO NEED FOR MANY WIVES\nAND MISTRESSES TO TEAR EACH OTHERS HAIR WHEN HE DIES</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the money doesn't\nnecessarily stay there. In 2014, the Chinese overtook the Russians JEWS &nbsp;as the\nlargest buyers of New York City condos.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Other laundered money is used to purchase\nLondon mansions, yachts, securities, art, and luxury estates around the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU MUST HAVE WONDER\nHOW SHIT PAINTINGS FETCH MILLIONS OF DOLLARS.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WELL IT IS A JEWISH\nSCAM. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TILL INDIAN PAINTER\nFRANCIS NEWTON SOUZA DIED, &nbsp;HIS PAINTINGS\nDID NOT FETCH ANY &nbsp;HIGH PRICES.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SXdEpiEI0_E/WKr7d_uFwRI/AAAAAAABQ_I/vaPjIBP9FbkaBq1L8DLl9e1AwXNHwbduQCLcB/s1600/francis_newton_soruza_untitwled_d5452412h.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; ( &nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">POOR \"APUN BHI ART COLLECTOR \" TINA MUNIM</span> &nbsp;)&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">IN &nbsp;\u201c BREAKING BAD \u201c &nbsp;IRISH POTATO EATER SAUL PRETENDS TO BE A JEW \u2014IT\nHAS GREAT ADVANTAGES</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9CZ4O_CRET8/WKr63AsHyiI/AAAAAAABQ_E/MWIEXUJKmwcXxLUIG6wRziAjZ-IMK9ZTwCLcB/s640/AADSHIK%2B1%2B001.jpg\" width=\"435\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I can and my younger\nson can paint better than Souza with our legs .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/modern-abstract-art-and-picasso-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/modern-abstract-art-and-picasso-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What visitors in art\ngalleries and Christy / Sotheby auctions don\u2019t know as they look at these\nMonets, Matisses and other masterpieces is that many of them are legally owned\nby secrecy-guarded companies in tax havens: Liechtenstein, the Cayman Islands,\nthe British Virgin Islands and the Cook Islands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Van Gogh\u2019s 1884\npainting, Water Mill at Gennep, is one of the works &nbsp;Thyssen-Bornemisza purchased with the help of\nan offshore operative based in the Cook Islands<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well-known art\ncollectors with companies registered through Mossack Fonseca include Spain\u2019s\nThyssen-Bornemisza clan, and Picasso\u2019s granddaughter, Marina Ruiz-Picasso.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Documents obtained by\nthe International Consortium of Investigative Journalists show how\nThyssen-Bornemisza built up part of her collection ( wife of German Jew&nbsp; Baron Hans Heinrich Thyssen-Bornemisza )&nbsp; buying art from international auction houses\nsuch as Sotheby\u2019s and Christie\u2019s through a Cook Islands company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Hans Heinrich\nThyssen-Bornemisza was grandson of Rothschild\u2019s shipowner front agent JEW\nAugust Thyssen &nbsp;( son of Rothschild\u2019s\nagent banker Friedrich Thyssen&nbsp; )&nbsp; was one of the first to start collecting\nworks of art using Rothschild\u2019s money.</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ALL PAINTINGS STOLEN BY\nJEW HITLER WERE JEW ROTHSCHILDs MAAL-- &nbsp;LATER. SOLD VIA PANAMA&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca was\nconstantly helping to shuffle billions of dollars\u2019 worth of art in and out of\nshell companies based in tax havens around the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russian oligarch Dmitri\nRybolovlev, for instance, incorporated a company called Xitrans Finance Ltd in\nthe British Virgin Islands, to own paintings by Picasso, Modigliani, Van Gogh,\nMonet, Degas and Rothko. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he split from his\nwife Elena, he used Xitrans to move the art out of Switzerland \u2013 and, not\ncoincidentally, out of the jurisdiction of the Swiss divorce courts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Mossack Fonseca\u2019s\nmain job was to keep assets and their ownership secret, then it was tailor-made\nfor servicing the international art world, where dynastic fortunes can be made\non the basis of nothing more than knowing who owns what.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ART IS USED FOR\nMULTIPLYING MONEY AND MAKING MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR\u2014AN ART PERFECTED BY JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWS OWN ALL CRITIC\nMAGAZINES AND FINE LIFE TV &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHIT &nbsp;FUCKIN\u2019 WINE IS SOLD FOR THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS\u2014WINE\nTASTERS ARE IN THEIR PAYROLL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/chilean-wine-and-art-of-wine-tasting.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/chilean-wine-and-art-of-wine-tasting.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1dq5LNLMCPQ/WKsEqRPhaHI/AAAAAAABQ_g/m71fdhYHI50CJKjI10rgVsiFExIoQPyCQCLcB/s1600/chssartoftheday_2949_The_Most_Expensive_Divorces_in_History__n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1dq5LNLMCPQ/WKsEqRPhaHI/AAAAAAABQ_g/m71fdhYHI50CJKjI10rgVsiFExIoQPyCQCLcB/s640/chssartoftheday_2949_The_Most_Expensive_Divorces_in_History__n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW Dmitry Yevgenyevich\nRybolovlev &nbsp;is a Russian businessman,\ninvestor.. &nbsp; In 2014, a Swiss court ordered him to pay over $4.8 billion to his\nformer wife Elena Rybolovleva THE most expensive divorce settlement in history.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In &nbsp;2016, it was revealed by the International\nConsortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) that Rybolovlev used a company\nregistered in the Virgin Islands to hide art from his former wife Elena during\ntheir divorce proceeding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Below: Elena baby stole his 28 million diamond ring&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZE7tNBoL_Iw/WKsETLIs-cI/AAAAAAABQ_c/eKxOEXmdL4An3P22MSw53oyBjzT8clx6ACLcB/s1600/14597www82814553.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZE7tNBoL_Iw/WKsETLIs-cI/AAAAAAABQ_c/eKxOEXmdL4An3P22MSw53oyBjzT8clx6ACLcB/s640/14597www82814553.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consider the man who\nsold Rybolovlev most of those paintings. Yves Bouvier is connected to five\ndifferent Mossack Fonseca companies (Rybolovlev is comparatively modest, with a\nmere two), and would mark up the paintings he was selling by astonishing amounts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Bouvier started off by buying a Gauguin for\n$9.5 million and then selling it for $11.3 million, but soon got more\nambitious. He bought a Picasso for $4.8 million and then flipped it to\nRybolovlev for $34.4 million.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He sold the oligarch a Klimt masterpiece for $183\nmillion, including a $60 million profit for himself. There was also a Rothko\nthat he bought for $80 million and sold for $189 million.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bouvier bought a\nModigliani from Steve Cohen for $93.5 million, and then sold it to the Russian Rybolovlev\nfor $118 million.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Add it all up, and Rybolovlev\u2019s lawyers estimate that Bouvier\novercharged his client by the hilariously specific, yet eye-poppingly enormous,\nsum of $1,049,465,009. Call it a nice round billion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the art world, by\ncontrast, the most transparent companies of all \u2013 the auction houses \u2013\ntypically charge sellers about 12 percent, and buyers about 20 percent, for a\ntotal commission of more than 30 percent. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in private transactions, the slice taken\nby the middleman can be bigger still \u2013 even when prices get up into the $100\nmillion range, as can be seen with the Bouvier-Rybolovlev transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dmitri Rybolovlev, incorporated\na company called Xitrans Finance Ltd in the British Virgin Islands, to own\npaintings by Picasso, Modigliani, Van Gogh, Monet, Degas and Rothko. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he split from his wife Elena baby, he used\nXitrans to move the art out of Switzerland \u2013 and, not coincidentally, out of\nthe jurisdiction of the Swiss divorce courts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose behind such\ncorporate SHELL company maneuvers nearly always involves opacity: to ensure\nthat no one knows who the art sellers might be, or what other art they might\nown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On top of that, the art\nmarket is characterized by easily-moved goods. Sometimes, a painting doesn\u2019t even\nmove when it\u2019s sold; the \u201cfreeport\u201d simply changes the name of the owner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The combination of tax havens, portability and\nsecrecy is catnip to money launderers: &nbsp;&nbsp;Add\na few layers of shell companies, and you have a way of storing and moving\nbillions of dollars in value in a manner that\u2019s all but untraceable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What kind of person\ninvests in an asset that sits expensively in a warehouse, is never exhibited,\nand never generates any cash, but can be liquidated for a huge amount of money\nin case of emergency? &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The secrecy of the art\nworld, enabled by agents such as Mossack Fonseca, is a cancer that withholds\nmasterpieces from public view and that turns the art market into a\nbillion-dollar game of ultra-high-stakes hide-and-seek. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a cosy kosher\nclub. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are not a Jew you get\ncheated .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, the amount of\nmoney in the art world has never been greater. But the Panama Papers are a\nwelcome reminder of the real-world cost of all that money. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Italian artist Amadeo\nModigliani, is known as \u201cSeated Man with a Cane.\u201d Modigliani, a young,\nimpoverished alcoholic, died of tuberculosis almost a century ago; his\npaintings today sell for as much as $170 million.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The JEW Nahmad family\nhas controlled the Panama-based company, International Art Center, for more\nthan 20 years, the records show. It is an important part of the family\u2019s art\nbusiness. David Nahmad, the family leader, has been the company\u2019s sole owner\nsince January 2014.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mossack Fonseca not\nonly helped the Nahmads establish International Art Center in 1995, it provided\nmany of its other clients with the tools to secretly carry out high-end art\ntransactions worldwide for works by artists such as Van Gogh, Rembrandt,\nChagall, Matisse, Basquiat and Warhol.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since art is easily\ntransportable, expensive and poorly regulated, &nbsp;it is often used for money laundering\u2026the\ninternational art world, where dynastic fortunes can be made on the basis of\nnothing more than knowing who owns what.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Art has become a\nvaluable asset for a global kosher elite eager to stash their money in safe and\nsecluded harbors. &nbsp;In 2015, sales of art\nexceeded $63.8 billion.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mossack Fonseca\ndata provides new insight into a legal dispute involving the GOYIM Goulandris\nfamily, a Greek shipping dynasty that is in the middle of a fight over what\nhappened to 83 missing art masterpieces-- the largest collection of missing\npaintings in history\u2014worth more than 3100 million USD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money obtained\nillegally\u2014from fraud, embezzlement, bribery, etc.\u2014needs a hiding place. A huge\ndeposit into a bank account, with no clear indication of where that money came\nfrom, is a red flag for the IRS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So instead of\ndepositing dirty money, or holding onto it as cash, disreputable people will\noften turn the money into something else ( say art ) or filter it through a\nbusiness so it comes out the other side looking like the profits of a\nlegitimate enterprise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering can be\ntricky since governmental tax and revenue agencies keep a close eye on how\nmoney is circulated. &nbsp;&nbsp;In the US, deeds\nand titles require a name, at least.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the art\nmarket\u2014where the price of an artwork can rise or fall by the thousands from one\nsentence to the next, deals are made in secrecy, and \u201cprivate collectors\u201d\nremain anonymous\u2014is virtually unregulated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHIT PAINTINGS TURN\nINTO GOLD <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tax laws in art\nmake it basically legal to not pay taxes on art. &nbsp;&nbsp;Hypothetically, someone could buy millions of\ndollars worth of art without the IRS knowing, and then later sell those works\nfor a \u201clegitimate\u201d profit that looks clean on taxes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thousands of paintings\nare being used by criminals to hide illicit profits and illegally transfer\nassets around the globe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In February of 2013,\nthe European Commission passed ordinances that require European galleries to\nreport sales above 7,500 euros paid in cash, as well as file\nsuspicious-transaction reports. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2015, sales of art\nexceeded $63.8 billion,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Roughly half of art\ntransactions are private, strictly between sellers and buyers. There is little\npublic information about these sales.&nbsp; &nbsp;The rest are done through public auctions,\nwhich provide some transparency in regards to price but usually still allow\nbuyers and sellers to remain a mystery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When high-dollar art\nchanges hands, it often lands in a free trade zone known as a freeport. As long\nas art is housed in the freeport, owners pay no import taxes or duties. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The freeport system is used\nto dodge tax or launder money since precise inventories and transactions are\nnot tracked. &nbsp;The oldest freeport, with\nthe most art, is in Geneva. Its complex of storage facilities is said to\ncontain enough treasure to rival any museum in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christie\u2019s ( French\nRothschild front Pinault ) branch &nbsp;has\nleft their rival Sotheby trailing. As art prices surged, so did Christie\u2019s\nshares. Sales of Christies in 2015 totalled &nbsp;was in excess of&nbsp; $7.4 billion USD. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crypto Jew &nbsp;James Christie &nbsp;dies 1803) was the founder of auction house\nChristie's. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Auctions are theatrical\nspectacles with a lot of scaffolding and engineering behind them.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies are\npart of that scaffolding. It was named after the host city and carries a handle better suited for a Robert Ludlum novel: The Kyoto Protocol.<br />\n<br />\nEvery business in every country that signed the Kyoto Protocol is supposed to have an allowance of \u201ccarbon credits.\u201d Businesses that exceed their allowance must buy some carbon credits. These can be purchased from \u201cgreen\u201d companies that have not used their allocation of carbon, or they can be bought on a \u201ccarbon exchange.\u201d\u2014<br />\n<br />\nJEWS LAUGHED AND SANG ALL THE WAY TO THE BANK<br />\n<br />\nLet\u2019s take, for example, a factory. The factory is emitting 125 tons of carbon dioxide per year, but its allowance is 100 tons. The factory must now cut its production to bring it into alignment with its 100-ton quota, or buy 25 credits from, say, a biofuel company that is producing \u201ccarbon neutral\u201d fuel\u2014an entirely different view of the biofuel craze.<br />\n<br />\nAs the population grows, as new companies are created and existing ones expand their productivity, the use of energy (and thus carbon-based fuels and emissions) will increase. The quotas for a country, however, will actually be lowered.<br />\n<br />\nOf course, as carbon quotas (or caps) are lowered, the value of carbon credits increases.<br />\n<br />\nYou get the picture: the rules of supply and demand will prevail and the cost of carbon credits has a built-in price increase.<br />\n<br />\nPresident Obama has committed to a goal of reducing carbon dioxide emissions to 17 percent below the 2005 levels this year and reducing emissions by 80 percent by 2050.<br />\n<br />\nThis is exactly what the \u201ccap-and-trade\u201d legislation that passed the U.S. House of Representatives in June of last year mandates. That\u2019s right, the same circus act that brought you last year\u2019s $1.5 trillion budget deficit has passed a bill to force you to use less energy\u2014because CO2 is creating global warming.<br />\n<br />\nExcept, there is no MAN MADE global warming due to CARBON DI OXIDE<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s agents made a feasibility study to issue carbon \u201ccredit cards\u201d to every citizen under a nationwide carbon rationing system.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_13MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_13BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_13B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_14B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2411320947514340256\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_14M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt.
