, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a WIN-LOSE\nsystem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A carbon credit (often\ncalled a carbon offset) is a KOSHER financial instrument ( which made Al Gore a\nCARBON BILLIONAIRE ) that represents a tonne of CO2 (carbon dioxide) or CO2e\n(carbon dioxide equivalent gases) removed or reduced from the atmosphere from\nan emission reduction project, which can be used, by governments, industry or\nprivate individuals to offset damaging carbon emissions that they are\ngenerating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon credits are\nassociated with either removing existing CO2 or CO2e emissions from the\natmosphere in the case of carbon sequestration from forests and planting of\ntrees or the reduction of future CO2 or CO2e emissions from renewable energy\nand energy efficiency projects that displace fossil fuel power generation\nproduction or industrial processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon credits\noriginate from a range of emission reduction activities associated with the\nremoval of existing emissions from the atmosphere and the reduction of future\nemissions. These are commonly called KOSHER \"methodologies\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Afforestation and\nreforestation activities are a key means by which existing emissions can be\nremoved from the atmosphere and carbon credits created while construction of a\nUSELESS UNSTEADY KOSHER wind farm rather than a EFFICIENT WORKHORSE coal-fired\npower station may create carbon credits through reducing future emissions</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BRRAAAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY\n!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The carbon market was born out of the 1997\nKyoto Protocol, which mandates the curbing of carbon emissions. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To comply, the 182 nations that signed the\nprotocol must meet targets for reducing emissions of greenhouse\ngases\u2014climate-warming gases that include the common industrial by-products\ncarbon dioxide and methane.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Meanwhile, many companies are participating in\ncarbon trading voluntarily, either to build a green reputation or in anticipation\nof looming regulation.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Under a\ncap-and-trade program offsets are a form of currency to help participants meet\nthe regulations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you need to emit less carbon, you can change your process,\nyou can change what fuel you use, or you can find a company that you can pay to\nreduce those tons for you, which is what happens when you buy an offset.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A\ncompany that needs to eliminate 1,000 tons of emissions from its ledger might\npay for a project that will plant enough trees to absorb that amount of carbon\ndioxide.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To show that an offset\nproject does what it claims\u2014actually reduce emissions\u2014 you have to argue that\nthere will be lower emissions than would have been the case without the\nproject.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That type of measurement is just doomed from the start. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And people are aware\nthat it can\u2019t be verified, which opens the way to making any claim you want to\nmake. There have been a lot of complaints about so-called carbon kosher boys\nmaking a lot of money on nonexistent carbon reductions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the question\ncan\u2019t be decided scientifically, there\u2019s no sheriff other than Jews in cahoots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Europe\u2019s carbon-trading\nmarket was supposed to be capitalism\u2019s solution to global warming. Instead, it\nbecame a playground for gangsters, international crime syndicates, and even\ntwo-bit kosher crooks -- who stole hundreds of millions of dollars in pollution\ncredits.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although stockbrokers\nhave to be licensed, just about anybody can become a carbon trader. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The &nbsp;future of international fraud is KOSHER carbon\ncrime. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And hey, SHELL companies come in\nhandy\u2014after all it involves swindled dirty kosher money .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emissions trading is now the\nfastest-growing commodities market in the world, and criminals have eagerly\nexploited weaknesses and gaps in that market\u2019s regulations and security\u2014 billions of &nbsp;dollars in illegal profits and threatening to destroy the\nmuch-lauded environmental concept of \u201ccap and trade\u201d as they go.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The carbon credit is\nessentially a permission slip with a cash value that allows a country or\ncompany to emit a certain amount of greenhouse gases.&nbsp; &nbsp;In a\nstandard cap-and-trade system, a governing body sets a limit on the total\nallowed emissions and doles out or auctions off credits that add up to that\nlimit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a company is flush\nwith carbon credits, it can keep its dirty coal plant. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slash the plant\u2019s\nemissions, and the company will have excess carbon credits it can trade to,\nsay, an oil company looking to pollute more. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Societies have determined\nthat global temperatures should not rise more than two degrees Celsius to avoid\nthe worst impacts of climate change. If they use credits to prevent going over\nthat level, the thinking goes, carbon trading will help keep the world from\nburning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The list of possible\ncarbon crimes goes well beyond stealing and reselling credits: It includes,\namong other offenses, tax fraud, securities fraud, transfer mispricing, and\nmoney laundering, plus phishing and theft \u201cof personal information or identity\ntheft.\u201d</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And cash procured can end up lining dangerous\npockets.: &nbsp; &nbsp;This carbon</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms mincho&quot;;\">&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">trading scam has helping fund terrorist\ngroups in the Middle East created /armed by Jews using SHELL companies .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among the most galling\ncrimes, from an environmental perspective, are sales of nonexistent credits.\nMost such crimes involve carbon offsets\u2014when polluters, &nbsp;pay for emission cuts elsewhere. Offset\nprojects have included tree planting in Uganda and South Sudan and biogas\nprojects, in place of coal plants, in India. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xLlkHX0PpkQ/WKsz_nezd9I/AAAAAAABQ_w/L7n495xkAFwATzjKsqxpnd3uop4RRVEbQCLcB/s1600/Carbon_Trwwading_600.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xLlkHX0PpkQ/WKsz_nezd9I/AAAAAAABQ_w/L7n495xkAFwATzjKsqxpnd3uop4RRVEbQCLcB/s640/Carbon_Trwwading_600.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Critics of offsets say\nthey only allow rich countries to feel better about bad behavior, rather than\nencouraging governments to correct that behavior<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Compared offsets to\nindulgences sold centuries ago by the Catholic Church\u2014cash for forgiveness.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the real problem\nwith offsets has been fraud. For instance, back in 2007, fittingly, a Vatican\ncardinal stood before cameras and received a certificate declaring the Holy See\nthe world\u2019s first carbon-neutral sovereign state, thanks to offsets promised by\nan American businessman who ran a reforestation project in Hungary.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But not one\ntree of the \u201cVatican Climate Forest\u201d was ever planted. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ovDZrOUq21I/WKs2JKFlsdI/AAAAAAABRAM/eXlVMNJNwfAhcj6lSpNhlMGm5MPeLafVgCLcB/s1600/shell-awad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"386\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ovDZrOUq21I/WKs2JKFlsdI/AAAAAAABRAM/eXlVMNJNwfAhcj6lSpNhlMGm5MPeLafVgCLcB/s400/shell-awad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">European Commission introduced phase two of\nits EU emissions trading system (EU ETS), which was designed to combat climate\nchange by reducing greenhouse gases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The EU ETS was a simple\n\u201ccap-and-trade\u201d system. Under it, EU member states set a cap on the amount of\ncarbon companies in specific sectors could produce. This could then be traded\non the European market as emission allowances<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Companies that did\nnot use their entire allowance could sell the surplus, while those that had\nexceeded the limit could buy more. It was also possible to purchase\ninternational credits from emissions-saving projects abroad. It was an\nimperfect system that was easily exploited. The structure was poorly conceived\nfrom the start and had some real flaws<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Jews have defrauded\nbillions of euros by purchasing emission allowances on the European market from\nabroad, using a complex network of shell companies and offshore accounts in\nLatvia, Cyprus and Hong Kong.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uPuevrocYrs/WKs0xWjjhAI/AAAAAAABQ_4/IiI0IR4P6Fk020A-A0y58y5XACGOJoY2ACLcB/s1600/Kareidswva_PES_small-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uPuevrocYrs/WKs0xWjjhAI/AAAAAAABQ_4/IiI0IR4P6Fk020A-A0y58y5XACGOJoY2ACLcB/s640/Kareidswva_PES_small-1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the allowances\nwere purchased outside of Europe, they were not subject to the European Union\u2019s\n19.6 percent value-added tax (VAT). &nbsp;&nbsp;Front\nmen acting as brokers then resold the allowances in Europe, taxes included. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-N51gcy2INt4/WKs4GdyGO7I/AAAAAAABRAk/5twppnX4PD0Z5ljgaJ5rxETduHmVOci5gCLcB/s1600/ETS-FRAUD-24052016-eV02-EN-800x567.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"452\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-N51gcy2INt4/WKs4GdyGO7I/AAAAAAABRAk/5twppnX4PD0Z5ljgaJ5rxETduHmVOci5gCLcB/s640/ETS-FRAUD-24052016-eV02-EN-800x567.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But instead of handing\nthe VAT over to the authorities, they pocketed the cash to use in future\ntrades. But the money needed to be laundered before it could be reinvested.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-O9yhKuxh_HY/WKs3YAPUC6I/AAAAAAABRAc/Z4ZPE6G3v0UxBLL5dvB7djKODPWTk_uwgCLcB/s1600/uk_crbddwvat08091.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-O9yhKuxh_HY/WKs3YAPUC6I/AAAAAAABRAc/Z4ZPE6G3v0UxBLL5dvB7djKODPWTk_uwgCLcB/s640/uk_crbddwvat08091.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This involved placing it in a bank in China, where it was then handed over to\nbusinesses or transformed into playing chips at casinos, among numerous other\nploys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon is the\n\"world's fastest growing commodities market\" valued at hundreds of\nbillions of dollars. Nitrous Oxide does not even have carbon in it.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-a-JisivFKhc/WKs1XLGJ6eI/AAAAAAABRAA/UFm36F4hSLsnZ0mGDyDagWZaOtfqyy5QQCLcB/s1600/carbonffh-credit-market.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-a-JisivFKhc/WKs1XLGJ6eI/AAAAAAABRAA/UFm36F4hSLsnZ0mGDyDagWZaOtfqyy5QQCLcB/s640/carbonffh-credit-market.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Countries in Europe legally require top\npolluters to remain under certain government-issued emissions allowances, but\ncompanies who emit less can trade those credits to those who need more.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beyond\nthose allowances, companies can purchase carbon credits, or offsets, which are\nlinked to emissions reductions projects, like factory retrofits or other energy\nefficiency projects. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vZA81L6-HO8/WKs3miVKs_I/AAAAAAABRAg/kMD0rv1Mgc4scnA6lnUEniEQdALL0QJ-QCLcB/s1600/cartoon-carbon-wwwgas-elevator-thumb1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"452\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vZA81L6-HO8/WKs3miVKs_I/AAAAAAABRAg/kMD0rv1Mgc4scnA6lnUEniEQdALL0QJ-QCLcB/s640/cartoon-carbon-wwwgas-elevator-thumb1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the mandatory\ncompliance credits, voluntary offsets aren't required, but they essentially\nallow big companies to claim they're more sustainable because they're\nfinancially supporting environmental projects, like forest conservation.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What if the jungle &nbsp;landowner never had any intention of\nclear-cutting his land in the first place? &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Then your purchase would be a gift\nrather than an offset. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The landowner\nwould be taking advantage of the offset system to collect a windfall for doing\nexactly what he would have done anyway. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your\ntransaction would have no effect on the amount of carbon in the atmosphere.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Below: When you can write a cheque to yourself via a SHELL company, you have arrived&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4gHY15MVTKw/WKs1ixnIHWI/AAAAAAABRAE/LJJcpFJBRlg35snaphX3mjfuOC_FFbFpACLcB/s1600/cdm-cartoweron-downto-earth-india-sml.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"512\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4gHY15MVTKw/WKs1ixnIHWI/AAAAAAABRAE/LJJcpFJBRlg35snaphX3mjfuOC_FFbFpACLcB/s640/cdm-cartoweron-downto-earth-india-sml.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies can be\nused as a means to transfer assets of one company onto a new company without\nhaving the liabilities of the former company.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, when Sega Sammy purchased the bankrupt Index Corporation,\nthey created a shell corporation called Sega Dream Corporation in order to\ntransfer valuables assets such as the Atlus company's Intellectual Properties\nand Patents and the Index Corporation brand into a new company.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This meant that the liabilities were not\nattached as a shell corporation is registered as a new company. This process\nresulted in the former Index Corporation being dissolved. Sega Dream\nCorporation was eventually renamed as Index Corporation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FVZZCTiqXgs/WKs5Z-qo0uI/AAAAAAABRA8/xbOal4Rp0OEb2kO8uJ-9w0STrGlHK2fLQCLcB/s1600/offshore-straeetegies.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FVZZCTiqXgs/WKs5Z-qo0uI/AAAAAAABRA8/xbOal4Rp0OEb2kO8uJ-9w0STrGlHK2fLQCLcB/s1600/offshore-straeetegies.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5441836211565339052\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_129M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. The John Bull is very conscious of his rights and pension demands\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nTata Steel was awarded the '2015 World's Most Ethical Company' award under the Metals category by the Ethisphere Institute. \u2026\u2026.This was the third time, that Tata Steel won this award\u2026<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"> BRAAAAYYYYYYYYY!.</span>.....<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>SOMETIMES TO GET SUCH AN AWARD , YOU HAVE TO BECOME A CH0OT AND SIT ON CHANNE KA JHAAD\u2026\u2026</b></span></div>\n<br />\nTata Steel acquired the steel giant Corus in 2007\u2026\u2026To fend off a Brazilian rival, Companhia Sider\u00fargica Nacional (CSN) (this was a Rothschild signature trick for which only their ex-opium drug running agents fall )\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nTata had to pay a 70% premium over the stock price\u2026\u2026 Mind you, Jew Rothschild was brought in to advise Tata Steel\u2014 in addition to ABN Amro and Deutsche Bank\u2014late in the game after the Brazilian company CSN upped the stakes ( a game for CHO0TS )\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nOn 30/31 January an auction was held by the Panel for Corus's shares, with Tata outbidding CSN at \u00a36.08 vs \u00a36.03 per share\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nCSN's bid had been supported by Goldman Sachs whilst Tata's was supported by ABN Amro, Rothschilds, and Deutsche Bank\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nSAAB ROTHSCHILD KI LEELA THA, WITH AN EX \u2013OPIUM BUSINESS PARTNER !......
