THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI\nSRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">VARAHA BOAR TILTED EARTHs AXIS TO 23.43 DEGREES SO THAT THE WHOLE WORLD COULD BE INHABITED AND NEW FLORA AND FAUNA BREEDS DUE TO SEASONS..</span></b></div>\n<br /><div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\u201c After planting the earth, He adorned it with mountains and then divided it into seven continents\u201d - Vishnu Purana 1.4.45-50</span></span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html</span></span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE TROPIC OF CANCER AND TROPIC OF CAPRICON ARE AT LATITUDE 23.4 DEGREES</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THIS MEANS SUN ( APPARENT MOTION ) TRAVELS CONTINUOUSLY UP AND DOWN FROM TROPIC OF CANCER AND TROPIC OF CAPRICON..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE LATITUDE OF THE SUN IS CALLED DECLINATION..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">IF YOU LIVE NORTH OF TROPIC OF CANCER ( OR SOUTH OF TROPIC OF CAPRICON ) YOU WILL HAVE ONE COLDEST DAY AND ONE HOTTEST DAY ( JUNE 21ST AND DEC 21ST ).</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">BUT IF YOU LIVE BETWEEN TROPIC OF CANCER AND TROPIC OF CAPRICON ( LIKE CALICUT ) YOU WILL HAVE TWO HOTTEST DAYS AND THOSE DAYS SUN WILL BE OVERHEAD AND A STICK ON THE GROUND WILL SHOW NO SHADOW ( ONE WHEN SUN IF GOING NORTHWARDS AND ONE WHEN SUN IS TRAVELING SOUTHWARDS ) AND ONE COLDEST DAY ( DEC 21 )</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE LATITUDE OF CALICUT IN 11.2 DEG NORTH.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sci.ccny.cuny.edu/~luo/EAS488/Table_Declination_of_the_Sun.pdf</span></span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THIS MEANS ON APRIL 20TH AND AUG 24TH CALICUT WILL HAVE HOTTEST DAYS&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THERE IS NO SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA.. HINDUISM IS TOO ADVANCED FOR THE SHALLOW WESTERN MIND.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">SORRY -- RATIONALISTS KALBURGI/ PANSARE/ DHABOLKAR/ GAURI LANKESH / BRA AMBEDKAR/ EVR PERIYAR / UR ANANTHA MURTHY AND THEIR ILK..</span></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">UR ANANTHAMURTHY PISSED ON A VISHNU IDOL AND CRIED-- THE IDOL COULD NOT HIT BACK..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THIS IDIOT DOES NOT KNOW THAT VISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY..</span><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">SUPREME COURT PRAISED THIS FELLOW-- SAID IT WAS FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">A MONTH AFTER THE PISSING INCIDENT UR ANANTHAMURTY HAD KIDNEY FAILURE NEEDING DIALYSIS ..THE HINDU HATING ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY SO THAT DIALYSIS WILL BE FREE..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE WAITRESS AND HER HALF BREED CHILDREN DO NOT KNOW THAT THE GLORY OF ROME TILL 325 AD IS HINDU.. THERE ARE MORE THAN TWO LAKH COMMENTS IN MY BLOGSITE..<br />\n<br />\nMANY READERS COME HERE JUST TO READ THE TAAZA COMMENTS -- NOT MY BLOGS ( WHICH THEY SAY ARE TOO LONG )..<br />\n<br />\nHERE WE GO..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE OF YESTERDAY TWO BENAMI MEDIA COMMIE TV CHANNELS WERE BITCHING ABOUT BAAAD HINDUS ZEALOTS KILLING ATHEIST RATIONALISTS DHABOLKAR , KALBURGI, PANSARE , GAURI LANKESH ETC.<br />\n<br />\nTHESE PATHETIC COMMIES HAD A SINGLE MISSION-- DENIGRATE HINDUS AND SANATANA DHARMA.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY GOT FOREIGN MONEY AND FAME FOR BRANDING SANATANA DHARMA AS A RELIGION OF EXTREME SUPERSTITION AND PAINTING HINDUS AS SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nONE WRITER UC ANANTHAMURTHY PISSED ON A VISHNU IDOL BEING WORSHIPED TO PROVE THAT THE IDOL HAS NO POWERS AND CANNOT HIT BACK.. HE WENT AROUND BOASTING.. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span>THE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br />\n<br />\nEINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br />\n<br />\nA BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. THAT IS WHY HE IS THE NO 1 WRITER ON THE PLANET WITH PROFILE VIEW OF 739 MILLION...<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIVES OF THE TRINITY ARE ALSO COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE THE WHITE MAN AND COMMIES WHO ARE INVITED FOR DROHI LITERARY FESTS RIDICULED THAT BRAHMA DID INCEST WITH HIS OWN DAUGHTER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU GOOGLE \u201c&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAHMA INCEST</span></b>&nbsp;\u201c YOU WILL GET 4.8 LAKH POSTS ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SARASWATI ( WIFE OF BRAHMA ) IS THE MIGHTY QUASAR WHICH IS SEVERAL TRILLION TIMES MORE BRILLIANT THAN THE SUN....</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE VEDAS WHICH WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO REFERS TO SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SHIVA WIFE PARVATI ( DEVI/ BHAGAWATI/ DURGA / KALI ) IS A MIGHTY COSMIC ALLEGORY.. IN HER DESTRUCTIVE FORM SHE IS THE BLACK HOLE WHICH CAN DEVOUR ENTIRE GALAXIES IN SECONDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLONG AGO WHEN MEAND MY WIFE CLIMBED UP KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN, MANY READERS ASKED ME WHY I DID THAT..<br />\n<br />\nWELL MY WIFE DID ORGONE ENERGY MAPPING..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kudajadri-mountain-chitramoola-cave-adi.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST ABOVE I WROTE ABOUT DEVI FOLLOWING ADI SHANKARACHARYA AND TELLING HIM NOT TO LOOK BACK.. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">33 YEARS AGO MMR\nVACCINES WERE THREE SEPARATE VACCINE SHOTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Measles, mumps and\nrubella\u2014are three different diseases which are caused by three different\nviruses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vaccines given to\nimmunise against measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) are all combined into one\ninjection - the MMR vaccine. This ensured only two Zionist Pharma giants\nremained in the business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The growth medium for\nthe three live viruses that are needed to produce the MMR vaccine is a buffered\nsalt solution \"supplemented with fetal bovine serum.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following\nafflictions affecting nearly every body system -- blood, lymphatic, digestive,\ncardiovascular, immune, nervous, respiratory, and sensory -- have been reported\nfollowing receipt of the MMR shot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER TAKING A MMR SHOT\nMAJORITY OF THE VACCINATED CHILDREN GOT THESE DISEASES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means , the 3 in 1\n, MMR vaccine does not confer permanent immunity--evidently, immunity is VERY\nshort-lived. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Young children's immune\nsystems cannot cope with more than one virus at a time. Yet, a second dose of\nMMR was added to immunization schedules.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Majority of the doctors\non this planet ( leave aside the ones who go on sexual jaunts ) would not\n\"unequivocally recommend\" the second dose to a wavering parent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many parents report\nthat their perfectly healthy children became AUTISTIC after receiving the MMR\nvaccine. The affected children were developing normally, then regressed after\nreceiving the triple shot, losing their previously acquired skills.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">To a man witjh\nperception, if a child who is exposed to two or more wild viral infections\naround the same time is at increased risk for autism, then a child who is\ninjected with three live viruses via the MMR vaccine is equally susceptible to\nthe ailment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below for INFO--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Measles is a highly\ninfectious illness --beginning like a bad cold, the child then develops a\nraised temperature (fever) and a rash. It likely to cause the complication of\ninflammation of the brain (encephalitis), sometimes resulting in brain damage.\nIt can also cause convulsions, ear infections, bronchitis and pneumonia, which\ncan lead to long-term lung problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mumps infection\ntypically causes inflammation and swelling of the glands around the face, neck\nand jaw. It is usually a mild illness but complications occur in some children,\nsuch as inflammation of the pancreas (pancreatitis), inflammation of the testes\n(orchitis), meningitis and (inflammation of the brain (encephalitis). Mumps may\ncause permanent deafness in one ear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rubella is usually a\nmild illness causing a rash, sore throat and swollen glands. Rubella can lead\nto damage to the heart, brain, hearing and sight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">RECENTLY IN INDIA WE\nHAD STERILIZATION DEATHS CAUSED BY POOR COMBINATION OF MEDICINES. NOBODY EXCEPT\nTHIS BLOGSITE TALKED ABOUT IT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The desh drohi Kerala Govt sought the\ncollaboration of the ROTHSCHILD ZIONIST JEWS in the Swiss Govt to bring in the\nSwiss Browns that yielded high quantity of milk.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nFebruary 17, 2017 at 2:57 AM<br />\n<br />\nhi sp,<br />\n<br />\nWHAT ALL VACCINATIONS HAS THIS GIRL TAKEN SINCE SHE WAS BORN ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A healthy, intact blood\nbrain barrier (BBB) protects and prevents toxins and other adverse compounds\nfrom reaching the brain.&nbsp; Most vaccines\ncontain aluminum adjuvant, an ingredient necessary for stimulating a strong\nimmune response and immunity.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aluminum which breached\nthe blood brain barrier has been used in vaccines since the 1920s. &nbsp;Despite this long history, aluminum adjuvant\nwas not studied much beyond its role in vaccine efficacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/killer-aluminium-leaches-in-your-food.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/killer-aluminium-leaches-in-your-food.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A damning case of\ngovernment-industry knowledge about a vaccine-autism connection is a leaked\nDecember 16, 2011 document from GlaxoSmithKline, one of the world\u2019s largest\nvaccine manufacturers.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The text admits the\ncorporation has been aware of the autistic risks associated with its Infanrix\nvaccine, which COMBINED diphtheria, tetanus, acellular pertussis, hepatitis B,\ninactivated polio and haemophilus influenza viruses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The report details\nadverse effects associated with autism, including ENCEPHALITIS , developmental\ndelays, altered states of consciousness, speech delays and other adverse\nreactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Japanese government\nhalted the MMR in 1993 due to rising autism rates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our gastric-intestinal\nsystem is rather impervious to aluminum absorption.&nbsp; About 2% of orally consumed aluminum from the\nenvironment is actually absorbed and much of this is later expelled from the\nbody by other means. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, injectable and\nintravenous aluminum compounds directly entering the bloodstream are a\ncompletely different matter. And this is why the use of aluminum adjuvants in\nvaccines carries a high neurodegenerative and autism risk.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;There is an&nbsp;\nassociation between post-encephalitic syndrome and either de-myelination\nor an incomplete myelination of the brain caused by vaccine adjuvants.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately, the\nresponsibility for a vaccine injured child lies at the feet of the parents and\nnot the medical system.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the parent had full\ndisclosure of the risks of vaccines, and assumed all of the rightful\nresponsibility to the life and well-being of the child, the only sane\nconclusion will be one of very careful deliberation and self-research before\nthe jab is made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A toddler who developed\nsevere neurological symptoms including blindness associated with chronic\nencephalitis and died following MMR vaccination was found to have vaccine-derived\nmumps virus in his brain.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Published in\nthe current issue of the journal, Acta Neuropathologica, the study is the first\nof its kind to conclusively demonstrate chronic brain damage in the form of \"panencephalitis\"\ndue to a vaccine-derived strain of the mumps virus.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In light of a recent epidemic of mumps in\nhighly vaccinated populations, the research raises questions about the dangers\nof live vaccine virus mutations and about public health claims that the MMR is\na completely safe and effective vaccine without serious side effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://outbreaknewstoday.com/india-launches-measles-rubella-vaccination-campaign-410-million-children-targeted-21809/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://outbreaknewstoday.com/india-launches-measles-rubella-vaccination-campaign-410-million-children-targeted-21809/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A study describes an\n18-month old infant who was diagnosed with Severe Combined Immunodeficiency\nDisease (SCID) -- a serious immune system defect that may follow infection --\nfour months after he received the triple Measles Mumps Rubella vaccine that\ncontains live viruses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The baby was treated\nfor the illness but six months later became ill again with fever, rash,\ndiarrhoea, lethargy and seizures. MRI scans of his brain showed evidence of\nencephalitis -- brain inflammation due to infection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The toddler was treated\nwith antimicrobials, antivirals and steroids and sent home on anticonvulsant\ndrugs.&nbsp; Over the next few months,\nbehavioural problems became obvious, his hearing was impaired and his speech\nand language were delayed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A year later, by then four years old, he was still\nsuffering from seizures and he became increasingly lethargic, disoriented and\nagitated. His walking was increasingly uncoordinated and he began to lose his\neyesight.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A repeat MRI scan of\nthe boy's brain revealed abnormalities and a brain biopsy was taken at Great\nOrmond Street Hospital for Children in London. It revealed neuronal death and\nevidence of central nervous system damage and chronic inflammation. Despite\naggressive treatment, his seizures increased, he became weak on his left side,\nwent blind and the five-year-old died seven weeks later.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A study in 2015\nconfirmed \"genetic instability\" of mumps vaccine virus that leads to\n\"genetic drift\" between different vaccine batches and may explain why\nsome mumps vaccines induce more serious adverse reactions than others, especially\nwhen they are grown on different media.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This science may also\nexplain why the mumps vaccine is failing. A recent outbreak among more than\n1,600 mostly vaccinated people in Arkansas USA has public health officers there\nadmitting that the vaccine isn't protecting against emerging new strains of the\nvirus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scientists ( not under\nthe payroll of Evil Pharma ) are reporting in many vaccines called\n\u201csero-conversion\u201d \u2013 when vaccines diminish the strain of a virus they are\ntargeting, but another strain of the same virus blooms -- just as antibiotics\nwipe out bacterial infections but leave antibiotic-resistant superbugs to\nthrive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines contain\nadjuvants: (substances that enhance the immune response to an antigen), such as\nmercury and aluminum compounds.&nbsp; Vaccines\nalso contain biological organisms and foreign proteins (many of these proteins\nand organisms come from other species of animals in which the vaccines are\ngrown)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If an individual, and especially an infant or young child, is injected\nwith vaccines, unprotected nerves are impacted and aberrations of neurological\ndevelopment occur which in turn influences subsequent behavior and learning\npatterns. Some of these developmental aberrations include the medical diagnosis\nfrom autism to ADD/ADHD to Tourette\u2019s Syndrome and others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">World Health\nOrganisation is losing its battle with polio &nbsp;More children are\nparalyzed and die there now than would ever be harmed by wild polio because\nthey are afflicted with a new \u201cacute flaccid paralysis\u201d -- a polio they won\u2019t\ncall polio because it\u2019s made in their laboratories.&nbsp; It\u2019s also strikingly similar to the\npolio-like \"mystery illness\" paralysing children in America.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aMbx_zcXi9g/WKYsvJ4wHzI/AAAAAAABQ6g/p_hNtiAZ0ysrwBzLfpKqtjLpoNK9NL3WwCLcB/s1600/MS_Damage53e62.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The myelin sheath is\nthe insulating material, made up of myelin, around nerve cells in the central\nnervous system.&nbsp; It is most commonly\ndetermined to be damaged due to an autoimmune response <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In healthy people, the\nimmune system recognizes that myelin is a component of the body itself, and so\nimmune cells do not produce antibodies that attack myelin&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3sE46NESj88/WKYs34CeMXI/AAAAAAABQ6k/kfKu29d79cAhMYSkxq7Jr1lq2mEea54RACLcB/s1600/dow888nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"367\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3sE46NESj88/WKYs34CeMXI/AAAAAAABQ6k/kfKu29d79cAhMYSkxq7Jr1lq2mEea54RACLcB/s640/dow888nload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When myelin is damaged, \u201cdemyelination\u201d, the\ntransmission of electrical signals along axons is impaired. If the sheath is\nseverely damaged, the underlying nerve fiber can die. . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4so7Hla7i-Y/WKYtaKPtXbI/AAAAAAABQ6s/Vpd6k65dx7EGrkh6wAK36uDUGQtZU2MfQCLcB/s1600/myelin-ww22sheath-disorders.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"271\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4so7Hla7i-Y/WKYtaKPtXbI/AAAAAAABQ6s/Vpd6k65dx7EGrkh6wAK36uDUGQtZU2MfQCLcB/s400/myelin-ww22sheath-disorders.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In adults, the myelin\nsheath can also be destroyed by stroke, inflammation, immune disorders,\nmetabolic disorders, and nutritional deficiencies (such as a lack of vitamin\nB12), poisons and drugs (such as the antibiotic ethambutol used in TB ).&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SfgT1TwQPO4/WKYtIB07c5I/AAAAAAABQ6o/Xgcx7LC5F_4uaGioiT3YiPcOZ1Ei_FVVwCLcB/s1600/ds00188_im00962_w666w5r308_big-8col.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"628\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SfgT1TwQPO4/WKYtIB07c5I/AAAAAAABQ6o/Xgcx7LC5F_4uaGioiT3YiPcOZ1Ei_FVVwCLcB/s640/ds00188_im00962_w666w5r308_big-8col.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One\nin six children in India now has a developmental disability, most of which are\nlinked to the nervous system.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Encephalitis, whether\ncaused through disease or as a result of vaccination, can cause de-myelination\nof the nerves.&nbsp; Vaccination programs have\nexacerbated this \u201csensitization\u201d of the population to allergenic encephalitis\nsince the introduction of vaccines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">De-myelination diseases\nare getting even more serious because of some abnormal process of sensitization\nof the nervous system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the myelin sheath\nwhich protects the transmission of signals in neurons \u2013 nerve cells is damaged\n, it results in loss of sensation, movement, cognition, or other functions,\ndepending on which nerves are involved<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most nerve fibers\ninside and outside the brain are wrapped with many layers of tissue composed of\na fat (lipoprotein) called myelin.&nbsp; These\nlayers form the myelin sheath.&nbsp; Much like\nthe insulation around an electrical wire, the myelin sheath enables electrical\nimpulses to be conducted along the nerve fiber with speed and accuracy.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the myelin sheath\nis damaged, nerves do not conduct electrical impulses normally. Sometimes the\nnerve fibers are also damaged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the sheath is able\nto repair and regenerate itself, normal nerve function may return.&nbsp; However, if the sheath is severely damaged,\nthe underlying nerve fiber can die.&nbsp;\nNerve fibers in the central nervous system (brain and spinal cord)\ncannot fully regenerate themselves. Thus, these nerve cells are permanently\ndamaged.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When babies are born,\nmany of their nerves lack mature myelin sheaths. As a result, their movements\nare jerky, uncoordinated, and awkward. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As myelin sheaths\ndevelop, movements become smoother, more purposeful, and more coordinated. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In adults, the myelin\nsheath can be destroyed by stroke, inflammation, infections, immune disorders,\nmetabolic disorders, and nutritional deficiencies (such as a lack of vitamin\nB12). &nbsp;Such destruction is called\ndemyelination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Primary demyelinating\ndisorders include Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is something\ncalled&nbsp; \"experimental allergic\nencephalomyelitis\".&nbsp;&nbsp; Until this\ndiscovery, it was generally assumed that encephalitis was caused by viral or\nbacterial infection of the nervous system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his experiments,\nThomas Rivers was able to consistently produce brain inflammation in laboratory\nmonkeys by injecting them with extracts of sterile rabbit brain and spinal cord\nmaterial (adjuvants used in vaccines).</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This experiment made it\nquite apparent that encephalitis is an allergic reaction. No consistent form of\nencephalitis was ever produced with bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8VoXquSHoeE/WKY366wCwpI/AAAAAAABQ7A/UiFlehKi0LEExLcz8i3krGIs6VaYHl4pQCLcB/s1600/6a00d835ff7f3f2969e201bb08911e79970d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"331\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8VoXquSHoeE/WKY366wCwpI/AAAAAAABQ7A/UiFlehKi0LEExLcz8i3krGIs6VaYHl4pQCLcB/s400/6a00d835ff7f3f2969e201bb08911e79970d.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Polio&nbsp; or poliomyelitisinvolves a breakdown of the\nmyelin sheath. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Polio injuries of\nde-myellination occur along with damage done to the anterior horn motor neurons\nin the spinal cord which cause paralysis.&nbsp;\nIn 1956 the polio vaccine was first introduced to the United States.\nThis same vaccine (that was highly touted as a miracle vaccine) was not\nintroduced into Europe until 1958.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the vaccine campaign\nwas a success, the two year difference in the time of introduction should have\nleft an appreciable difference in the occurrence of polio between Europe and\nAmerica.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It left no difference in the decline of polio between the two\ncontinents! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">However, there was an\nappreciable difference in the rise of certain unexplained neurological injuries\nin the two years difference. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: x-large;\">This anomaly was caused by a condition involving\nan allergic reaction in encephalitis.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\ngod given thing is now replicated by KOSHER devils in the form of EVIL PHARMA\nfor depopulation and destroying brainpower of third world dark skinned nations <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nanobots\nare cultured in tainted vaccine, it inserts DNA into your cells which instructs\nyour own cells to produce more copies of itself and that is how it replicates.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/uFXuxGuT7H8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/uFXuxGuT7H8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/5wQl3YQUuGw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/5wQl3YQUuGw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, myelination is a\ndevelopmental process by which the brain insulates neuro-pathways with a fatty\nsubstance called myelin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This insulation will\nkeep neuro-chemical synapses from leaking into other pathways causing\ndevelopmental challenges and cortical spillage. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Myellination begins in\nthe lower levels of the brain, as in the brain stem, and then moves upward to\nthe areas of the brain such as the prefrontal lobe and cortex.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This insulating process spreads through the\nnervous system in predictable developmental stages.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/o4YkqRUErPY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/o4YkqRUErPY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This myellination\nprocess will continue past the teenage years and into the early twenties before\ncompletion.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last areas to\nmyelinate are the prefrontal portions of the cerebrum. This starts to happen in\nthe teenage years. The prefrontal areas of the cerebrum have a profound\ninfluence on human behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.ajnr.org/content/9/1/69.full.pdf\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://www.ajnr.org/content/9/1/69.full.pdf</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MMR is incubated in\nchick embryo culture medium, which necessarily includes precursors of all the\norgan systems of the chick, including myelin basic protein. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Merck Pharmaceuticals,\nwhich produces MMR vaccine ( done in Serum Institute Pune too ) , claims that\nall traces of the chick embryo are removed before the vaccine is released for\nuse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This may be true, but\nit is probably irrelevant as it does not take into account the process of\nmobile genetic elements, more commonly referred to as \"jumping\ngenes.\" &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viruses being made up\nentirely of genetic material, they are highly susceptible to this process. It\nhas been shown that viruses are genetically changed by accepting genetic\nmaterial from cell cultures.' <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The genetic imprint of\nthe chick myelin basic protein, which is foreign to the human system because of\nits chick origin, may be programmed to induce antibodies against human myelin\nbasic protein, once injected into the human system.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This in turn,\npotentially resulting in encephalitis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Myelination is an\nessential part of human brain development. Nerves can only conduct pulses of\nenergy efficiently if covered by myelin.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like insulation on an\nelectric wire, the fatty coating of myelin keeps the pulses confined and\nmaintains the integrity of the electrical signal so that it has a high\nsignal-to-noise ratio. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When the insulation on a wire is damaged or\ndestroyed, the flow of electrical current may be interrupted and a short-circuit\noccurs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oligodendrocyte cells\ngive white matter its color by manufacturing myelin. If myelin falls into\ndisrepair, nerve axons cease to function, even though they themselves aren't\ndamaged. Protecting oligodendrocytes after brain or spinal cord injury might\nkeep nerve cells intact.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At birth, relatively\nfew pathways have myelin insulation. Myelination in the human brain continues\nfrom before birth until at least 20 years of age. Up until the age of 10 or so,\nvast areas of the cortex are not yet myelinated. Up to the age of 20, large\nareas of the frontal lobes are not yet myelinated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example:&nbsp; Measles virus carries protein similar to\nthose found in myelin sheaths -- antibodies induced by the measles vaccine may\ncross-react harmfully with myelin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CKuX7RlLi-M/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/CKuX7RlLi-M?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hundreds of cases &nbsp;of acute disseminated encephalomyelitis (ADEM)\nfollowing vaccination against human papilloma virus (HPV).&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;In\nDelhi and Punjab the govt vaccinated girls without parental consent\u2014which is a\nCRIME \u2013the authorities who did this must be jailed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/say-no-to-hpv-vaccination-for-indian.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/say-no-to-hpv-vaccination-for-indian.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Japan and Denmark hundreds\nof cases of young females had central nervous system (CNS) demyelination\nfollowing the administration of HPV vaccine .&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia\nSyndrome ( POTS ) , Fibromyalgia, RSD and CRPS all share a common feature of an\nabnormally behaving autonomic nervous system.&nbsp;\nIn that regard all of these conditions can be classified as a form of\nDysautonomia.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With dysautonomias the\nautonomic portion of the nervous system (that part that controls body functions\nsuch as skin temperature, sweating, pupil dilatation, heart rate, breathing and\nother independent functions) does not function just right.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Medwatcher\nJapan, hosted a symposium titled, \u201cProblems with the HPV Vaccine,\u201d to further\naddress reports that HPV vaccines are causing severe brain and immune system\nproblems like POTS and CRPS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Thousands of cases of neurological\nsymptoms due to demyelination have occured after HPV vaccination in the west . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
