font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">I HAVE SAID SEVERAL TIMES THAT VACCINES IN THRID WORLD NATION ARE MODIFIED TO REDUCE FERTILITY IN BOTH MALES AND FEMALE \u2013AND TO REDUCE BRAIN POWER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Aborted human fetal proteins, altered DNA material, and GM human albumin is used by EVIL pharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN KERALA WE NEVER HAD AUTISM BEFORE WE STARTED COMPULSORY VACCINATIONS LIKE MMR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MMR vaccine contains GM human protein, and has caused vaccine-induced neurological damage in Indian babies\u2014all this is hushed up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">INDIAN BABIES ARE USED AS GUINEA PIGS WITH CONNIVANCE OF DOCTORS WHO ARE SENT ON PEDOPHILE SEXUAL JAUNTS TO THAILAND AND EUROPE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Cell culture techniques to produce vaccine viruses in human cell strains is kept as a closely guarded secret<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Vaccine manufacturers do not test their products for mutagenic potential. The long term adverse effects of using aborted fetal cells for vaccine production are virtually unknown, yet millions of these vaccines are administered every day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Cell cultures involve growing cells in a culture vessel. A primary cell culture consists of cells taken directly from living tissue and never subcultivated, and may contain multiple types of cells such as fibroblasts, epithelial, and endothelial cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">A cell strain is a cell culture that contains only one type of cell in which the cells are normal and have a finite capacity to replicate. Cell strains can be made by taking subcultures from an original, primary culture until only one type remains.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Primary cultures can be manipulated in many different ways in order to isolate a single type of cell; spinning the culture in a centrifuge can separate large cells from small ones, for example. An immortalized cell line is a cell culture of a single type of cell that can reproduce indefinitely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Normally, cells are subject to the Hayflick Limit, a rule named for cell biologist Leonard Hayflick, PhD. Hayflick determined that a population of normal human cells will reproduce only a finite number of times before they cease to reproduce. However some cells in culture have undergone a mutation, or they have been manipulated in the laboratory, so that they reproduce indefinitely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Rubella vaccines developed using duck embryo cells and dog kidney cells. Polio vaccines developed using primary monkey kidney cells were contaminated with simian viruses: this was one of the reasons researchers began using the normal human cell strain WI-38 in the first place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">There are two particular fetal cell lines that have been heavily used in vaccine development. They are named according to the laboratory facilities where they were developed. One cell line is known as WI-38, developed at the Wistar Institute in Philadelphia, PA. The other is MRC-5, developed for the Medical Research Council in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cells are used to produce several vaccines including MMR, Varicella and Polio. Infected MRC-5 cells secrete the virus, and are cultured in large volumes..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cell line was developed in September 1966 from lung tissue taken from a 14 week fetus aborted for psychiatric reason from a 27 year old physically healthy woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 (Medical Research Council cell strain 5) is a diploid human cell culture line composed of fibroblasts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cell strain ( fetal lung cells) was developed, using Hayflick's technology, in 1970 at the Medical Research Center in the United Kingdom. It should be noted that Hayflick's methods involved establishing a huge bank of WI-38 and MRC-5 cells that, while not capable of infinitely replicating like immortal cell lines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Several vaccines currently available in the United States were developed using animal cell strains, primarily using cells from African green monkeys. These include vaccines against Japanese encephalitis, rotavirus, polio, and smallpox.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Indian babies have been sacrificed for use in the research and development of vaccines. DNA from these aborted fetuses is present in vaccines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MAXIMUM BRIBES FOR INDIAN MINISTERS , BABUS COME FROM EVIL PHARMA VIA SHELL COMPANIES.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE WAS &nbsp;NO JEW MONOPOLY ( AS USUAL ) &nbsp;TO STAINeth &nbsp;THIS PRICELESS TV SERIAL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ASK FTII TO INDUCT\nTHIS TV SERIAL IN THEIR SYLLABUS \u2013AS A MUST .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DQEVm27uUv0/WKXXSR6GLzI/AAAAAAABQ5w/zV--Bh6NQY0uGieUUxVfFXsG4WdihCrAACLcB/s1600/1D040098.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BREAKING BAD is an\namazing story of the nuances of human relationships \u2013 an unbridled &nbsp;potpourri of human ego, ingratitude,\nhypocrisy, double standards, double lives, morality, narcissism , greed, revenge, redemption, choices , aspirations, empathy, apathy, selfishness , squeamishness , web of lies, deceit, &nbsp;delusions, morbid obsessions , despair, desperation, devastation, melancholy, heart\naches , heart breaks and of course fruits of karma.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Deep ironies abound , and how !</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZM0CtYaXNeg/WKXXDZBR3DI/AAAAAAABQ5s/wotLYT6wVjwqwSnZkW8TLCUhurvrFHU8ACLcB/s1600/imFGages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZM0CtYaXNeg/WKXXDZBR3DI/AAAAAAABQ5s/wotLYT6wVjwqwSnZkW8TLCUhurvrFHU8ACLcB/s400/imFGages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breaking Bad is an\nexpose of the psyche of the modern Western man, whose home relationships are\nshallow and fragile. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Breaking Bad is a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">modern Jekyll and Hyde too . Jekyll is Walter and\nHyde is Heisenberg, the one who knocks.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Walt , both as Jekyl\nand Hyde is unpredictable and always ahead of the game. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Indeed, Heisenberg is truly the\n\"one who knocks\"</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Skyler, Walter, and Jesse all confront their inner demons while battling\nouter ones.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The editing was mind\nblowing, it was imaginative, original and completely appropriate, it keeps you\nriveted &nbsp;. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This show is a\ncompelling emotional roller coaster ride .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The storyline is rich and layered</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">With every bad event, every loss and\npain, you the audience feel the weight of it. &nbsp;There is sadness at every turn . &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Breaking Bad is one of\nthose rare TV shows that actually rewards you for watching it</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once in a lifetime a\nshow comes along so daring and original that everyone talks about it. Breaking\nBad is that show.&nbsp; Breaking Bad takes its\naudience on one of the most insanely twisted, brilliant and satisfying rides\nthat can ever be experienced.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L-ogKIv7hkw/WKNhy0lwu3I/AAAAAAABQ20/lvlE5ZOBTY4o0GpQ3rqiNpTMae2IY8lygCLcB/s1600/breakinMNg-bad.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L-ogKIv7hkw/WKNhy0lwu3I/AAAAAAABQ20/lvlE5ZOBTY4o0GpQ3rqiNpTMae2IY8lygCLcB/s640/breakinMNg-bad.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vince Gilligan is able\nto keep his viewers guessing. Throughout the show there are series of flash\nforwards where you will see a glimpse of the future scenes. This technique is\nperfectly executed, and makes viewers try to piece together what is going to\nhappen in the show. Although at the same time it does not spoil anything or\nallow viewers to know the future. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An example of this\ntechnique being used is displayed right in the beginning of the first episode,\nwhere it shows the main character getting into a car accident in the middle of\nthe desert with people lying dead in his van. The scene instantly grabs the\nviewers attention, and once they are brought back in time before the scene they\nwant to watch to see how the show will get back to that scene.&nbsp; &nbsp;All wondered\nwhat the one eyed doll was doing in Walts\u2019 swimming pool filter. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like Hollywood movie MY\nCOUSIN VINNY , this TV serial&nbsp; BREAKING\nBAD has the greatest acting ensembles ever gathered. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The story itself, with\nall the plots and characters intertwining, just fall into place so well.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Breaking Bad, Vince\nGilligan has the guts to kill off important \u201cin your face \u201c well fleshed out characters which\nalways leaves you in suspense as to what will happen next.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are no heroes or\nvillains, just flawed people that do bad things (to varying degrees) for a\nmostly positive goal. The complexities of each character, whether major or\nminor, are worthy of an inquisitive analysis, due to the richness of their\npsyches and personalities.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The show just unfolds on\nscreen like a magnum opus novel by some great author.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We applaud Vince Gilligan for\nhaving the integrity to not let this show descend into run of the mill commercialized\ndribble-- he found no need to pull FAALTHU punches &nbsp;. Vince chooses the slow burn over flashy explosions .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--V-l7B__Nqs/WKO_WX2wTdI/AAAAAAABQ3E/GsLTv0bTGlIVDrx4QjNoGhPIsWpwNwgNgCLcB/s1600/2x2_Haeenk_kills_Tuco.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--V-l7B__Nqs/WKO_WX2wTdI/AAAAAAABQ3E/GsLTv0bTGlIVDrx4QjNoGhPIsWpwNwgNgCLcB/s640/2x2_Haeenk_kills_Tuco.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the art of\ncinematography, the use of manual focusing and closeups is stellar.&nbsp;&nbsp; There was&nbsp;\nextensive use of POV shots and time lapses.&nbsp; A point of view shot, is an angle that shows\nwhat a character is looking at.&nbsp;\nTypically POV shots are placed in between a shot of a character looking\nat something and a shot showing the character\u2019s reaction. POV shots tend to\nrepresent what an actor sees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Vince Gilligan , you\ndid it maan !&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You have COOKED UP one\nheck of a masterpiece-top notch. Your show left a legacy . &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Breaking Bad is an\nisland of originality in the midst of a sea of clich\u00e9s and stereotypes</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your final ending was ZE\n&nbsp;ultimate .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You touched hearts--with the perfect musical score to close the serial &nbsp;.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only\na genius can do this. &nbsp; &nbsp;I am a chemical tanker Ship Captain --i know !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Chemistry teacher Walter\nWhite takes a final round of a Chemical Meth lab , and then lies down to die\nwith a smile on his face -- he was in his comfort zone , albeit in a pool of own blood. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mj8lfv8iHqQ/WKM7u76ZgDI/AAAAAAABQ14/3WM1IIu2ZEYD3fPxWUxlJJzM8vVPAg5XQCLcB/s1600/im35ages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">How many times in my 30 years of command , I have taken a final round of my ship -alone-- before getting off . I know the feeling , especially when the going was rough. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">From hindsight my crew knows -- Captain is on his final wistful solo trip. &nbsp;He does NOT want to be seen nor does he want to see anybody.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every body who watched BABY BLUE -- swallowed a lump in his throat &nbsp;( leave aside porn addicts )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ALL STORMS WEATHERED \u2013 LIFEs\nSEAS CROSSED </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his final hours &nbsp;Walter White was able to forge the hinges of\nhis own destiny and be his own man, despite being unable to turn back the clock . Walt went out in a blaze of glory- proud of his own scars -both physical and mental..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1kzQJAj4fyo/WKL0DV_Zb-I/AAAAAAABQ0U/hRrQilEyQLQGWwsy2j-Tcb88Qn1crHR8gCLcB/s1600/imaNNges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"303\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1kzQJAj4fyo/WKL0DV_Zb-I/AAAAAAABQ0U/hRrQilEyQLQGWwsy2j-Tcb88Qn1crHR8gCLcB/s400/imaNNges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Walter had confessed to\nJessie that he watched Jane choke in her own vomit and die</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\u2013to make him hate him enough to kill Walt--and he had slid a gun towards Jesse -challenging him to do it.. He knew Jesse could not-- having saved his life several times.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing just when and\nhow to finish a perfect portrait is the signature of a great artist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is enough moral\nconflict in this TV show to sink the titanic.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Every episode had its\n'HOLY SHIT' moments galore.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This TV show\ndropped more jaws that any dentist can ever hope in his career.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There were no\nextraneous episodes, no period where it lost momentum or seemed to be treading\nwater. The show moved with sure purpose. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">People enjoyed the</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\"Yeah bitch!\" moments of this show</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jCo6HY9f_r4/WKXWq8p_grI/AAAAAAABQ5o/RTIYSZN0W1ERviMCTTWjexc-yDaOSo53wCLcB/s1600/Dimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody escapes with the innocence\nintact!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Except the feeling just\ngrows stronger every day<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Just one thing before I\ngo<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Take good care, baby,\nlet me know, let it grow</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The special love you\nhave for me, my Dixie, dear.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b>I ASK MY READERS--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b>READ THE REST OF THE POST WITH THE MUSIC OF THE VIDEO BELOW PLAYING AT LOW VOLUME &nbsp; .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0wz3fjmRr4M/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0wz3fjmRr4M?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt a teacher of\ncharacter and honour \u2013 preferred to BREAK BAD&nbsp;\nrather than&nbsp; be a parasite -- In\nthe end , was happy to die in a lab\u2014a place close to his heart. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A chemist to his dying\nbreath, Walt spends his final moments alone with his one true love</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Below:-- For reference only--detailed story in Wikipedia &nbsp;!</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Breaking_Bad_episodes\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Breaking_Bad_episodes</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jZnWZv-7Oz4/WKNGhLkpoWI/AAAAAAABQ2k/UVVNfP-Rb5U44bJUx7vCyLbziLTjqk_GwCLcB/s1600/3823r7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jZnWZv-7Oz4/WKNGhLkpoWI/AAAAAAABQ2k/UVVNfP-Rb5U44bJUx7vCyLbziLTjqk_GwCLcB/s400/3823r7.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Plot of this high octane drama, in a nutshell: &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Walter Hartwell\nWhite is a 50-year-old man struggling to survive--your everyday man . &nbsp;He works as an overqualified\nhigh school chemistry teacher and as a cashier at Bogdan's car wash , often bullied and humiliated to wash car tyres of his own students .. &nbsp;</span></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">His honour is intact-- he is a man of &nbsp;principles and high character .&nbsp;</span></span></i></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Walter White is a mild-mannered,\nunassertive individual who lacks any sense of predatory opportunism . He was a brilliant\nscientific researcher who contributed to Nobel-quality research.&nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 12pt;\">Walt barely makes enough to support </span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">his sick son\nWalt Jr. who suffers from cerebral palsy. &nbsp; He also has to take care of his\npregnant wife Skylar, who is unemployed. &nbsp;Walter trundles on in a dusty corner of America toiling away in a life of quiet </span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">desperation<span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;. &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></i></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Age and 20/20 hindsight\nat missed opportunities are simply part of Walt\u2019s mundane life.</span></i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></i>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"></span></span></span></span></i></span><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">During his second job\nat a run down car wash, &nbsp;a tired Walt passes out and is sent to\nthe hospital where he finds out he has stage 4 inoperable lung cancer..&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Walt's &nbsp;world turns upside down . He has no money even for his own treatment. &nbsp;He keeps his cancer a secret from his pregnant wife initially. &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Walt discards his perspective on life, with the </span>realization<span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;that his mediocre life could soon be over and he has little to show\nfor it</span></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\">&nbsp;. &nbsp;</span></span></span></i><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">With only a few months left to live, Walt\ndecides he has to make enough money, so that when he is not around to provide , his family will not\nhave to worry financially.&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">To provide for his\nfamily's future, and the outstanding mortgage Walt who is smart with numbers ,calculates that he needed $737 000.&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The combination of\ncancer and everyone trampling and shitting all over him in his whole life causes him to\n\"break bad\" and do what he needs in order to provide for his family. &nbsp;</span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Wa</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">lt</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">&nbsp;decides that the only way to make big &nbsp;bucks in a very short time is to use his skills and start cooking\ncrystal meth. &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Producing crystal meth\nis basically good old fashioned chemistry, something Walt lives and breathes.&nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Walt accompanies Hank\nas a ride-along during a DEA drug bust against a local dealer named \"Cap'n\nCook\". During the bust, Walt sees a former student, Jesse Pinkman , fleeing from the scene, and realizes that Jesse is the dealer Hank is\ninvestigating. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Perceptive Walt notices\nimmediately that most meth cookers aren't chemists and he knows he could do a\nfar superior job if he set his mind to it.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This is the beginning of his slide down the slippery slope. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></i><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Using the school's records, Walt tracks down Jesse and\npersuades</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">him into letting him enter the\ndrug trade.&nbsp;</span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The two form a tumultuous partnership in which Walt will manufacture meth and\nJesse will sell it, producing the product in an RV that Jesse purchases with\nWalt's life savings.&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">&nbsp;Jesse, the classic under achiever , is a small drug dealer who is &nbsp;struggling to get by. &nbsp;With Jesse's connections and Walt's chemistry\nexperience, they decide to partner up and cook the finest blue meth in the state of\nNew Mexico.&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">With various drug dealers, the cartel, and his brother in law Hank\nfrom the DEA after them, how will Walt and Jesse survive and accomplish their\ngoals ?&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Walt's double life\nentangles him in so many lies he can't keep track of them all. This damages his\nrelationship with his family.&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">While witnessing Walter\nWhite's ascension in the meth business, we also see his moral\ndecay and steep descent into shocking depravity. The nice man who started as a desperate but loving family man now\nbecame a ruthless drug lord.&nbsp;</span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Jesse is more of a lost\nkid trying to find his way.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Both Walter\nWhite and Jesse Pinkman develop a very special relationship as they together\ntraverse into a world of drug lords, junkies, and all else that comes with the\nmeth business or as Walt calls it the \"Empire Business.\"&nbsp;</span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Unforeseen complications keep sabotaging Walt's drug\noperation and eating into the money he makes. As he puts it, everything is\n\"one step forward, two steps back.\" .&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">While Walt is trying to\nmake a more stable life for his family, he must watch helplessly as his own\nlife spirals out of control. &nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The castle the king of\nMeth had built started to crumble on his family and on himself. &nbsp;Soon , his empire is\nstolen from him, Hank and his partner are murdered before his eyes as the\ndirect and unfortunate result of his actions. Everything he did to assure the\nbest of his family is ruined, almost like King Midas in reverse \u2026 It's heartbreaking.&nbsp;</span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Wife Skyler and\nhis loving son turn against him, they even set the police after him, leaving\nWalt no choice but to hide alone in the isolation of New Hampshire for a\ncouple of months. </span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Riddled with cancer, and on the edge of his time, he changed\nhis mind and decides not to die as a lonely hermit in a cabin in the freezing woods,\nbut to go out with a bang. &nbsp;</span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In a jaw-dropping finale, Walter gives an\nopportunity to his wife to clear her name, he reveals the location of Hank's\nbody, and kills the neo-Nazis who took his life in cold-blood.&nbsp;</span></span></span></i><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Walter White died, of\ncourse, but first he ran the table of revenge, settling score after score with\nmathematical precision.&nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He went out with a big finish: his ingeniously rigged\nmachine gun mowed down the entire Aryan Brotherhood gang in a fantastical\nkilling spree.&nbsp;</span></i></span><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">He then rescues\na completely broken Jesse from these psychopaths, and, shot, passes away in the\nlab with a smil</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">e on his face.&nbsp;</span></span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">His redemption is complete..&nbsp;</span></span></span></i><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">He had watched his enemies\ndefeated, his voice was the last they heard. &nbsp;He ends things on his terms. &nbsp;</span></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is\nover when Heisenberg says it\u2019s over. &nbsp;</span></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Walt breathes his last as\nBadfinger's \"Baby Blue\" plays tugging at heart strings.</span></i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SLpy1Ylv-zc/WKUzv4ZNg6I/AAAAAAABQ44/IFH5ZfCmbkUPAEJlnB250cxz4v6Dtxk3QCLcB/s1600/5c96267gd32268ce384615ead3410d840.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SLpy1Ylv-zc/WKUzv4ZNg6I/AAAAAAABQ44/IFH5ZfCmbkUPAEJlnB250cxz4v6Dtxk3QCLcB/s640/5c96267gd32268ce384615ead3410d840.jpg\" width=\"426\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But was it a redemption?\n&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did Walter White set everything straight\nand turn himself back into a good man before he went out? &nbsp;He didn\u2019t, and I think he knew he didn\u2019t\u2013nor\ndid he necessarily want to. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt embodies a man who\nis against a rock, and a hard place, who has no other option but to throttle\nhis higher aspirations and grimly carry on-- his solace and validation in\nmiddle-class morality and virtuous conduct &nbsp;long gone<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of redemption,\nWalt ended with something like peace, having lived the last few months on his\nown terms . He knew what he was, and he was done lying, to himself and to\nothers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The key moment probably\ncame in his talk with Skyler: \u201cIf I have to hear one more time that you did\nthis for the family\u2013\u201d the bitch begins. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI did it for me,\u201d Walt lies. \u201cI liked it. I\nwas good at it. I was alive.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walter tells Skyler what she wants to hear .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">He knows that he cannot get his family to ever love him\nagain. &nbsp;Almost as a reward Skyler lets him see his baby\nHolly one last time, but she does not offer her forgiveness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">And Walt can only take what he knows is his\nlast look at Walt Jr. from a distance, knowing that his son\u2019s last words were a heartbreaking \u201c\nWhy don\u2019t your die ?\u201d &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Walt Jr. goes\nfrom \"My dad's a hero\" to \"You asshole, I don't want your money.\nYou killed uncle Hank.\" . &nbsp;Bitch Marie had poisoned his mind to get even with Walt. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Walt watches his son in silence - one last time--the most powerful --nay phenomenal shot of the series. The ultimate in \"in your face\" realism.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">At no stage does Walt overact or indulge in chootiya melodrama like the Bollywood star kids.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Walt is doomed to be\nthe man who will must&nbsp;traverse from one\nend of the spectrum of good &nbsp;to evil to\nthe other end</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jiCUaaNtifk/WKLDr9JhBLI/AAAAAAABQzY/Srltb7mDeKQfJb072oRMir7aqXuCySTowCLcB/s1600/idmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"438\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jiCUaaNtifk/WKLDr9JhBLI/AAAAAAABQzY/Srltb7mDeKQfJb072oRMir7aqXuCySTowCLcB/s640/idmages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His son\u2019s mind was\nunnecessarily poisoned by his kleptomaniac aunt Marie\u2014 the ultimate bitch revenge , for she\nfigured that Walt killed her husband Hank. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Walt\u2019s son Flynn is\nbrainwashed and mind poisoned enough enough to call the police </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">and LIE that his father attacked his mother\nwith a knife \u2013 thought it was vice versa.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/XZ0Gr6HWbbg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/XZ0Gr6HWbbg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is unpredictability that makes this\nshow compelling\u2014such sweet sorrow !</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vince narrates the&nbsp; story about an emasculated, downtrodden man\nwho finds his mojo.&nbsp; The cancer is his\nwake-up call; Facing death in the face, he finally begins to embrace life and\nrealize his full potential.&nbsp; Watching the\ntransformation is a joy to behold.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The show is riddled with\nsavagery but it accurately depicts to what lengths a desperate dying man would\ngo to ensure his family's survival. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To how much lengths\nWalter White goes to save his family is simply moving. .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is incredible to\nsee Walt transform from a nice guy to the ultimate bad ass.&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Despite all the things he does you find\nyourself rooting for him.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It was a revelation, as\nto how a man can win and lose everything in a such short period of time\u2014between\ntwo birthdays .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7Ejg7fZ8uZ4/WKNFC9qIowI/AAAAAAABQ2U/pvHDCsMCOqsCJ4RbJ6gPpx0avlVpaeCXACLcB/s1600/ima85Gges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7Ejg7fZ8uZ4/WKNFC9qIowI/AAAAAAABQ2U/pvHDCsMCOqsCJ4RbJ6gPpx0avlVpaeCXACLcB/s400/ima85Gges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Every episode ended with a fantastic cliffhanger ..\nCasting is brilliant and acting is top notch. From what started as a black\ncomedy, descended into a labyrinth of blood, destruction and hell.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt's heroic persona\ndepicts strength at so many levels but an unyielding love for family , he\nignores personal risk even his own values while focusing on building a\nfinancial empire for those he loves.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His relationship with Jessie is in itself\nbrilliant as he depicts a mentor, almost father like role yet endless conflicts\nand personality differences create one fine show!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breaking Bad is a dark\npsychological drama\u2014it is difficult to fit into any genre easily.. Bryan\nCranston is absolutely brilliant portraying the average middle class dad with\nvalues, Walt. &nbsp;&nbsp;He plays it so numb, then\nbreaks bad with such fuckin\u2019 force.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vince Gilligan kept\nfans transfixed for 62 episodes or 47 hours . This show never ran short of steam . People have still not stopped writing reviews of this TV show, after 4 years . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Every episode was lapped up and had viewers </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">begging to watch the next one</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_1)\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_1)</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_2)\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_2)</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_3)\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_3)</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_4)\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breaking_Bad_(season_4)</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;
