, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breaking Bad TV series\ncrosses the boundary between television and fine art.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We have never got to\nsee </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">this level of beauty through the TV\nor movie medium. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It transcends its\nmedium.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2015,&nbsp; Vince Gilligan publicly requested fans of the\nseries to stop reenacting a scene in which Walter angrily throws a pizza on his\nroof after his wife refuses to let him inside.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vince had said nothing without\ndeep meaning behind it. &nbsp;The most simple\nand innocuous interactions have symbolic meaning. You won't be cheated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cBreaking Bad\" is\na testament to fabulous storytelling\u2014it &nbsp;will survive as a beacon of quality for\ngenerations to come.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The characters played\ntheir parts just like the characters in MY COUSIN VINNY</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt\u2019s attempts to\nsweet talk his son Walter Jr , into accepting a parcel of money had\nled to a final heart breaking breach. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\u201cWhy can\u2019t you just die?\u201d his dear son had\nscreamed into the phone . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt\u2019s heart wrenching gasp\nof \u201cIt can\u2019t all be for nothing\u201d was the sound of a man staring into the deep\ndark abyss. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The milk had curdled,\nthe glass has shattered . &nbsp;&nbsp;Time was ripe for mind boggling redemption on\nWalt\u2019s own terms.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Hx6nUPkUYMA/WKL1UyzkqYI/AAAAAAABQ00/CFqyaKz_qgo0fvxCp0nexjeCSa8CAPvkQCLcB/s1600/i890mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Hx6nUPkUYMA/WKL1UyzkqYI/AAAAAAABQ00/CFqyaKz_qgo0fvxCp0nexjeCSa8CAPvkQCLcB/s400/i890mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt gets to know via\nCharlie Rose that his dual life as Heisenberg resulted in him being scrubbed\nfrom the history of Gray Matter, the company he helped create with Elliot and\nGretchen Schwartz. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And now, with $70\nmillion of his ill-gotten fortune in the hands of Todd and his family of Nazis,\nthe cruel joke had become that Walter\u2019s true legacy was to lose his life\u2019s work\nnot once but twice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt is trapped in New\nHampshire, paying ten thousand dollars for an hour of poker\u2014alone, powerless,\nsick. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesse\u2019s bold attempted escape from\nNazi meth slavery doesn\u2019t buy him freedom; it means his ex-girlfriend gets\nshot, and Brock is left a traumatized orphan\u2014the future target after the next attempted\nescape<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in \u2018Felina,\u2019 all\nroads lead back to Albuquerque. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6xEAD7dHL3U/WKL1Dsb95mI/AAAAAAABQ0w/TF7W8WkK9vI7oiz9t2LcbC1ZlGsBfThkQCLcB/s1600/i2222mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6xEAD7dHL3U/WKL1Dsb95mI/AAAAAAABQ0w/TF7W8WkK9vI7oiz9t2LcbC1ZlGsBfThkQCLcB/s400/i2222mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the beating his\nego took from the Schwartzes and the phone call he\u2019d placed to his son, Walter\nhad chosen his next and final move: It is better to die chasing what he loved,\nthan to wither away and quietly disappear in an icy New Hampshire cabin with a\nbarrel full of unspent million dollars.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despair turns to anger.,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">when Elliot and\nGretchen Schwartz, who had grown rich on the profits of Walts path breaking early\nresearch, disowned his influence on their company..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There can\u2019t have been a\nBreaking Bad fan out there who didn\u2019t cheer at the prospect of the imminent\nreturn of Walt\u2019s inhumanly calculating alter-ego Heisenberg. It was like the\nmoment in a western when the put-upon hero turns round to face his tormentors\nin a bar. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The difference was that\nWhite\u2019s accusers were putting $28 million into drug treatment charities. Those\nflippin\u2019 Schwartzes, they had it coming.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The finale circled back\nto Gretchen and Elliott Schwartz, Walt\u2019s former partners at Gray Matter. &nbsp; Walt\nbroke into their mansion and cleverly blackmailed the couple into providing his\nchildren with the millions he couldn\u2019t give them directly.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;And it was a\ndelicious scene: When Elliott fearfully brandished a small blade, Walt said\ngently, \u201cElliott if we\u2019re going to go that way, you\u2019ll need a bigger knife.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1Dsu4xju-iM/WKL05eM4HMI/AAAAAAABQ0s/wg6nSAgQa3U_gZcEImcpb7lyHHqblNVSQCLcB/s1600/im5HNages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1Dsu4xju-iM/WKL05eM4HMI/AAAAAAABQ0s/wg6nSAgQa3U_gZcEImcpb7lyHHqblNVSQCLcB/s400/im5HNages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt figures out a way\nto kill Jack's entire gang,and rescue Jesse at the same time.&nbsp; He&nbsp;\nuses the same scientific /mechanical know-how that helped him pull off\nall his great capers in the past \u2013 the wheelchair bomb, the magnet raid, the\ngreat train heist, the perfect meth recipe itself.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He gave Jesse the opportunity to kill Todd\nand to refuse to kill Walt himself \u2013 pretty much Jesse's ideal outcome. He even\ngot to crow to Lydia about having killed her earlier that day by dosing her\nStevia with ricin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, he got his blaze of glory, leaving the cops with only a\ncorpse. &nbsp;Walt's final hand: \"It is accomplished.\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a ship captain I had made a seal <b><span style=\"color: red;\">ACCOMPLISHED</span></b> which is slapped across every original Bill of Lading whose cargo I delivered successfully --it was my style . &nbsp; My bosses often asked me why I did this ( even in seminars ) -- I did NOT care to reply-- they would NOT understand what an ORIGINAL Bill of Lading means&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/bill-of-lading-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/bill-of-lading-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_-EXOnoo4eg/WKM7bMms81I/AAAAAAABQ10/J2X7jbZ8GScJlDSbaMfelDoysuonf-PxgCLcB/s1600/downMMload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_-EXOnoo4eg/WKM7bMms81I/AAAAAAABQ10/J2X7jbZ8GScJlDSbaMfelDoysuonf-PxgCLcB/s400/downMMload.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last hour of the\nseries took all the story threads that were still dangling and wrapped them up,\nnot quite in an elegant bow -- more like a blood-drenched metal chain.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I saw\nit twice.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vince left plenty for cerebral\npeople who loves to CHEW THE CUD after reaching the Bindu.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While you journey past\nthe onion layers to arrive at the core , who realize some subtle truths.&nbsp; The 62nd element on the periodic table is\nSamarium. &nbsp;Samarium is used to treat lung\ncancer.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SHNkxGRfZzc/WKL0xiIpkSI/AAAAAAABQ0k/WH4xMP4OCSsWuSCmzQnYAV6z4G36Rsk4QCLcB/s1600/im211Wages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SHNkxGRfZzc/WKL0xiIpkSI/AAAAAAABQ0k/WH4xMP4OCSsWuSCmzQnYAV6z4G36Rsk4QCLcB/s400/im211Wages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Felina was the final\nepisode <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Felina when broken into\nelements found on the periodic table are Fe (iron), Li (lithium), and Na\n(sodium.) &nbsp;&nbsp;With these elements is a play\non the popular phrase \"blood, sweat, and tears\" with \"blood,\nmeth, and tears.\" &nbsp;Felina is also an\nanagram of \"finale\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How Jesse imprisoned as\na Meth cook , maintained &nbsp;his sanity by\ndreaming of his perfect wooden box.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-C_1iqTV3dWE/WKNFXg2MeOI/AAAAAAABQ2Y/OKfzwTgM-_kPYoX1j4JK0FNXYoNsDGF2wCLcB/s1600/dowRH8nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"253\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-C_1iqTV3dWE/WKNFXg2MeOI/AAAAAAABQ2Y/OKfzwTgM-_kPYoX1j4JK0FNXYoNsDGF2wCLcB/s320/dowRH8nload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jack's death mirrors\nHank's - as Hank was shot by Jack as Walt offered Jack all his money to spare\nhim, Jack is shot by Walt attempting to offer Walt his money back to spare him.\nThey were also both shot in the head mid sentence. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt does not care for money any more \u2014he was\ndone .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maslow would understand .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt's death mirrors\nthat of Mike Erhmantraut--both were shot in the side and die peacefully. &nbsp;Mike while bleeding to death , was looking at the flowing river . It made me reminisce &nbsp;the song by Bob Dylan KNOCKING ON HEAVENS\nDOOR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/y864fRVBh24/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/y864fRVBh24?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The video below shows\nthe track sung by Bob Dylan in the classic western movie PAT GARRETT AND BILLY\nTHE KID , directed by genius director Sam Peckinpah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/EEo8obsERSQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/EEo8obsERSQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Breaking Bad\nfinale, 'Felina' Walt goes to a gas station where he uses a pay phone to obtain\nthe address of Mr. and Mrs. Schwartz. &nbsp;&nbsp;After\nthis he takes out his watch and places it on the pay phone. Then he just\nleaves. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Walt knew someone was\ncooking blue meth and it could be only Jesse.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt has covered Jesse with his own body to protect him from the hail of bullets from the Chekov gun.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ricin poison was a Chekov's gun.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"One must never place a loaded rifle on\nthe stage if it isn't going to go off. It's wrong to make promises you don't\nmean to keep.\" Chekhov, letter to Aleksandr Semenovich Lazarev (pseudonym\nof A. S. Gruzinsky), 1 November 1889<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lydia meets her\nbusiness partners like she always did, tears open the only stevia packet on the\ntable like she always does. Walt knew she would need an extra pack of Stevia\nwhich he left on the adjacent table , after loading it with Ricin. &nbsp;Walt knew Lydia would use Todd to kill him\u2014as she\ndoes not like loose ends. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The all-important\nricin, like Chekhov\u2019s gun, had to actually be put to use at long last. And it\nwas almost comical that Lydia, so prissy and exacting, always looking as if she\nhas just smelt 1000 pork constipated farts ,&nbsp;\nwas poisoned with a packet of her beloved Stevia sweetener.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the end Walter White\nhas catharsis .&nbsp; He leaves the world\nafter telling Lydia that she is going to die a painful death of poison for\nthreatening his family. &nbsp;He ends in\nsilence, and alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Walter White has been\nthe underdog his whole life. He's been taken advantage of and had bad luck at\nevery turn. He's never achieved his dreams, never done anything courageous. And\nnow he has a short time to live. He's always been a clean cut, </span>honorable<span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;family\nman. </span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Until now. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">He's dying. He wants to make money to support\nhis family. Most of all, he wants to make up for the time he feels he wasted.\nThis drives him to do things that would make you hate any other man, but not\nWalter - no, you'll root for him to win.</span></span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4rR9HFOsWpU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4rR9HFOsWpU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Walter falls to\nthe ground at the very end, you can see on the tank where his hand was a\n\"W\" left in blood. This symbolizes the main character's name\n\"Walter White\", and his final signature. WALT WAS HERE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Breaking Bad' is a\nrevelation, it's like watching a butterfly emerge from a chrysalis.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What makes this show\ndifferent is that it doesn't glamorize drugs; it does show what a human being\nis capable of when painted by life into a corner.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breaking Bad takes us\ninto the dark corners and recesses of the human psyche.&nbsp; At the same time it is a cautionary tale\nabout the disintegration of the human soul.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed , as the saying\ngoes, \"The road to hell is paved with good intentions\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dYO14yFzZ6I/WKKO0gvLkQI/AAAAAAABQy8/n_P9X214ufUUwQ-XpDVXwlJRaLWAmEU8QCLcB/s1600/iJmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dYO14yFzZ6I/WKKO0gvLkQI/AAAAAAABQy8/n_P9X214ufUUwQ-XpDVXwlJRaLWAmEU8QCLcB/s400/iJmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uuJMMR-svxI/WKKN7I0EyjI/AAAAAAABQyc/YyzzrP4dGnstK3esgBmxU9oGBTjrP1gmgCLcB/s1600/Blu88sky.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"346\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uuJMMR-svxI/WKKN7I0EyjI/AAAAAAABQyc/YyzzrP4dGnstK3esgBmxU9oGBTjrP1gmgCLcB/s640/Blu88sky.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3210711801210179401\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_151M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/my-visit-to-bhagyalaxmi-nagar-or-modern.html?showComment=1487047801637#c3210711801210179401\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 14, 2017 at 10:20 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_151MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nONE OF MY READERS WANTED TO KNOW THE CHEMISTRY IN \"BREAKING BAD \"<br />\n<br />\nWELL IT WAS AUTHENTIC<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS NOT LIKE A CHOOT NAMED SATYAJIT RAY WHO MADE A TV SERIAL ABOUT SOME ALIEN SPACE CRAFT. HIS RIDICULOUS CONTRAPTION HAD 4 DIWALI SPARKLERS TIED ON ITS 4 LEGS.<br />\n<br />\nI NEVER SAW A SATYAJIT RAY MOVIE AFTER THAT. THIS FELLOW SOLD INDIAs GUTTERS TO THE WEST.<br />\n<br />\nA CHEMICAL MAN WILL FIND \u201cBREAKING BAD \u201c MORE JUICY.<br />\n<br />\nVince Gilligan has done his technical research well .<br />\n<br />\nThe Meth cooking done by Walt is NOT some bullshit\u2014it is real<br />\n<br />\nMethamphetamine (contracted from N-methylamphetamine) is a strong central nervous system (CNS) stimulant that is mainly used as a recreational drug. In low doses, methamphetamine can elevate mood, increase alertness, concentration and energy in fatigued individuals and reduce appetite .<br />\n<br />\nAt higher doses, it can induce psychosis, breakdown of skeletal muscle, seizures and bleeding in the brain. Chronic high-dose use can precipitate unpredictable and rapid mood swings, prominent delusions and violent behavior.<br />\n<br />\nIn early episodes of Breaking Bad the Nagai red phosphorus/iodine method, is depicted, which uses pseudoephedrine as a precursor . By the season 1 finale, Walt chooses to use a different synthetic route based on the difficulty of acquiring enough pseudoephedrine to produce on the larger scale required.<br />\n<br />\nThe new method Walt chooses is a reductive amination reaction, relying on phenyl-2-propanone and methylamine. On the show, the phenyl-2-propanone (otherwise known as phenylacetone or P2P) is produced from phenylacetic acid and acetic acid using a tube furnace and thorium dioxide (ThO2) as a catalyst. P2P and methylamine form an imine intermediate; reduction of this P2P-methylamine imine intermediate is performed using mercury aluminium amalgam.<br />\n<br />\nThe crystal meth Walter \"cooks\" has very long crystals, is very pure, and has a cyan blue color.<br />\n<br />\nMexican cartels have established almost total dominance in the production of meth in the past decade. In 2003, in real life , more than ninety meth labs were dismantled in Albuquerque. Fifteen years ago, narcotics squads would find converted trailers in the New Mexico desert being used to cook several pounds of meth.<br />\n<br />\nDetectives used to look for hundreds of empty boxes of nasal decongestant Sudafed; now three or four might raise suspicion. A portable burner and a funnel in a backpack, a soda bottle filled with liquid and grayish powder, or empty boxes of matches and Sudafed all signal small-scale production.<br />\n<br />\nSuperlabs\u2014typically defined as operations with a production capacity of ten pounds or more per cook\u2014have moved across the border to Mexico.<br />\n<br />\nBreaking Bad was a fairly accurate depiction of many aspects of meth in the American Southwest. The show captures the chemical expertise necessary to produce high-quality meth, the drug\u2019s insidious capacity to infiltrate placid suburban communities, the use of front businesses to launder money nd the devastating physical effects of the drug<br />\n<br />\nP2P gets its namesake from phenyl-2-propanone, the intermediary molecule Walter White makes in process. P2P shares the same basic shape as methamphetamine and Sudafed. Like a skeleton key, it's a circular carbon loop (called a phenyl ring) with a short carbon neck bonded to a few teeth of clustered chemical groups. To turn P2P into meth, you just have to change the teeth.<br />\n<br />\nIn reality, as on the show, the DEA is well aware of this process and keeps a close watch on P2P. To avoid detection, White synthesizes his P2P from a particular foul-smelling organic compound phenylacetic acid.<br />\n<br />\nWalt's last couple of steps to complete his cook involves honing the teeth of the molecular key by adding a dash of hydrogen atoms. It's a process called reductive amination and is also true to life.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_151BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_151b+seedEmaD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_148T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_151b+seedEmaD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_148TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_148TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_148TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_151b+seedEmaD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_148TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_148TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_151b+seedEmaD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_148TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_148TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_148TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_151b+seedEmaD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_148B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c473443504427512844\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_148M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/my-visit-to-bhagyalaxmi-nagar-or-modern.html?showComment=1487047879725#c473443504427512844\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 14, 2017 at 10:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_148MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nEvery step of Walt's P2P cook mirrors the real chemical process. When Walt adds methylamine to his P2P, he actually creates two kinds of molecules that are a mirror image of the other. This is because the methylamine can form a tooth on either side of the key-- you create a 50/50 mixture.<br />\n<br />\nAnd similar to how carbon can form diamonds or charcoal, depending upon how it's arranged, even subtle changes in molecular structure can lead to dramatically disparate properties. With some of the teeth on the wrong side of the key, methamphetamine's mirror molecule\u2014called its enantiomer\u2014won't do what meth does to the body and the brain.<br />\n<br />\nMeth's enantiomer is the active ingredient in Vick's Vapor Inhaler. This was used by Mamata Kulkarni\u2019s husband Vicky Goswami ( Mombassa Meth lab )<br />\n<br />\nPhenylacetic acid, is a white solid used in the illicit production of phenylacetone, which is used in the manufacture of methamphetamine. This is a different method to make methamphetamine that doesn\u2019t require precursers ephedrine or pseudoephedrine: reductive amination of phenylacetone with methylamine. Phenylacetone is a controlled substance because of its common use in methamphetamine synthesis.<br />\n<br />\nThe Czech Republic has a relatively long tradition in the addictive and problem use of methamphetamine, which is called \u201cpervitin\u201d locally.<br />\n<br />\nJEW Hitler created Nazi beer gay bars in Germany. The beer and soft drinks were laced with Pervitin.<br />\n<br />\nHitlers humping gay brown shirts and SS were given Pervitin . A JEW Chemist named Dr. Fritz Hauschild , once the chief pharmacologist at the Berlin based Temmler, was the man behind the invention of crystal meth branded Pervitin was invented in 1937 .<br />\n<br />\nJEW Hitler eliminated all JEW anal sex receiving gays by trapping them in gay beer bars. These effeminate JEWS had no place in the promised land of Israel<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</span><br />\n<br />\nN-methyl-1-phenylpropan-2-amine or methamphetamine was first synthesized from the naturally occurring alkaloid ephedrine by Japanese chemist Nagai Nagayoshi in 1893 .<br />\n<br />\nWalt appropriately asks the Meth cook who tries to take over \"What happens when you get a bad barrel of precursor? How would you even know?\" and \"What happens in the summer when the humidity level rises and your product goes cloudy?\"<br />\n<br />\nThese are important points that someone just following a recipe may not be able to deal with. A skilled chemist like Walt understands the chemistry allowing him to alter or adapt the synthesis as necessary.<br />\n<br />\nIn early episodes, Walt and Jessie produce methamphetamine using the Nagai method\u2014the same synthetic route used by Nagai Nagayoshi in the first recorded methamphetamine synthesis.<br />\n<br />\nThe Nagai method employs pseudoephedrine as a precursor, which is reduced with hydroiodic acid (HI) to yield methamphetamine. This method was once the favorite of small scale meth operations in America. The Nagai method stems from the ease of obtaining the necessary chemicals.<br />\n<br />\nPseudoephedrine is extracted (via water or alcohol and coffee filters) from OTC cold medicine. Red phosphorus needed to reduce elemental iodine (I2) to HI and to recycle reformed I2, is collected from matchbook striker pads or road flares.<br />\n<br />\nWalt and Jessie use both as phosphorus sources at different times. I2 crystals can be extracted from readily accessible disinfectants. Once readied, pseudoephedrine, I2, and red phosphorus are placed in a boiling flask along with water and heated for varying lengths of time. The resulting deep purple solution, a result of I2, is a telltale sign of this reaction. Care should be taken\u2014unless intentionally trying to kill a rival drug dealer who's holding a gun to your head\u2014to vent the toxic phosgene gas produced on heating.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BUmpTKXpIdM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BUmpTKXpIdM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_148MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The ballad of Heisenberg\nbeats Gabbar Singh\u2019s any day !</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_148BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_148B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_149B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5124504367515160123\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_149M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/my-visit-to-bhagyalaxmi-nagar-or-modern.html?showComment=1487047990690#c5124504367515160123\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 14, 2017 at 10:23 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_149MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nBy the seventh episode of Season 1 (\"A No Rough-Stuff-Type Deal\"), obtaining pseudoephedrine for the large-scale production that Walt desires becomes an issue. To circumvent this, Walt decides on an alternate synthesis\u2014reductive amination using P2P (phenylacetone) and methylamine. Upon hearing he no longer has to smurf pseudoephedrine, an infamously tedious process, Jessie enthusiastically exclaims, \"Yeah, science!\"<br />\n<br />\nThe synthesis of methamphetamine using reductive amination is not new; Japanese chemist Akira Ogata first used it in 1919 with various modifications appearing in the scientific and patent literature ever since.<br />\n<br />\nObtaining methylamine required for this reaction\u2014which is on the DEA watch list, a list of chemicals the DEA has classified as having use in drug manufacture\u2014becomes a major plot line throughout the seasons. In reductive amination, a ketone or aldehyde is condensed with an amine to form an imine or Schiff base intermediate, which is then reduced to an amine. In this case, P2P and methylamine are condensed forming the imine; this is then reduced by adding hydrogen to methamphetamine. The steps can be performed in separate reactions or together (one-pot).<br />\n<br />\nWalt and Jesse use the former where aluminum foil is \"activated\" with HgCl2 to give aluminum amalgam. They use a one-pot reaction where P2P, 40 percent aqueous methylamine, and alcohol are mixed with mercury amalgam\u2014mercury amalgam reductions have a characteristic foaming cloudy grey appearance .<br />\n<br />\nAlthough H2 is generated, the reduction actually involves an internal electrolytic process involving electron transfer from the metal that forms a radical carbon and subsequent hydrogen abstractions from solvent. Once complete, the reaction is worked up and product-obtained by vacuum distillation. This is Walt's preferred reduction.<br />\n<br />\nIn \"Green Light\" Walt criticizes Jessie's product, derogatorily stating he probably used a platinum dioxide reduction. However, Jessie states he used \"mercury aluminum amalgam\" because \"dioxide's too hard to keep wet,\" which surprises Walt.<br />\n<br />\nAlthough P2P became harder to purchase, this did little to impact methamphetamine's availability, because clandestine chemists began synthesizing P2P themselves. Meanwhile clandestine operations became more complex, dangerous, and environmentally hazardous. The resourceful clandestine chemists adopted several well-known methods to synthesize P2P<br />\n<br />\nThe clandestine favorite for P2P synthesis has always been phenylacetic acid (PAA), which is also that used by Walt and Jessie. PAA is mentioned in \"Sunset\" when Gale asks Walt about tapering its addition rate and in \"Salud\" when Jessie criticizes the cartel, whom he's visiting in Mexico for not having PAA ready.<br />\n<br />\nThere are a number of ways to make P2P from PAA. The list Walt gives Jessie in \"A No Rough-Stuff-Type Deal\" contains two items: thorium nitrate and a tube furnace indicative of a dehydrocarboxylation reaction. Thorium nitrate is used to generate thorium dioxide (ThO2), a radioactive metal oxide catalyst used in the relatively complex\u2014though high yielding\u2014gas phase reaction in a heated tube furnace. Mention of \"thorium oxide,\" a moniker of ThO2 and a \"catalyst bed\" in \"M\u00e1s\" further supports this.<br />\n<br />\nIn dehydrocarboxylation, two carboxylic acids are vaporized\u2014in this case PAA and acetic acid\u2014and passed through a catalyst bed enclosed by a heated tube furnace. These form the desired asymmetric ketone (P2P), some undesirable symmetric ketones, acetone, dibenzylketone, and the side products CO2 and water. The resulting crude brownish oil is collected. After separation from the aqueous water layer, the P2P is purified via vacuum distillation.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_149MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_149BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_149B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_150B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7545994514677455114\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_150M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/my-visit-to-bhagyalaxmi-nagar-or-modern.html?showComment=1487048045620#c7545994514677455114\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 14, 2017 at 10:24 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_150MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nOne 2012 bust of a Guadalajara based super-lab allegedly confiscated 15 tonnes of high purity methamphetamine. The Mexican government's new controls have affected ephedrine and pseudoephedrine availability, leading to a significant portion of Mexican super labs switching back to reductive amination, specifically P2P prepared from PAA .<br />\n<br />\nAssuming all else is equal, most clandestine chemists would choose a pseudoephedrine/ephedrine reduction over reductive amination, because reduction of pseudoephedrine produces the more potent d-methamphetamine where reductive amination produces much less potent racemic methamphetamine.<br />\n<br />\nDespite using reductive amination, Walt implies his product is enantiomerically pure in \"Box cutter\" He asks Victor, \"If our reduction is not stereospecific, then how can our product be enantiomerically pure?\" Since he's not a chemist, Victor was unable to answer, and anyways, before he could try, Gus slits his throat with a box cutter. Walt gave bullshit to save his and Jessie's ass.<br />\n<br />\nWalt's methamphetamine becomes blue when he switches from pseudoephedrine reduction to reductive amination. When delivering this new product to cartel drug dealer Tuco, in \"Seven Thirty-Seven\", Walt says, \"I used a different chemical process but it is every bit as pure.\"<br />\n<br />\nIn his own vernacular, Jessie also attests to the quality saying, \"It may be blue but it's the bomb.\" After a short snort, Tuco agrees. \"Tight, tight, tight, tight, yeah, blue, yellow, pink, whatever man just keep bringing me that,\" he yells.<br />\n<br />\nGale goes on to guarantee Gus a purity of 96 percent for his own product. Walt's sample was 99 percent pure and \"maybe even a touch beyond that.\" Gale says to know for sure, he would \"need an instrument called a gas chromatograph.\" A gas chromatograph vaporizes and separates the components of a sample allowing impurities to be detected and quantified.<br />\n<br />\nWe on chemical tankers are familiar with gas chromatographs and mass spectrometers.. Lab methanol is tested to 0.100 ppm chloride by ion chromatography.<br />\n<br />\nToday scientists use Gas Chromatograph mass spectrometers to analyse the aromas, as wine makers have started using illegal flavourings and started employing LYING aroma sniffers / tasters.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_151b+seedEmaD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_151b+seedEmaD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Below: &nbsp;Being a Captain of\nparcel chemical tankers I know the importance of purity and the necessity to\nkeep out contamination</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now there was NO way out for Walt. &nbsp;The money kept piling up and Skyler thought Walt was being greedy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Behind every successful man lies\na woman ? &nbsp;Oh yeah ? &nbsp;How about the converse being true too ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bitch Skyler pushed\nWalt down the cliff when she told him \u201c I will have to wait for you to die of\ncancer\u201d &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Later Walter would sob in front\nof Frank \u201c Skyler does NOT love me anymore\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you go to any death row in the West , the story is pretty much the\nsame \u2013men let down by the women they loved and trusted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kDGdgoGBxUI/WKLzeS7KtFI/AAAAAAABQ0M/O7yCqfsGuRAs1gsRJ04ZL2Zk1G3WlcgTQCLcB/s1600/d33566ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt had perfect\nrevenge on Gretchen and Elliot. &nbsp;They would\nbe haunted by the vision of two crack hitmen stalking their every move: two best hitmen of Missippi &nbsp;who, in reality, &nbsp;were a couple of\nharmless stoners ( Badger and Skinny Pete ) till money was given to his son\nFlynn at the age of 18.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt gets his wife off\nthe hook in his final hour . He gave Skyler her PLEA BARGAIN&nbsp; lottery ticket that will give up the location ( Lat/ Long GPS co-ordinates ) of Hank and Gomez\u2019s bodies -- for crucial bargaining chip in her ongoing\nstruggles with the DEA.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Xs6_vecSv2Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Xs6_vecSv2Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But perhaps more importantly, Walt handed over this\npiece of paper knowing that it would act as closure for Skyler (and closure for\nMarie), while also making her aware that he wasn\u2019t directly responsible for\nHank\u2019s death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ultimately, Walt\ndoesn't just kill and plot to further his \"Empire\" - he wants to\navoid DEA brother-in-law Hank from ever discovering his activities while\nseemingly caring that Hank is protected and is genuinely affected when Hank is\nattacked .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Hank was about to be shot Walt screams that he would give all\nhis 80 million dollars to Jack if Hank was spared..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The relationship\nbetween the ODD COUPLE Walter White and volatile but immature Jesse Pinkman makes the show rock\n. &nbsp; The decision by Vince Gilligan not to\nkill off &nbsp;Jesse Pinkman in the first season is THE thingy that turned this show into a\nraging phenomenon.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m-ykr6LmpwY/WKL0VEHG8UI/AAAAAAABQ0Y/9rKPx_8zvtw1sgmfvWAbhnsWr9MaEFKfACLcB/s1600/image6Js.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesse was driven to\ndrugs by \u201cour way of life \u201c &nbsp;bullshit western parenting.&nbsp; &nbsp;Jesse\n, a good soul , &nbsp;took the rap for his\nyounger brother .&nbsp; Jesse did not snitch\nwhen he was being kicked out of the house by his parents for smoking a\nMarijuana joint.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">AND THE FINAL SMILE HE GAVE BEFORE HE GOT BLOWN OFF WITH DRUG KINGPIN GUS FRING WAS PRICELESS</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the third season\nWalt tries to exit the business because it has driven Skyler to leave him. &nbsp;Gus convinces him to stay, telling him it is a\nman's job to provide for his family, even if he is unloved.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Skyler had confronted Walt about his frequent\nabsences and excuses. &nbsp;She begins to\npiece together a possible secret love life and demands that they separate .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Gus Fring offers to pay\nWalter US$3M for three months of his service. He offers to provide Walter with\na state-of-the-art production facility and a brilliant lab assistant, Gale.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SbqrDTaiqQE/WKL0pfPPkII/AAAAAAABQ0g/l13a5g38Ds0rBEZf7POTQgR3tnMt8E0mACLcB/s1600/im888ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SbqrDTaiqQE/WKL0pfPPkII/AAAAAAABQ0g/l13a5g38Ds0rBEZf7POTQgR3tnMt8E0mACLcB/s400/im888ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breaking bad is a\ncharacter driven narrative..&nbsp; We care for\nthese characters, we follow them, we relate to them in some way. To be honest,\nthey feel realistic throughout the entire series.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of us in Walt\u2019s shoes would have thrown\ndown the towel against such great odds, but he did not give up.&nbsp; It was love for his family and hope which\nkept him going.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VhL1g2X7wIU/WKM7LTv52aI/AAAAAAABQ1w/uO1KuK03T1wDcDmRMPV70deHiomO6wVAQCLcB/s1600/downlo9Pad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VhL1g2X7wIU/WKM7LTv52aI/AAAAAAABQ1w/uO1KuK03T1wDcDmRMPV70deHiomO6wVAQCLcB/s320/downlo9Pad.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This masterpiece gives\nus a glimpse of the full essence of the human condition and the opening of the\nDark Door that lies in all of us. What would we do? How far do we go doing what\nwe think it's the right thing even when everything starts to fall apart? &nbsp;Can we\nkeep our goals or will we always want more and more? Can we stop? Can we give\nup?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;What will we do to protect the ones we love from the pain and suffering we\ncaused them? Was it worth it? &nbsp;Can any bitch cry other than out of selfishness? Is it possible to wake up this bitch who pretends to sleep, Does a man feel good when he self destructs on his own terms?&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rYmu-vZanTo/WKMtbQpzuwI/AAAAAAABQ1Q/fjQF4u-Tq20ddbY6sC1QIjcc6Yp2jhnzwCLcB/s1600/848867560-1Saul-Goodman-B88ob-Odenkirk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rYmu-vZanTo/WKMtbQpzuwI/AAAAAAABQ1Q/fjQF4u-Tq20ddbY6sC1QIjcc6Yp2jhnzwCLcB/s640/848867560-1Saul-Goodman-B88ob-Odenkirk.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Bob Odenkirk as Saul\nGoodman did a fantastic job. &nbsp;&nbsp;This smart\nass, quick witted lawyer who helped Jessie and Walt, was so well liked by fans\nthat he got his own show Better Call Saul.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Every time Saul comes on screen we are sure he will give us much needed comic relief.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">It was sad to see him go with his suitcase in the end for a hermit life somewhere , shorn off his identity.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Saul was waiting to be\nshot after digging a pit for himself-- when Walter coughed he saved himself by\nsaying\u2014I know that cough\u2014 Walt is that you<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Some of Saul\u2019s\npriceless dialogues ?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">--- Saul Goodman: Mayhew.\nIs that Irish or English?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Walter White: Irish.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><i>\n\n\n\n</i></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Saul Goodman: Faith and\nbegorrah! A fellow potato eater! My real name\u2019s McGill. The Jew thing I just do\nfor the homeboys.
